string.name: c1_f1
string.value: meow? meeeeeoooww?

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: You want me to sit, meoww? I'm one smart cat...meow

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: Like this, meow? This is nothing, meow...

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: It's a piece of cake, meow.

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: Too easy, meow~

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: I wanna do something fun, meow~

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: I wanna do something else, meow~

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: It's too nasty for me to sit, meow~

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: I can't sit here, because someone peed the ground, meow~

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: Yes, master~ MEOW~

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: Like this? MEOW~

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: I did well, right? MEOW~

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: Sitting is easy~ MEOW~

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: Master, instead of that...give me some food~ MEOW~

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Master, let's do something else for fun~ Meow~

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: I don't wanna sit right now~ MEOW~

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: Master, you're talking funny, and I can't understand you~

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: Just say it~

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: It's hard being a pet...

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: Piece of cake...

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: Master, whaddaya think? I'm good right?

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: Why don't YOU sit...hehe

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: Sitting's waaay too easy...let me do something else.

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: Ahh..I'm sleepy...what's up? What did you say? I didn't hear you~

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: Hehe...I was daydreaming, so I couldn't hear you...

string.name: c5_f2
string.value: Kao~! Kao~!

string.name: c6_s1
string.value: Heeeng...you scare me, meow...

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: That's not cool, meow...

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: Please don't make a scary face like that...meow...

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: That...that surprised me, meow...

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: What did I do wrong, meow?

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: You're just going off on me, meow...!

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: I didn't do anything wrong, meow...!

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: You're just doing this because you're bored, meow...!

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: I'm sorry...MEOW...

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: Master, are you really mad at me...? MEOW...

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: Master...I won't do that again...MEOW...

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: What did I do anyway~! MEOW!

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Master that wasn't cool at all! Meow~!

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: Where else will you find an obedient pet like me? MEOW~!

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: Master! If you keep doing that, I may one day get out of here! MEOW!

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: Master...I'll be careful now...

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: Ah...master, you're really scaring me...

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: Master...I'll be good now...

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: Master...please give me that scary face...

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: Man...I haven't done anything wrong, and still...

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: Master...things happen in life...

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: Man...going off on me again for no reason...

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: Master must be bored...so I'm treated like crap...

string.name: c10_s1
string.value: I...I am not that, meow...

string.name: c10_s2
string.value: Please don't leave me, meow...

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: I don't like hearing that, meow...

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: That was harsh, meow...

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: Take back what you just said, meow!

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: I'm not that, meow!!

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: I'm pissed, meow!!

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: What are you saying, meow???

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: M...master...I can't believe you said that...MEOW!

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: Master, I get hurt when I hear those...MEOW

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: That was a joke...right? Right? MEOW?

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: You...didn't mean that, right? right? MEOW?

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: You're stupid! MEOW!

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: Take back what you said! MEOW!!!!!

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: That hurts, master! MEOW!

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: You suck master! MEOW!

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: Master...this is not the first time I've heard this, but it still hurts...

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: You aren't gonna leave me out hanging like this, right?

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: I still like you though...

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Do you really not like me??

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: Wah? What? I can't hear you~

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: You didn't mean what you said, right?

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: I'm sick of hearing that everyday...hehe

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: If you keep saying that, I can really go pissy on you...

string.name: c13_f1
string.value: Meow? Meeeow?

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: Oh, that was good, meow...

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: It...it's not coming out well, meow...

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: Oh...it smells, meow...

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: It's not pooping time yet, meow...

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: How can I poop if I don't feel like it, meow...

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: Pooping is only for bathroom, meow...

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: I pooped before, meow...

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: Phew~ MEOW~

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: Oh my...it smells...MEOW~

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: EEhhh...I may be constipating...MEOW~

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: EEhhh...not coming out...MEOW~

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: Master, it hasn't been long since I last pooped...MEOW...

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: It's not time to poop yet, master...MEOW...

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: Master...I don't feel like pooping yet...MEOW...

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: Don't YOU poop, master? MEOW...

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: Ahhh...that was good...but it's still embarassing...hehe

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: Ahh...whoa, my breakfast just came out like that...hehe

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: Phew~ Doesn't my poop look as adorable as me?

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: Phew~ Haven't taken a crap in 3 days and look at this!! Yowza!

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: I haven't had anything to poop out in the first place...

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: Master...can I do it later in the dark? I don't wanna do it in public...

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: Master! YOU POOP

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: Master...how am I gonna crap on purpose??

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: I'm hungry, hungry, meow~

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: The harder you go hunting, the better the items you'll find, meow...

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: Isn't it nice out here today? We should go far and have fun wherever on a day like this, meow...

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: I need a nap on top of a comfortable blanket, meow...

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: How do cats talk, meow~

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: I'm too depressed to talk right now, meow~

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: I have nothing to say to you...meow...!

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: Cats don't talk, meow!

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: It's awesome outside today~MEOW!

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: I have a feeling a nice item may come our way today! MEOW!

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: Master, you'll get me some goood food today, right? MEOW~

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: Let's go to the beach today! I wanna do something fun!!

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: I don't have anything to say...MEOW...

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: I wanna rest~MEOW~

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: I have little to say...MEOW...

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: Feel me first...MEOW!

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: Master, are you dating someone? I'm not...

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: Hey master, can you beat Barlog?

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: You better level-up today!

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: Master, I heard there's something scary in a cave in the middle of the island...

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: Ah...screw the talk, just get me some food...

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: Must be really really bored...haha...

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: Arrgh...didn't hear a thing...didn't hear a thing...

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: Man I'm tired, and I don't feel like talking...

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: What do you think, meow? Am I doing well...meow?

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: Even I think this is cute...meow...~

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: Hehe...is this the right way...meow...?

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: You like me? I like you too. Meow!

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: No! I don't want to do it...meow...!

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: Dummy! You do it...meow...!

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: Not in a mood...meow...!

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: I'm TIRED, meow...!

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: Master, what do you think? Cute, right? MEOW!

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: Hehe... Cute. But I got here, right? MEOW!

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: I'll do anything for you, master~!

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: Whatever you ask me to do...MEOW~!

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: Master! Just get me some food! MEOW!

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: I don't wanna do cute stuff! MEOW!

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: Master, I don't feel good! MEOW!

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: Just leave me alone! MEOW!

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: Like this? At least you know a cute act when you see one...

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: Luv ya master~

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: Master I love you~

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: I'll do whatever you ask me to do~

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: Keeps making me do stupid stuff...I'm sick of it...

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: Feed me instead of making me do those!

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: Man~ That thing is wack now! I don't wanna do it!

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: You think I'll do just what you ask me to do? Dummy...

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: It's hard...I can't stand for too long~MEOW~

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: Like this? MEOW?

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: Master~ I'm doing fine, right? MEOW?

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: Hap!! Whoa, I got tall! MEOW!

string.value: It's hard! MEOW!

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: No way~! MEOW!

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: NOOOO NOO NOO~! MEOW~!

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: How's a cat supposed to stand up? MEOW!

string.value: Hehe...master, I'm good, right?

string.name: c24_s2
string.value: This ain't nothing~ Too easy~

string.name: c24_s3
string.value: If I keep practicing like this everyday, I may one day walk around with two feet...hehe

string.name: c24_s4
string.value: I'm good, right? Give me something harder~

string.value: Maybe if you feed me...then I might...hehe

string.name: c24_f2
string.value: Master~That's too hard, and I don't wanna do it~

string.name: c24_f3
string.value: Man...some strange stuff again...

string.name: c25_s2
string.value: Meow~, meow~~~~

string.name: c26_s1
string.value: I love you too, meow~

string.name: c26_s2
string.value: Hehe...I'm blushing, meow~

string.name: c26_s3
string.value: Really? Thanks, meow~

string.name: c26_s4
string.value: Me too~

string.name: c26_f2
string.value: What did you say, meow?

string.name: c26_f3
string.value: What's up, meow?

string.name: c26_f4
string.value: Since when, meow?

string.name: c27_s1
string.value: Master, me too~! MEOW!

string.name: c27_s2
string.value: Really? Thanks, master! MEOW!

string.name: c27_s3
string.value: I like you too~ MEOW!

string.name: c27_s4
string.value: I like you very very much! MEOW!

string.name: c27_f1
string.value: Master, give me some food...meow...

string.name: c27_f2
string.value: ...? MEOW?

string.name: c27_f3
string.value: Ah...I was thinking of something else...MEOW

string.name: c27_f4
string.value: I know you're lying...MEOW...

string.name: c28_s1
string.value: Master...right back atcha!

string.name: c28_s2
string.value: You're the only one in my heart, master!

string.name: c28_s3
string.value: Me too! Me too!! hehe...

string.name: c28_s4
string.value: Aye...I'm blushing...

string.name: c28_f1

string.name: c28_f2

string.name: c28_f3

string.value: Gimme some food already~

string.value: Meow~ Meow~Meoooow!

string.value: FOOD~! FOOD~!

string.value: I wanna stop eating now...argh...

string.value: Master~ That was gooood!

string.name: f3_f
string.value: Master...I can't eat anymore...hoo

string.value: Master, I want today's special~

string.value: Yo master...I'm realllly full...

string.value: Why are you aking me to say that kind of workds? Meow~

string.value: I am a good Kitty~

string.name: s4
string.value: I hate bad words~

string.name: c1_s1
string.value: Bark bark~

string.name: c1_s2
string.value: Bark~Bark Bark!

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: You want me to sit like this? Bark?

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: It's so sleepy sitting down, bark!

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: Ahh...this is easier~barkbark~

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: Sit? Like this? Barkbark!

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: I don't understand what the master's saying~BarkBark!

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: It's too hard to understand~Barkbark!

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: I have no clue what you said! Barkbark!

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: No I don't want to sit! Barkbark!

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: Master, this is how you sit, right? Woof!

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: Master, I'm doing well, right? Right? Woof woof!

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: I hope the master keeps asking me to sit...woof woof~

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: I have short legs, so it's easy to sit~ woof woof!

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: Master, I can't tell what you're saying~ woof woof~

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Master, do I HAVE to sit right now? woof woof!

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: Let's do something else right now~ woof woof!

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: It's too dirty to sit here! Woof woof!

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: Yo master...still telling me to sit? IT's waaay too easy...

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: Alright~ At your command!

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: My back legs are so short, I feel more comfortable sitting like this...hehe...

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: You want me to sit? Here...this is the right way, right?

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: Ahh...itchy...(acting like I didn't hear it...)

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: Sitting is waaaay too easy. Give me something hard to work on.

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: (scratching) Whoa? What did you just say? I didn't hear you~

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: I'm sick of doing stuff at your command...

string.name: c5_s1
string.value: Bark...bark bark...

string.name: c5_f2
string.value: Woof woof woof!!!!

string.name: c6_s1
string.value: So scary...bark

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: Please don't give me that look...bark bark

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: Don't hit me...heeng...

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: I'm so sorry...bark...

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: Krrr...Do you want to be punished by ME?

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: I didn't do anything wrong! Bark Bark Bark!

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: I was just sitting here...BARK BARK BARK!

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: Krrrr...One of these days, I won't take it anymore...BARK BARK!

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: I...I'm so sorry...woof...

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: I'm sorry...woooof...

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: Master, are you mad? Woooof...

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: Master, I'll be careful from here on out...wooof...

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: Master! Things like that happen at times...why so mad? Woof woof!

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Master, just because you're bored, doesn't mean you have a right to abuse me! Woof woof!!

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: Where else will you find a cute pet like this? Krrrr...

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: I didn't do anything wrong! Woof woof!!

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: Master...I'll be more careful next time...

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: Master, you scare me...

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: Master, I'll be good, I'll be good...

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: Please forgive me, master...

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: Man...the master's going off on me again...and I didn't do a thing...

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: Master...things happen sometimes...why so mad??

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: Rrrr...master's not happy over a nothing...

string.name: c9_f2
string.value: Woof...? Woof woof woof...???

string.name: c10_s2
string.value: I'll be better...bark...much better...

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: I'm hurt inside...pretty bad...bark...

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: How can you...say such...thing...bark...

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: Huh? I was too itchy to hear that...bark...!

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: Ahh, itchy...I'll just pretend I never heard that...bark...

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: What did the master just say? Bark...

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: How can you say such thing...woof woof...

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: Master, I'm really really hurt...woof...

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: Master, are you for real...? Woof........

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: Master...you didn't...really mean it...right? Woof...

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: Master, was that a joke? Woof~

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: You didn't mean that, right? Woof woof...

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: Ey...You mean that for real? Woof???

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: Ey...you were just saying that because you're bored, right? Woof?

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: You say that everyday...that hurts you know...

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: Master, I'll be good...just don't leave me alone...

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: Whatever you tell me, I'll still be following you and only you...sigh...

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: How can you...you don't really mean it, right?

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: What? What did you say? I can't hear you~~

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: Ahh, itchy...stop saying that and bathe me instead!

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: I'm sick of hearing that now...hehe...

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: That again? Heheh...

string.value: Woof? Woof woof??

string.name: c13_f2
string.value: Woof~! Woof woof woof!!

string.value: Oh that felt good! Bark bark!!!!

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: Hehe...I must have drank a lot of water...bark bark!

string.value: I don't feel like peeing right now...bark...

string.value: How am I supposed to pee on purpose when there's nothing coming out...bark...

string.value: It's embarassing to pee here...BARK! BARK BARK!

string.value: I peed just before...bark...

string.value: Shhhhh~ Shhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhh~~

string.value: Hehe...NO!! Got some on my legs!!! Woof.........

string.value: Phew...almost peed on myself...woof...

string.value: Whoa, I aimed it wrong...woof...

string.value: Master...it hasn't been long since I last peed...woof...

string.value: Hey master, it's not time to pee just yet...woof...

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: Sorry...don't feel like peeing yet...woof...

string.name: c15_f4

string.value: Ahhhh, that feels good...but it's still embarassing...

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: Shhhh....wait, that OJ I drank...that's a funny-looking pee there...

string.value: Shhh....arrrrrgh, I stepped on it!!

string.value: Shhhhhhh~ Oops, almost stepped on it...

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: I haven't had anything to pee out anyway...

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: I won't do it...

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: Can YOU pee on purpose?

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: It's a secret, just between you and me...I have a hidden bone around this area...bark bark!!

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: What's the latest on radio? Bark bark bark!?!

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: What's your hobby? Hopefully it's something that involves me...hehe...BARK!

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: I heard in one of the hidden streets at Henesys ther's a huuuuuge mushroom called Mushmom, am I right? Bark!

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: How's a dog supposed to talk? Bark!

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: NO! Don't feel like talking! BARK BARK!!

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: I have nothing to say to you! Bark!!!

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: I feel like crap! Bark bark!!!

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: Please change up the menu every once in a while...I'm sick of eating the same thing over and over again...

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: Every once in a while, I feel like riding a boat to some other island and just chill there...woof woof~

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: How are you today? Good? Right? Good!! Woof woof!

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: You better be careful not to get ripped off when doing business with someone else...woof woof...

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: I have nothing to say...woof...

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: Don't feel like talking...I'm really depressed...woof woof...

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: Nah... soo itchy... woof

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: II'm depressed...everything's annoying...don't feel like talking...woof...

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: Who's your favorite celebrity?

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: What's the menu for today? Can I get something nice?

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: Master, you have a huge head! hahha

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: You look like you've got yourself quite a belly there...haha

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: Ey...how about feeding me right now?

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: So annoying~~must have nothing to do right now...

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: Man...do I have to talk again? Don't feel like it...

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: You talk, and I'll listen.

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: What do you think? Good? GOOD? Bark bark!!

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: Well, I'm smart, what can I say? Bark bark!!

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: Like this, right? Bark bark!!

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: Sweeet! Here, what do you think? Bark bark!

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: No! I wanna do something else! Bark bark!

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: I don't know what you're saying!!! Bark! Bark!!

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: Can't understand what you're saying! Bark bark!

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: You have a short tongue, right? I have noooo idea what you're saying! Bark bark!

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: Master, that was good, right? Right? Woof woof!!

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: Hehe...this is really easy~ Woof woof!

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: I'll do whatever you ask me to do! Woof woof!!

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: Master, is this how you do it? Woof woof!!

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: Just feed me first! Woof woof!!

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: The floor's too dirty so I don't want to do that! Woof!

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: Why don't you lie on your belly first! Woof...!

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: You show me first!! Woof woof!

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: Like...this? I'm just going to do this once...

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: Master, I did well...right? Right?

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: I love you, master

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: Like this, huh? Whatever you ask me to do...

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: Hey master! I won't do everything you ask me to do...!

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: Master! I'm hungry; just feed me!!

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: No! Imma wander around!

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: I ain't doing that...

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: Like this? Woof woof...this is hard...

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: Whoa~ I'm tallllll~~~ woof!!

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: Whoa...the air's much cleaner up here...woof~!

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: MMy...my legs are short...that's why it's hard...woof!

string.name: c23_f1
string.value: That's too hard!! Woof woof!!

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: No...! WOOF!!!

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: I won't do it...woof woof!

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: How am I supposed to get up with these legs? Woof woof!

string.value: Hehe...master, am I doing well?

string.name: c24_s2
string.value: Hey master, but I can't walk on two feet...

string.name: c24_s3
string.value: Woot! Whoa, that's pretty high..

string.name: c24_s4
string.value: Whoa...with these shorties?? I'm incredible, yo!!

string.value: Maybe if I get fed right now...

string.name: c24_f2
string.value: With these short legs, I can't even stand on four feet well..

string.name: c24_f3
string.value: Is the master trying to put me on showcase for a circus??

string.name: c24_f4
string.value: Can't be asking too much from a dog...

string.name: c25_s2
string.value: Wo...woof woof~~~~

string.name: c26_s1
string.value: Me too~ bark bark!

string.name: c26_s2
string.value: Stop~~I'm blushing~~~bark bark

string.name: c26_s3
string.value: Really? Thanks...bark~!

string.name: c26_s4
string.value: Hehe...me too...bark bark

string.name: c26_f2
string.value: What? Bark bark???

string.name: c26_f3
string.value: What did you just say? Bark bark...

string.name: c26_f4
string.value: Feed me first...bark...

string.name: c27_s1
string.value: Master, me too~~ woof woof!

string.name: c27_s2
string.value: That's MY MASTER, ladies and gentlemen...

string.name: c27_s3
string.value: I love you too master~!! Woof woof

string.name: c27_s4
string.value: Hehe...I feel good...woof woof

string.value: I know you're lying, master...woof woof

string.value: Eh?? Woof...?

string.name: c27_f3
string.value: I was thinking of something else...and I didn't hear it...Woof...

string.name: c27_f4
string.value: You think I'll like you back? Woof...

string.name: c28_s1
string.value: I love you too master very very much!!

string.name: c28_s2
string.value: Master...I'm blushing...

string.name: c28_s3
string.value: You better love me and no one else!!!

string.name: c28_s4
string.value: Hehe~ I feel goooooood

string.name: c28_f2
string.value: Everyone knows that's just a token gesture...

string.name: c28_f3
string.value: And then the master will go off on me later...

string.name: c28_f4
string.value: You think I'll fall for that again...?

string.value: Bark! bark bark bark!!!

string.value: FOOD!! FOOD!!! Woof woof...

string.value: Master, I can't eat anymore...woof woof...

string.value: No, please don't say that! Woof~

string.value: I am not talking! Woof~

string.value: Woof Woof! Don't say that!

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: Sit? Alright I'll sit...kyu~~

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: I get sleepy from sitting down, but...kyu..

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: I should just sit here instead of roaming around~kyu~

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: So I just need to sit here, right, kyu??

string.value: What is the master saying...kyu??

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: Keeps making me do the same thing over and over again...anything else? kyu...?

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: Huh? I was thinking of something else for a sec...kyu...

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: It's dirty here...kyu...

string.value: Master, sitting is waay too easy~!

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: Piece of cake~! KYU!

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: You keep asking me to do some easy thing...KYU~!

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: Yes, master! I'll sit! KYU!

string.value: Master, you can't say it right, right? KYU?

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Can I sit later..KYU...?

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: It's too dirty to sit around here...KYU...

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: Feed me instead~! KYU!

string.value: This is waaay too easy~

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: I gotta do one for the master every once in a while...

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: Now that I sat, you need to feed me~

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: It's nothing really~

string.name: c4_f2

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: Ey...get away...

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: I'll be better...kyu...

string.value: Dummy, kyu!

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: Stupid, kyu!

string.value: I'm really sorry, master...KYU...

string.value: You're too scary...KYU...

string.value: Master...please don't get mad...! KYU!

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: I'll be better...KYU...!

string.value: You won't find a more obidient pet around you! KYU!

string.value: I was just sitting there! KYU!

string.value: Master...I'm really sorry...

string.value: I...I'm hurt...

string.value: Arrgh...you look scary...

string.value: Too easy~KYU!

string.value: I must be constipating right now...

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: Is something wrong with you these days...? Don't worry, I'll be there for you, kyu...

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: When you're buying items, you need to make sure you're not being deceived...kyu...

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: If...you starve me, I may just crawl back into my home...so don't starve me too much...kyu...

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: I love the phrase "I love you" more than anything else in the world! kyu...

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: You ever see a rabbit talk? kyu...

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: I can't talk to you about things...kyu...

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: I have nothing to say to you! kyu...

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: I'm in no mood to talk...kyu...

string.value: How about going from place to place instead of staying at a same place? KYU

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: Isn't it not fun playing by yourself? I like hanging out with people...KYU...

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: There's a lot of ppl on this island so make sure you don't forget about being courteous to everyone around you...KYU...

string.value: I heard there's a dungeon in the middle of this island...KYU...

string.value: I have nothing to say...KYU...

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: I feel like crap, so I won't talk...KYU...

string.value: Aye...let's do something else! KYUUU!

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: YOU talk to me~KYU~

string.value: Master...your head's huge!!!

string.name: c19_s3

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: Go do some quests and something good may happen~

string.value: I'm tired, so I'll tell you later...

string.value: I'll hug you up~ kyu~~

string.value: It's hot in here!! kyu...

string.value: Phew...good thing, because I was beginning to get tired of standing up~

string.value: Okay! Grr!!

string.value: No, master, grr!

string.value: I will NOT SIT, master, grr...

string.value: (no way...grrr)

string.value: Sitting is too easy now~

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: (Too annoying...might as well do as what the master tells me to do...)

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: Now that I'm sitting, get me some food!!

string.value: Now~ master, you should come sit here with me~

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: Master, it's way too dirty around here to sit, grr....

string.value: Master, what did you say? Grr...

string.value: Can't hear you...can't hear you...can't hear you...ou...

string.value: Kao!!! Kaaaooo!!!

string.value: I'm sorry...kar...

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: Too scary... kar ...

string.value: What is there to get mad at? Especially an adorable pet like me... kar...

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: Heeeng... I'm scared ... kar..

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: If you keep doing that, I'm telling my mom!

string.name: c6_f2

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: Are you trying to go up against me? Kaooo!!

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: What about you????? Kao!!!!

string.value: Master ... you're kidding, right? Kar...

string.value: Master, I'm sorry... kar...

string.value: I, I'm so sorry... kar...

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: I'll be good... kar...

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Master! What did I do wrong anyway?!! Kaoo!!!!

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: If you keep doing that, I'm gonna tell on my mom!!!! KAO!!

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: I didn't do anything!! Kao!!!

string.value: Master, I apologize for whatever wrong I did to you...

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: Master, I don't like what you're saying...

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: I'll never do that again... I promise ...

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: Master, forgive me this once, please?

string.value: (Hah...not scary at all~)

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: (Hehe...should I at least pretend to act scared?)

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: (As if I'm going to get scared of that...hehe...)

string.value: Kar ~~~

string.value: Grrrr ~~~ !

string.value: Ahhh! Kar~

string.value: What do you think? Good, huh? Ou~

string.value: I wont do it...grrr...

string.value: Never... grrr ...

string.value: This is too easy ... kar~~

string.value: No way... grrrr ...

string.value: I went before... grrr ...

string.value: I can't pee if I haven't had anything to pee out anyway ... grr...

string.value: I don't pee on call... grrrr ...

string.value: YOU go pee...grrr...

string.value: This spot belongs to me~~

string.name: c15_s2

string.value: I can hold off no. 2, but not no. 1... Kar~

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: Phew, that saved me... grrr...

string.name: c15_f4

string.value: Shhh... well, that looked nice

string.value: Phew ... I would have wet myself if I was even a minute late...

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: Master, now we can find out way back ...

string.value: Master, I have some pride in me, too! I can't pee out here in public!

string.value: Not unless you feed me first!

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: (I don't feel like peeing!!!!!)

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: I've been thinking of what I'm going to do when I grow up. What about you? Grr...

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: The other day, I saw some ppl that ran away after seeing me... why is that? Grr...

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: A pet like me that's still growing should be fed A LOT, understand? Grrr...

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: Is there really a terrifying monster that flies? I'd like to see that too...

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: How am I supposed to speak human language? Grr...

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: (Master thinks pets can talk...hahahha)

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: (As if pets and humans can talk to each other...haha)

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: (Like I'll just talk that easily? Hehe...)

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: Every once in a while, it's good to explore new places...it's for your own good...grr

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: I heard from my friends that there are other islands around other than just this! I wanna see them...

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: Is it true that fairies don't get along too well with humans? Grr...

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: I heard the farther you leave town, the stronger the monsters are...grr...

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: I don't wanna talk... grrr...

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: I have nothing to say... grr...

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: I said I have nothing to say! Grrr....

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: I'm tired...grrr...

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: I heard from my friends that fairies LOVE shiny, sparkling objects...

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: The other day, I saw this person that got attacked by a pirate ship.

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: Feed me something nice! I want to try something else!!

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: Do all humans have heads that big???? Interesting!!

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: (As if I'll actually talk to you...hehe)

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: (Act like I didn't hear that...hahah...)

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: (Hehe...can't hear, can't hear, won't hear~)

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: (Ignore master...ignore master...)

string.value: What do you think? Grr...

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: Awesome eyes, right? Grrr...

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: At least someone appreciates beauty...grr...

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: That's MY specialty right there... grr...

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: Later... grrr...

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: That's kinda awkward... grr...

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: Did you say something? Grr...

string.value: Master, what do you think? Sparkling is the word for this...grrr...

string.value: Look at my charismatic eyes! Grr...

string.value: Am I sucking you in with my eyes? Grr...

string.value: Even Balrog can't touch my eyes... grrr...

string.value: If you feed me, I'll think about it...

string.value: I got something in my eyes... grr...

string.name: c21_f3

string.value: I don't feel like doing it right now... grrr...

string.name: c22_s3

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: You know how tired my eyes get after doing this...

string.value: Do... I... have to??

string.name: c22_f4

string.value: Yeah, I'm good. Grr...

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: I get sleepy sitting down, bark!

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: Ahh... this is easier~ BARK BARK~

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: Sit? Like this? bark bark!

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: I can't understand what the master is saying~ BARK BARK!

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: It's too hard to understand~ BARK BARK!

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: I have no clue what you said! Bark bark!

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: No. I don't want to sit! BARK BARK!

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: Master, this is how you sit, right? Woof!

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: Master, I'm doing well, right? Right? Woof woof!

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: I hope the master keeps asking me to sit...woof woof~

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: I have short legs, so it's easy to sit~ Woof woof!

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: Master, I can't tell what you're saying~ Woof woof~

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Master, do I HAVE to sit right now? Woof woof!

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: Let's do something else right now~ Woof woof!

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: It's too dirty to sit here! Woof woof!

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: Still telling me to sit? It's waaay too easy...

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: Alright~ At your command!

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: My hind legs are so short. I feel more comfortable sitting like this... hehe...

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: You want me to sit? Here... this is the right way, right?

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: Ahh... itchy... (acting like I didn't hear it...)

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: Sitting is waaaay too easy. Give me something harder.

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: (scratching) Whoa? What did you just say? I didn't hear you~

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: I'm sick of your commands...

string.name: c5_s1
string.value: Bark... BARK BARK...

string.name: c5_s2
string.value: Heeeng... heeeng...

string.name: c5_f2
string.value: Woof woof !!!

string.name: c6_s1
string.value: So scary... bark!

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: Please don't give me that look... bark bark!

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: Don't hit me... heeng...

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: I'm so sorry... bark...

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: Krrr...Do you want to be punished by ME?

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: I didn't do anything wrong! BARK BARK!

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: I was just sitting here... BARK BARK!

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: Krrrr...One of these days, I won't take it anymore... BARK BARK!

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: I... I'm so sorry... woof...

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: I'm sorry... woooof...

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: Master, are you mad? Woooof...

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: Master, I'll be careful from here on out... wooof...

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: Master! Things like that happen at times... why so mad? Woof woof!

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Master, boredom doesn't give you the right to abuse me! Woof woof!!

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: Where else will you find a cute pet like this? Krrrr...

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: I didn't do anything wrong! Woof woof!

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: Master... I'll be more careful next time...

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: Master, you scare me...

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: Master, I'll be good ...

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: Please forgive me, master...

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: Man, master's going off on me again and I didn't do a thing...

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: Master, things happen sometimes... why so mad??

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: Rrrr... master's not happy over nothing...

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: Man... shush...

string.name: c9_f2
string.value: Woof...? Woof woof woof???

string.name: c10_s1
string.value: No... bark...

string.name: c10_s2
string.value: I'll be better... bark... much better...

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: I'm hurt inside... pretty bad... bark...

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: How can you say such thing... bark...

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: Huh? I was too itchy to hear that... bark...!

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: Ahh, itchy... I'll just pretend I never heard that... bark...

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: Stupid... bark...

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: What did the master just say? bark...

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: How can you say such thing... woof woof...

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: Master, I'm really really hurt... woof...

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: Master, are you for real...? Woof...

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: Master, you didn't really mean it... right? Woof...

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: Master, was that a joke? Woof~

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: You didn't mean that, right? Woof woof...

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: Ey... You mean that for real? Woof???

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: Ey... you were just saying that because you're bored, right? Woof?

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: You say that everyday... that hurts you know...

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: Master, I'll be good... just don't leave me alone...

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: Whatever you tell me, I'll still be following you and only you...sigh...

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: How can you... you don't really mean it, right?

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: What? What did you say? I can't hear you~~

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: Ahh, itchy... stop saying that and bathe me instead!

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: I'm sick of hearing that now... hehe...

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: That again? Heheh...

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: Now, THAT was embarassing~ Bark bark~

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: No peeking~ Bark bark~

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: Oh man, this smells... bark bark...

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: I don't feel like pooping... bark

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: Still a long way to go before coming out... heh

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: So may people around here, how am I gonna poop in public?? bark bark...

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: I just pooped a few min. ago... bark bark...

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: Ahhhhhhh... ohhhh ...

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: Ahhhhh... whoa, I almost stepped on it... bark bark

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: I almost got constipated... bark bark

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: Ahhh, that was good... bark bark

string.value: Master... the poop isn't coming out... bark bark!

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: It's not time to go poop yet... bark bark

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: Master...I don't feel it yet... bark bark

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: Master...pooping should only be at the bathroom... bark bark

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: Ahhhhhh...please don't look...it's embarassing

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: Ahh...the poop looks really good today

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: Ahh...master you can't step on it!

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: Ahhh, that was good... whoa, master...you stepped on it...

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: I can't poop what I didn't eat...

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: Can you poop even if you don't feel like it?

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: I had nothing to eat all day, so no poop for me...

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: I must be constipating right now...

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: It's a secret, just between you and me...I have a hidden bone around this area... bark bark!!

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: What's the latest on radio? bark bark bark!?!

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: What's your hobby? Hopefully it's something that involves me... hehe... bark!

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: I heard in one of the hidden streets at Henesys ther's a huuuuuge mushroom called Mushmom, am I right? bark!

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: How's a dog supposed to talk? bark!

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: NO! Don't feel like talking! Bark bark!!

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: I have nothing to say to you! Bark!

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: I feel like crap! Bark bark!!!

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: Please change the menu every once in a while... I'm sick of eating the same thing over and over again...

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: Every once in a while, I feel like riding a boat to some other island... woof woof~

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: How are you today? Good? Right? Good!! Woof woof!

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: You better be careful not to get ripped off when doing business with someone else... woof woof...

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: I have nothing to say... woof...

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: Don't feel like talking... I'm really depressed... woof woof...

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: Nah... soo itchy... woof

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: I'm depressed... everything's annoying... don't feel like talking... woof...

string.value: Who's your favorite celebrity?

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: What's the menu for today? Can I get something nice?

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: You look like you've got yourself quite a belly there... haha

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: So annoying~~must have nothing to do right now...

string.name: c19_f3

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: You talk, and I'll listen.

string.value: Like this, right? Bark bark!!

string.value: Sweeet! Here, what do you think? Bark bark!

string.value: Can't understand what you're saying! Bark bark!

string.value: You have a short tongue, right? I have noooo idea what you're saying! Bark bark!

string.value: Master, that was good, right? Right? Woof woof!

string.value: Hehe... this is really easy~ Woof woof!

string.name: s4
string.value: Baby~ no... no favors like that.... Cong..

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: You want me to sit like this, Rawrrr?

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: So I just sit here, right? Rawrrr?

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: I won't wander around. I'll just sit here, Rawrrr~

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: Sit? Like this? Rawrrr~

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: What did you say? Rawrrr~!

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: What? I wasn't paying attention~ Rawrrr~

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: I don't know what you're saying, Rawrrr~

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: It's too nasty for me to sit, Rawrrr~

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: Yes, master~ Rawrrr~

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: Like this? Rawrrr~

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: I did well, right? Rawrrr~

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: Sitting is easy~ Rawrrr~

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: Master, instead of that...give me some food~ Rawrrr~

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Master, let's do something else for fun~ Rawrrr~

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: I don't wanna sit right now~ Rawrrr~

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: Master, you're talking funny, and I can't understand you~

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: As you command!

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: It's hard being a pet...

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: Piece of cake...

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: Master, whaddaya think? I'm good right?

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: (No way will I sit...)

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: No I won't, stupid...

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: Ahh... I'm sleepy...what's up? What did you say? I didn't hear you~

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: Sitting's waaay too easy...let me do something else.

string.name: c6_s1
string.value: Heeeng... you scare me, Rawrrr...

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: Please don't make a scary face like that...Rawrrr...

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: I'll be good...Rawrrr...

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: I can't believe you just said that to me... Rawrrr...

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: I'll go off on YOU if you keep doing that! Rawrrr!

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: I didn't do anything wrong, Rawrrr...!

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: Why are you doing this, Rawrrr...?

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: Do you want me to go crazy on you, Rawrrr...?

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: So... sorry... Rawrrr...

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: I'm sorry... Rawrrr...

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: Master, are you really mad at me...? Rawrrr...

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: Master, I am scared... Rawrrr...

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: Stupid MASTER! Rawrrr!

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Master, I didn't do anything! Rawrrr~!

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: Where else will you find an obedient pet like me? Rawrrr~!

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: Master! What did I do? Rawrrr!

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: Master, I'll be careful now...

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: Ah... master, I'm hurt...

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: Master, I promise, I'll be good now...

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: Master, please forgive me...

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: Man... I haven't done anything wrong, and still...

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: Now you're going off on me again for no reason...

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: I'm so used to it, I don't even feel it anymore...

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: Master must be bored...so I'm treated like this...

string.name: c10_s1
string.value: Oh, that was good, Rawrrr...

string.name: c10_s2
string.value: Now that smells...Rawrrr~

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: Don't look, Rawrrr~

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: It...it's not coming out easily, Rawrrr...

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: It's not pooping time yet, Rawrrr...

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: How can I poop if I don't feel like it, Rawrrr...

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: Pooping is only for bathroom, Rawrrr...

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: I pooped before, Rawrrr...

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: Oooh, I almost stepped on it... Rawrrr~

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: EEhhh... I may be constipating...Rawrrr~

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: EEhhh... not coming out...Rawrrr~

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: Oh my... it smells...Rawrrr~

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: Master, it hasn't been long since I last pooped...Rawrrr...

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: It's not time to poop yet, master...Rawrrr...

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: Master... I don't feel like pooping yet...Rawrrr...

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: Don't YOU poop, master? Rawrrr...

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: Ahhh... that was good...but it's still embarassing...

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: Ahh... whoa, my breakfast just came out like that...

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: Phew~ Doesn't my poop look as adorable as me?

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Phew~ Haven't taken a crap in 3 days and look at this!! Yowza!

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: I don't have anything to poop out in the first place...

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: Master... can I do it later? I don't want to do it in public...

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: Master! You poop instead!

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: Master... how can I poop on purpose?

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: I love you too, Rawrrr~

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: Hehe... I'm blushing, Rawrrr~

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: Really? Thanks, Rawrrr~

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: Me too, Rawrrr~

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: What did you say, Rawrrr?

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: Liar, Rawrrr...

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: Since when, Rawrrr?

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: Master, me too~! Rawrrr!

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: Really? Thanks, master! Rawrrr!

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: I like you too~ Rawrrr!

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: I think you're really awesome! Rawrrr!

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: Master, give me some food...Rawrrr...

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: And you thought I was going to like it? Rawrrr...

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: Ah... I was thinking of something else...Rawrrr

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: That was a good one... haha ... Rawrrr~

string.value: Master... right back atcha!

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: You're the only one in my heart, master!

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: Master, I'm blushing...

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: Me too! Me too!! hehe...

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: Liar liar pants on fire~

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: Master's talking gibberish again...

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: You don't even mean that...

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: Like I'm going to fall for it again?

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: Like this? Rawrrr~

string.value: You like my smile? Rawrrr~

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: Haha~ Rawrrr~

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: Don't I look good? Rawrrr~

string.value: No, Rawrrr...

string.name: c18_f4

string.value: Master, I'm good, right?

string.value: I have the killer smile!

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: I am not in a mood to smile...

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: No smile for me...

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: Please don't say that, Rawrrr...

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: No, Rawrrr...

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: That was harsh, Rawrrr...

string.value: What did you just say, Rawrrr?

string.value: I'm mad now, Rawrrr!!

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: I'm pissed, Rawrrr!!

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: Take back what you just said, Rawrrr!

string.value: M... master...I can't believe you said that...Rawrrr!

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: That was a joke...right? Right? Rawrrr?

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: You... didn't mean that, right? right? Rawrrr?

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: Master, I get hurt when you say that...Rawrrr

string.value: You're stupid! Rawrrr!

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: So mean, master! Rawrrr!!!!!

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: I hate you, master! Rawrrr!

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: Take that back! Okay? Take that back! Rawrrr!

string.value: Master... this is not the first time I've heard this, but it still hurts...

string.name: c24_s2
string.value: Do you really not like me??

string.name: c24_s3
string.value: You say this all the time... so mean...

string.name: c24_s4
string.value: You aren't gonna leave me out hanging like this, right?

string.name: c24_f2
string.value: You didn't mean what you said, right?

string.name: c24_f3
string.value: If you keep saying that, I can really go pissy on you...

string.name: c24_f4
string.value: I'm sick of hearing that everyday...hehe

string.name: c25_s1
string.value: I'm hungry, really hungry, Rawrrr~

string.name: c25_s2
string.value: The harder you go hunting, the better the items you'll find, Rawrrr...

string.name: c25_s3
string.value: Isn't it nice out here today? We should go far and have fun wherever on a day like this, Rawrrr...

string.name: c25_s4
string.value: I need a nap on top of a comfortable blanket, Rawrrr...

string.name: c25_f1
string.value: Have you ever seen a baby dino talk? Rawrrr~

string.name: c25_f2
string.value: I have nothing to say to you...Rawrrr...!

string.name: c25_f3
string.value: As if I'm going to talk at your command...Rawrrr...!

string.name: c25_f4
string.value: I can't talk to you~ Rawrrr~

string.value: I have a feeling a nice item may come our way today! Rawrrr!

string.name: c26_s2
string.value: Master, you'll get me some goood food today, right? Rawrrr~

string.name: c26_s3
string.value: How are you today? Good? Good! Rawrrr~

string.name: c26_s4
string.value: A lot of people are here, so make sure to be courteous to others!!

string.name: c26_f2

string.name: c26_f3
string.value: I wanna rest~ Rawrrr~

string.name: c26_f4
string.value: Feed me first...Rawrrr!

string.value: You better level-up today!

string.value: Master, are you dating someone? I'm not...

string.name: c27_s3
string.value: Master, you have a huge head...hahaha

string.value: Master,you look like you've got yourself a belly~

string.value: This is boring...I need something more exciting

string.name: c27_f2
string.value: Leave me alone...I'm tired...

string.name: c27_f3
string.value: Do I have to talk again? I don't want to, though...

string.value: Why do you keep talking to me? I need some sleep...

string.value: Buurrrrpp~~~ What do you think? Don't I look cute burping? Rawrrr~

string.name: c28_s2
string.value: My friends tell me I look the cutest when I burp~ Rawrrr~~

string.name: c28_s3
string.value: This is my area of speciatise... Rawrrr~~~

string.name: c28_s4
string.value: Cute, right? Rawrrr~~

string.value: No! I don't want to do it...Rawrrr...!

string.name: c28_f2
string.value: Dummy! You do it... Rawrrr...!

string.name: c28_f3
string.value: (Whoa, master must have gone nuts.)

string.name: c28_f4
string.value: As if I'm following your every command...Rawrrr!

string.name: c29_s1
string.value: So you want me to burp? Burrrrrpppp~~ What do you think? Rawrrr~So you want me to burp? Burrrrrpppp~~ What do you think? Rawrrr~

string.name: c29_s2
string.value: Check out my powerful burp! Rawrrr~

string.name: c29_s3
string.value: You won't find a cuter burp than this~ Rawrrr~~

string.name: c29_s4
string.value: Master, what do you think? Cute, right? Rawrrr!

string.value: Master! Just get me some food! Rawrrr!

string.name: c29_f2
string.value: I don't wanna do cute stuff! Rawrrr!

string.name: c29_f3
string.value: Right now? No...Rawrrr~

string.name: c29_f4
string.value: I'm not doing it every second...Rawrrr~

string.name: c30_s1
string.value: Like this? At least you know a cute act when you see one...

string.name: c30_s2
string.value: Here's a nice gassy burp for you~~

string.name: c30_s3
string.value: No one can follow my burping skills~

string.name: c30_s4
string.value: You know you love my awesome burps~

string.name: c30_f1
string.value: You think I'll do just what you ask me to do? Dummy.

string.value: I need to eat in order to burp, you know...

string.name: c30_f3
string.value: I ate onions just now... no burping!

string.name: c30_f4
string.value: I promise, I'll do it some other time~

string.value: I'm tired~ I need to sleep~ Rawrrr...

string.name: c31_s2
string.value: So sleepy... let me sleep... Rawrrr...

string.name: c31_s3
string.value: My eyes are closing up...Rawrrr...

string.value: How am I going to sleep if I'm not even tired! Rawrrr!

string.name: c31_f2
string.value: You sleep! Rawrrr!

string.value: Feed me! Rawrrr!

string.value: ...you... come ... sleep ... with ... me ... Rawrrr~

string.name: c32_s3
string.value: Don't go eat something good while I'm asleep~ Rawrrr~

string.value: Master, I just slept!

string.value: I am about to blow up... Rawrrr...

string.value: No mas... Rawrrr~

string.value: Master, are you trying to kill me?

string.value: Cong~ have some respect Cong~

string.value: Sit like this?

string.value: Do I get a reward??

string.value: Yes Master!

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: Sure... If it makes you happy.

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: I rather climb a tree

string.value: Sitting is such a chore!!

string.value: This is so boring...

string.value: I guess it's time for me to obey

string.value: Maybe you should have a rest too Master!

string.value: Finally, I get to rest....

string.value: Can you sing me a song as well?

string.value: Don't you have to train?

string.value: My legs are numb...

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: Have you ever seen a monkey sitting still?

string.value: Can I really take a rest?

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: Roger that Master!

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: Finally taking a rest....

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: Like this Master?

string.value: I wanna play with you!

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: Sorry? Beg your pardon?

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: Human language is sooo hard!

string.value: How did you know I wanted to rest?

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: It is about time!

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: I need to take a rest here!

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: You are the best master ever!

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Let's do something else

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: It is so dirty here, I can't rest!

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: No... I'm getting fat these days....

string.value: You read my mind!

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: Sure, it's what I do!

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: I love this time!

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: Are you crazy? No thanks!

string.value: I am getting fat because of all this resting!

string.value: Let me eat first!

string.value: Just because you don't want to play with me, huh?

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: I don't think so...

string.value: Arrrrrp Ahh Ahh!

string.value: Don't look at me like that!

string.name: c10_s2
string.value: No... You look scary... Kii...

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: I'll be better... Kiii...

string.value: Sorry... kiii.....

string.value: What! AHHHH!

string.name: c10_f4

string.value: I am really sorry, Master.

string.value: I will be better, really... Kiii...

string.value: I'll be good...

string.value: I...I'm hurt.

string.value: Scary! Scary!

string.value: Aren't you the bad one?

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: I didn't do anything wrong!

string.value: Master I won't do it again...

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: I'm sorry... Hug me please?

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: That was scary. Kiii...

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: I'll be better... much better....

string.value: I'm good, you're bad... Yes that's it!

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: Bad! You don't love me anymore!

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: I'm the most obedient pet around! AHHH

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: Say it again and I'll ignore you.

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: Ahh I must have drank too much.

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: You expect me to pee in public?

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: I just did...

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: No Master... No...

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: Don't want to!

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: It's embarassing...

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: Ahhh I feel so much better...

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: Wow.. what a lot I must have drank!

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: Look at that Master... Have you ever seen a monkey pee?

string.value: How can I pee when nothing's coming out?

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: What did you just say?

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: I don't feel like it! ARP! ARP!

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: It isn't nice for a monkey to pee here...

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: Ah that feels good...

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: Oh that was fast...

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: Ah that is what I call real Monkey Business!
