string.value: How am I supposed to pee when you didn't even feed me?

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: The toilet isn't here Master...

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: Why don't you pee in public too?

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: Don't you have anything better to do than asking me to pee the whole day?

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: ARP!! ARP!!

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: Me too!

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: That's nice of you...

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: Wow really? Thanks!

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: Yeah right....

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: Feed me first.

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: Me ear feels a little itchy here...

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: I can't hear yooooooooo...

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: I love you too Master.. kiiii...

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: Hmm, Master you're so nice to me!

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: I feel nice and warm inside!

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: I love you too! Give me a hug!

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: Are you sure Master?

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: That was a typo right?

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: I'm sure you don't! ARP!

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: You're referring to somebody else, right?

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: You're the best Master a monkey can have!

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: I love you too! What about going for a hunt together?

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: Keep loving me!

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: I'm such a lucky monkey to have you as my Master

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: It is bad to tell lies Master, Please don't.

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: I love bananas more than I love you!

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: Are you sure? You haven't hugged me for ages!

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: I'm sure you love your new weapon more! ARP!

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: This is easy!

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: Yay, I can stand!

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: What did you just say?

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: Don't feel like it! ARP!

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: What? Sit?

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: I'm standing... Aren't I?

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: Look! I'm standing!

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: Master aren't I good?

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: I love standing, do you?

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: I can stand! I can stand!

string.name: c23_f1
string.value: No food, no stand!

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: Huh? My ear feels a liitle itchy here...

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: Stand? Strand? Stan?

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: I'll stand if you feed me!

string.name: c24_s1
string.value: Have you ever seen a monkey standing so straight?

string.name: c24_s2
string.value: Look Master! Aren't I good at this?

string.name: c24_s3
string.value: Up! I'm standing UP!

string.name: c24_s4
string.value: I did it! Master! I'm standing!

string.name: c24_f1
string.value: I'd rather climb a tree!

string.name: c24_f2
string.value: Can't you see I'm already standing?

string.name: c24_f3
string.value: Monkeys don't stand... we swing!

string.name: c24_f4
string.value: I'm tired running after you! I don't want to stand!

string.name: c25_s1
string.value: Look master, do you see a banana there?

string.name: c25_s2
string.value: I love the way you talk to me.

string.name: c25_s3
string.value: I love bananas! Do feed me more of those!

string.name: c25_s4
string.value: I love you Master! Do you love me too?

string.name: c25_f1
string.value: NO! Don't feel like talking!

string.name: c25_f2
string.value: What do you expect me to say?

string.name: c25_f3
string.value: I'm hungry.

string.name: c25_f4
string.value: I want to sleep instead...

string.name: c26_s1
string.value: Instead of killing monsters, you can do quests to level up too!

string.name: c26_s2
string.value: Monkeys love bananas! I bet you didn't know that.

string.name: c26_s3
string.value: I hate people who abuse their pets, don't you?

string.name: c26_s4
string.value: If you don't feed me, I'll go back home and not come out!

string.name: c26_f1
string.value: It is rude to wake a monkey from its sleep! ARP!

string.name: c26_f2
string.value: Talk talk talk.. I want to do something else.

string.name: c26_f3
string.value: Tell me honestly, have you ever heard a monkey speak?

string.name: c26_f4
string.value: I have nothing to say to you! ARP! ARP!

string.name: c27_s1
string.value: We pets are created by Cloy of Henesys.

string.name: c27_s2
string.value: If you don't feed me well, I'll just run away!

string.name: c27_s3
string.value: If you buy me a meso magnet and item pouch I can collect all your loot for you!

string.name: c27_s4
string.value: I won't live forever, so do treasure me when I'm around!

string.name: c27_f1
string.value: What do you expect me to tell you when I'm always following you around?

string.name: c27_f2
string.value: Don't you have any other things to do?

string.name: c27_f3
string.value: Why don't you ask my lupin brothers to talk to you instead?

string.name: c27_f4
string.value: Isn't it better for you to talk to your buddies instead?

string.name: c28_s1
string.value: Play with me! kiiii...

string.name: c28_s2
string.value: What shall we do?

string.name: c28_s3
string.value: Are you bored too?

string.name: c28_s4
string.value: Good to hear that!

string.name: c28_f1
string.value: What did you just say?

string.name: c28_f2
string.value: I am hungry

string.name: c28_f3
string.value: Play with yourself!

string.name: c28_f4
string.value: So annoying!

string.name: c29_s1
string.value: Wow really?

string.name: c29_s2
string.value: I've wanted to play with you all day long!

string.name: c29_s3
string.value: What do you want to do?

string.name: c29_s4
string.value: Let's have some fun!

string.name: c29_f1
string.value: Go somewhere else!

string.name: c29_f2
string.value: Can't you see I'm busy now?

string.name: c29_f3
string.value: Feed me first... then I will think about it!

string.name: c29_f4
string.value: Don't even want to move my tail...

string.name: c30_s1
string.value: I've been waitiing for you to say that!

string.name: c30_s2
string.value: You rock!

string.name: c30_s3
string.value: It's about time!

string.name: c30_s4
string.value: I'm thinking of how we are going to play Master!

string.name: c30_f1
string.value: Food! Food! Food! Food first!

string.name: c30_f2
string.value: We just did, didn't we?

string.name: c30_f3
string.value: What did you just say?

string.name: c30_f4
string.value: Well... I am sleepy now...

string.name: c31_s4
string.value: La la la la!

string.name: c31_f3
string.value: booooo

string.name: c32_s4
string.value: La la la la!

string.name: c32_f1
string.value: No Master, no....

string.name: c32_f2
string.value: What's so nice about my tongue!

string.name: c32_f3
string.value: It's tiring... I don't want to...

string.name: c32_f4
string.value: I'm not a dog! ARP!

string.name: c33_s4
string.value: blah blah blah

string.name: c33_f1
string.value: What do you want my tongue for?

string.name: c33_f2
string.value: It's rude to stick out one's tongue! Don't you know that?

string.name: c33_f3
string.value: Melong? No thanks...

string.name: c33_f4
string.value: Yucks! That's a disgusting habit you have master...

string.name: c34_s1
string.value: Hmmm... So comfortable!

string.name: c34_s3
string.value: Yawn... Sleepy sleepy!

string.name: c34_f1
string.value: Who sleeps in the middle of the day? Not me!

string.name: c34_f2
string.value: It's PLAYTIME!

string.name: c34_f3
string.value: How to sleep when I'm hungry?

string.name: c34_f4
string.value: Read me a story first?

string.name: c35_s1
string.value: Good night Master...

string.name: c35_s2
string.value: Yawn... Bedtime!

string.name: c35_s3
string.value: That was kind of you Master, I'm indeed tired!

string.name: c35_s4
string.value: Cuddle me!

string.name: c35_f1
string.value: Don't want to sleep! Let's climb trees instead?

string.name: c35_f2
string.value: I just woke up! ARP!

string.name: c35_f3
string.value: I'm not as lazy as you think Master...

string.name: c35_f4
string.value: If you aren't training, I am!

string.name: f1_s
string.value: kii! kii!

string.name: f2_s
string.value: Food... Food...

string.name: f2_f
string.value: I am so full!

string.name: f3_s
string.value: Master! This is so delicious!

string.name: f3_f
string.value: No more for me... too full!

string.name: f4_s
string.value: Master! I like this a lot!

string.name: f4_f
string.value: Master... are you trying to kill me?

string.name: s2
string.value: No, no, nope.

string.name: s3
string.value: I thought you were a good Master...

string.name: s4
string.value: Kii, I thought I told you, I am against those bad words.

string.name: c1_f1
string.value: KROWL? Kroowwwwlll?

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: You want me to sit, KROWL? Like this? Easy... KROWL

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: Like this, KROWL? Give me something harder, KROWL...

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: It's a piece of cake, KROWL.

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: Too easy, KROWL~

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: Give me something fun, KROWL~

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: I wanna do something else, KROWL~

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: It's too nasty for me to sit, KROWL~

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: I can't sit here, because someone peed the ground, KROWL~

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: Yes, master~ KROWL~

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: Like this? KROWL~

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: I did well, right? KROWL~

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: Sitting is easy~ KROWL~

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: Master, instead of that...give me some food~ KROWL~

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Master, let's do something else for fun~ KROWL~

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: I don't wanna sit right now~ KROWL~

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: Master, you're talking funny, and I can't understand you~

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: Just say it~

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: It's hard being a pet...

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: Piece of cake...

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: Master, whaddaya think? I'm good right?

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: Why don't YOU sit...hehe

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: Sitting's waaay too easy...let me do something else.

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: Ahh..I'm sleepy...what's up? What did you say? I didn't hear you~

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: Hehe...I was daydreaming, so I couldn't hear you...

string.name: c5_f2
string.value: Kao~! Kao~!

string.name: c6_s1
string.value: Heeeng...you scare me, KROWL...

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: That's not cool, KROWL...

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: Please don't make a scary face like that...KROWL...

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: That...that surprised me, KROWL...

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: What did I do wrong, KROWL?

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: You're just going off on me, KROWL...!

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: I didn't do anything wrong, KROWL...!

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: You're just doing this because you're bored, KROWL...!

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: Oh no, I'm sorry... KROWL ...

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: I'm sorry...KROWL...

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: Master, are you really mad at me...? KROWL...

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: Master...I won't do that again...KROWL...

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: What did I do anyway~! KROWL!

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Master that wasn't cool at all! KROWL~!

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: Where else will you find an obedient pet like me? KROWL~!

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: Master! If you keep doing that, I may one day get out of here! KROWL!

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: Master...I'll be careful now...

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: Ah...master, you're really scaring me...

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: Master...I'll be good now...

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: Master...please give me that scary face...

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: I didn't do anything wrong, though!

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: Master...things happen in life...

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: Man...going off on me again for no reason...

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: Master must be bored...so I'm treated like crap...

string.name: c9_f1
string.value: KROWL? Krowl??

string.name: c10_s1
string.value: Okay, that felt good, KROWL...

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: It's not coming out well, KROWL...

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: Oh...it smells, KROWL...

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: It's not pooping time yet, KROWL...

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: How can I poop if I don't feel like it, KROWL...

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: Pooping is only for bathroom, KROWL...

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: Hey, I pooped before, KROWL...

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: Phew~ KROWL~

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: Oh my...it smells...KROWL~

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: EEhhh...I may be constipating...KROWL~

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: EEhhh...not coming out...KROWL~

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: Master, it hasn't been long since I last pooped...KROWL...

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: It's not time to poop yet, master...KROWL...

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: Master...I don't feel like pooping yet...KROWL...

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: Don't YOU poop, master? KROWL...

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: Ahhh...that was good...but it's still embarassing...hehe

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: Ahh...whoa, my breakfast just came out like that...hehe

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: Phew~ Doesn't my poop look as adorable as me?

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Phew~ Haven't taken a crap in 3 days and look at this!! Yowza!

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: I haven't had anything to poop out in the first place...

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: Master...can I do it later in the dark? I don't wanna do it in public...

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: Master! YOU POOP

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: Master...how am I gonna crap on purpose??

string.name: c13_s2
string.value: KROWL~, KROWL~~~~

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: I love you too, KROWL~

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: Hehe...I'm blushing, KROWL~

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: Really? Thanks, KROWL~

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: Me too~

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: What did you say, KROWL?

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: What's up, KROWL?

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: Since when, KROWL?

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: Master, me too~! KROWL!

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: Really? Thanks, master! KROWL!

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: I like you too~ KROWL!

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: I like you very very much! KROWL!

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: Master, give me some food...KROWL...

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: ...? KROWL?

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: Ah...I was thinking of something else...KROWL

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: I know you're lying...KROWL...

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: Master...right back atcha!

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: You're the only one in my heart, master!

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: Me too! Me too!! hehe...

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: Aye...I'm blushing...

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: Liar~ Liar~

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: Master's talking gibberish again...

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: Don't be lying to me like that~!

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: Gimme some food already~

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: KROWL~, KROWL~~~~

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: I wanna do something fun.

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: I'm hungry!

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: I wanna do SOMETHING.

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: Let's just go hunting!

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: That sounds good! I felt like resting anyway~

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: Ahhhhh...that feels good.

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: Yawwwn ... I feel like going to bed.

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: It'd be nice to take a nap under the sun.

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: Ahhh, I told you I'm bored!

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: Can we please do SOMETHING?

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: I don't like being bored. Let's do something!

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: How about leveling up? Need my help?

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: Ooohhh... where's a nice comfy cushion when I need one?

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: Sounds like music to my ear. I needed some rest!

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: Come chill with me!!

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: No, play with me! Play with me!

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: I'm a lil hungry...

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: Resting is not an option!

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: Tell that to a lazy fat pig, not to a tiger like me!

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: I...I am not that, KROWL...

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: Please don't leave me, KROWL...

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: I don't like hearing that, KROWL...

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: That was harsh, KROWL...

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: Take back what you just said, KROWL!

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: I'm not that, KROWL!!

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: I'm pissed, KROWL!!

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: What are you saying, KROWL???

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: What? I can't believe you said that...KROWL!

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: Master, I'm hurt... KROWL

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: You were joking, right? Krowl...

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: Do you really mean that? KROWL?

string.name: c23_f1
string.value: You're stupid! KROWL!

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: Take back what you said! KROWL!!!!!

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: That hurts, master! KROWL!

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: Master, you're mean! KROWL!

string.name: c24_s1
string.value: I know you say this every now and then, but it still hurts...

string.name: c24_s2
string.value: You aren't gonna leave me out hanging like this, right?

string.name: c24_s3
string.value: I still like you though...

string.name: c24_s4
string.value: Do you really not like me??

string.name: c24_f1
string.value: Wah? What? I can't hear you~

string.name: c24_f2
string.value: You didn't mean what you said, right?

string.name: c24_f3
string.value: I'm sick of hearing that everyday...

string.name: c24_f4
string.value: The next time you say that, I may really flip out on you!

string.name: c25_s1
string.value: I'm hungry, hungry, KROWL~

string.name: c25_s2
string.value: The harder you go hunting, the better the items you'll find, KROWL...

string.name: c25_s3
string.value: Isn't it nice out here today? We should go far and have fun wherever on a day like this, KROWL...

string.name: c25_s4
string.value: I need a nap right now... KROWL...

string.name: c25_f1
string.value: Hey, tigers don't talk, KROWL~

string.name: c25_f2
string.value: I'm too depressed to talk right now, KROWL~

string.name: c25_f3
string.value: I have nothing to say to you...KROWL...!

string.name: c25_f4
string.value: How am I supposed to talk? I'm a tiger, KROWL!

string.name: c26_s1
string.value: It's awesome outside today~KROWL!

string.name: c26_s2
string.value: I have a feeling a nice item may come our way today! KROWL!

string.name: c26_s3
string.value: Master, you'll get me some goood food today, right? KROWL~

string.name: c26_s4
string.value: Let's go to the beach today! I wanna do something fun!!

string.name: c26_f1
string.value: I don't have anything to say...KROWL...

string.name: c26_f2
string.value: I wanna rest~KROWL~

string.name: c26_f3
string.value: I have little to say...KROWL...

string.name: c26_f4
string.value: Feel me first...KROWL!

string.name: c27_s1
string.value: Master, are you dating someone? I'm not...

string.name: c27_s2
string.value: Isn't Zakum easy?

string.name: c27_s3
string.value: You better level-up today!

string.name: c27_s4
string.value: How's Ludibrium? I heard that place is nice...

string.name: c27_f1
string.value: I'm hungry, why doncha just feed me?

string.name: c27_f2
string.value: You must be really really really bored...

string.name: c27_f3
string.value: I can't hear you~ I can't hear you~

string.name: c27_f4
string.value: I'm tired, and I don't feel like talking today.

string.name: c28_s1
string.value: My gosh, I feel ...really... sad right now.

string.name: c28_s2
string.value: Even I have to admit, THIS is a sad look...

string.name: c28_s3
string.value: So sad...

string.name: c28_f1
string.value: No way! I don't feel like doing it right now!

string.name: c28_f2
string.value: Why don't YOU do it, stupid!

string.name: c28_f3
string.value: Not in a mood!!

string.name: c28_f4
string.value: I can't concentrate!

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: I'm not in a good mood. Ru.

string.value: Will you show me the world? Ru!

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: Isn't it boring playing by yourself? I like hanging out with others. Ru.

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: Be nice to everyone around you, because people talk!

string.value: I heard there's this place called Happyville. Have you? Ru.

string.value: I have nothing to say, ru.

string.value: Ready for launch, master! Beep beep.

string.value: Get ready for my super arm extension. BEEP BEEP!

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: I'm ready to fire these missiles! BEEP BEEP!

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: I believe in peace, master. BEEP BEEP.

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: No, I don't feel like it. BEEP BEEP.

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: I'm running out of oil. Feed me first. BEEP BEEP.

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: Nah, I won't. BEEP BEEP.

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: I'm already in an attack mode! BEEP BEEP

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: What should I use? I've got a lot of weapons at my arsenal. Beep beep.

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: At your service, master. BEEP BEEP

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: I'm ready to fire these missiles! BEEP BEEP!

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: An error occurred while withdrawing the weapon. BEEP BEEP.

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: Not after the way you treated me last night. BEEP BEEP!

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: I think the nuts have come loose. Please tighten them for me. BEEP BEEP.

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: Who am I supposed to attack? BEEP BEEP.

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: Get ready for some butt-whopping.

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: I've been greased up just for this occasion. Bring it on!!

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: Snails don't scare me. I'm ready to back you up!

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: Only the robots are blessed with iron fists. These babies are ready for attack.

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: I don't feel like attacking anyone else. That's YOUR job!

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: Huh? What attack? What do you think I am, a rocket launcher or something?

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: I do not believe in violence. I CAN, however, give you some motivational speeches.

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: Um... I need to be refueled. Feed me first, then we'll talk.

string.value: BEEP BEEP~~

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: BEEP BEEP~, BEEP BEEP~~~~

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: BEEP BEEP?

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: I love you too, BEEP BEEP~

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: Hey, robots can blush, too! BEEP BEEP~

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: Really? Thanks, BEEP BEEP~

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: Me too~

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: What did you say, BEEP BEEP?

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: What's up, BEEP BEEP?

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: Since when, BEEP BEEP?

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: Master, me too~! BEEP BEEP!

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: Really? Thanks, master! BEEP BEEP!

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: I like you too~ BEEP BEEP!

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: I like you very very much! BEEP BEEP!

string.value: Master, give me some food...BEEP BEEP...

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: ...? BEEP BEEP?

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: Ah...I was thinking of something else...BEEP BEEP

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: I know you're lying...BEEP BEEP...

string.value: I love you too, master! Seriously!

string.name: c24_s2
string.value: You sure know how to warm a cold robotic heart!

string.name: c24_s3
string.value: The same goes to you too, master!

string.name: c24_s4
string.value: Even robots blush, you know.

string.value: Liar~ Liar~

string.name: c24_f2
string.value: Master needs to say the truth.

string.name: c24_f3
string.value: Don't lie to me! You can't love a robot!

string.name: c24_f4
string.value: If you love me, then feed me right now.

string.name: c25_s1
string.value: Like this? Cool! BEEP BEEP!

string.name: c25_s2
string.value: I know you like this. BEEP BEEP!

string.name: c25_s3
string.value: I know I know, robots can be beautiful, too. BEEP BEEP!

string.name: c25_s4
string.value: Looking good, right? What? You want an autograph? BEEP BEEP!

string.name: c25_f1
string.value: No way! I don't feel like doing it right now! BEEP BEEP

string.name: c25_f2
string.value: Show me how YOU do it, BEEP BEEP

string.value: And your point for me doing this is ... beep beep.

string.name: c25_f4
string.value: Nah, beep beep.

string.value: Master, what do you think? My eyes shall be called the twinkling stars... BEEP BEEPr...

string.name: c26_s2
string.value: Hello, I define charisma! Look, BEEP BEEP!

string.name: c26_s3
string.value: I know you can't resist these beautifyl eyes. BEEP BEEP...

string.name: c26_s4
string.value: Do you want a piercing look? This is just short of shooting laser beams...BEEP BEEP

string.name: c26_f1
string.value: If you feed me, I'll think about it...

string.name: c26_f2
string.value: Ouch, my eyes hurt. BEEP BEEP...

string.name: c26_f3
string.value: The sun's in my eye, and it doesn't feel good... BEEP BEEPr...

string.name: c26_f4
string.value: Can I do it later? BEEP BEEP...

string.value: Balrog has nothing on me...

string.name: c27_f4

string.name: c28_s2
string.value: If you defeat high-leveled monsters, you'll most likely be rewarded with a nice item, BEEP BEEP...

string.name: c28_s3
string.value: Isn't it nice out here today? We should go far and have fun wherever on a day like this, BEEP BEEP...

string.value: Master, can you grease me up a bit? I feel ... um ... stiff. BEEP BEEP.

string.value: Do you really think robots say anything other than BEEP BEEP?

string.name: c28_f2
string.value: I'm too depressed to talk right now, BEEP BEEP~

string.name: c28_f3
string.value: No, not now. BEEP BEEP...!

string.name: c28_f4
string.value: I'm a robot, and robots only beep. BEEP BEEP!

string.value: Grrr~ Yeti prefers cold places~ Grr~

string.value: If the master is bored, master shouldn't be hanging out with Yet; master should be out hunting~ Grr~

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: Yeti does not feel like talking today~ Grr~

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: Grrr~ Yeti is quiet~

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: Grr~ Grr~ Yeti is... GrrGrr~

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: Go past El Nath and you'll run into the Dead Mine~ Grrr~

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: Yeti heard that there's ice in Leafre, too~ Yeti wants to go there~ Grr~

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: Yeti looks a lot like the master~ Yeti looks like the master~ Grrr~

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: Yeti knows a lot about the history of El Nath~ Yeti will talk about its history soon~ Grr~

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: Is master bored? Yeti's busy~ Grrr~

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: Talk to Yeti right now, and Yeti will be very angry~ Grrr!!

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: Hang out with Yeti and then Yeti will talk~ Right now, Yeti will not talk~ Grrr~

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: Yeti won't talk, and won't listen to the master~ Grr~

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: Grr~

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: Grr~

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: GrrGrr~

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: Grr~

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: Grr...?

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: Grrr?

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: Yeti likes being told that Yeti is cute~Grrr~

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: Yeti is blushing~ Yeti is red now Grrr~

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: Pepe says the same to Yeti a lot~ Grrr~

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: Yeti is very happy right now~ Yeti likes compliments~ Grrr~

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: Yeti is not cute~ Yeti is NOT cute Grrr~

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: Yeti is sad. Yeti is feeling too hot to feel happy. Grr

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: Grr~ Yeti won't do it~ Yeti feels lazy~ Grrr~

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: Keep doing that, and Yeti will be very mad~ Grr!!

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: Yeti has always been cute~ Grr~

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: Grrr~ Yeti always hears that~ Grr~

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: Yeti and Pepe are both adorable~ Grrr~ Yeti and Pepe were the stars of El Nath~ Grr~

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: Yeti is a little bit embarassed by the compliments~ Grrr~

string.name: c23_f1
string.value: Yeti did not hear that~ Yeti only hears Pepe~ Grr~

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: Yeti is angry because Yeti is hungry~!! Grrr!!

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: Grr~ Yeti cannot not do that~!!

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: Grrr~ Yeti will not show the exact reason why Yeti is loved by everyone~ Grr~

string.name: c24_s1
string.value: Yeti is ALWAYS cute~ Yeti likes hearing that very much~ Grrr~

string.name: c24_s2
string.value: Yeti likes the master complimenting Yeti~ Grr~

string.name: c24_s3
string.value: Master is cute too~ Grrr~

string.name: c24_s4
string.value: Yeti loves hearing compliments~ Yeti has always been cute~ Grrr~

string.name: c24_f1
string.value: Yeti is too hungry to do anything~ Grrr...

string.name: c24_f2
string.value: Grr.. Yeti is NOT cute! Pepe is cuter~!!

string.name: c24_f3
string.value: Master lies too much~ Yeti does not lie, though...Grr.

string.name: c24_f4
string.value: Yeti wants to hear something else at times~!! Grrr!!

string.name: c25_s1
string.value: Grrr~

string.name: c25_s2
string.value: Grr~ Grrr~

string.name: c25_s3
string.value: Grrr~~

string.name: c25_s4
string.value: Grr

string.name: c25_f2
string.value: Grr?

string.name: c25_f3
string.value: Grr???

string.name: c25_f4
string.value: Grr Grr?

string.name: c26_s1
string.value: Yeti is very much blushing right now~ Grrr

string.name: c26_s2
string.value: Yeti feels great today~ Grrr~

string.name: c26_s3
string.value: Grr~ Yeti loves master, too~ Grrr

string.name: c26_s4
string.value: Yeti feels the same way~ Grrr~

string.name: c26_f1
string.value: Yeti loves Pepe~ Grrr~

string.name: c26_f2
string.value: Grr~? Yeti did not hear the master~ Grrr~

string.name: c26_f3
string.value: Yeti has a hard time with human language~ Grrr...

string.name: c26_f4
string.value: Yeti is starving... Grr..

string.name: c27_s1
string.value: Yeti does not know how to react~ Grr~

string.name: c27_s2
string.value: Yeti has always bee popular~ Grrr~

string.name: c27_s3
string.value: Grr~ Yeti feels ecstatic~ Grrr~

string.name: c27_s4
string.value: Grr~ Yeti is in love~

string.name: c27_f1
string.value: Yeti feels that the phrase should not be easily uttered~ Grr~

string.name: c27_f2
string.value: Yeti does not like jokes~ Grr~

string.name: c27_f3
string.value: Master should not make fun of Yeti!! Grrr!!

string.name: c27_f4
string.value: Yeti is sick of hearing that~ GrrGrr~

string.name: c28_s1
string.value: Yeti loves the master, too~ Grrr

string.name: c28_s2
string.value: Yeti is blushing, and wants to hide immediately.~ Grr

string.name: c28_s3
string.value: Grr~ Master is the best~

string.name: c28_s4
string.value: Yeti is so happy that Yeti will tell Pepe this~

string.name: c28_f1
string.value: Master always lies to Yeti~! Grrr!

string.name: c28_f2
string.value: Yeti does not like the master~ Grr~

string.name: c28_f3
string.value: Grr~ Yeti did not hear that from the master~ Grr~

string.name: c28_f4
string.value: Yeti does not fall for a foolish lie like that~ Grrr~

string.name: c29_s1
string.value: Grr~!

string.name: c29_s2
string.value: Grr~Grrr!!

string.name: c29_s3
string.value: Grrr

string.name: c29_f2
string.value: Grr...?

string.name: c30_s1
string.value: Yeti is on its way to dream street~ Grrr~

string.name: c30_s2
string.value: Yeti will dance in its dream...Grr....

string.name: c30_s3
string.value: Zzzzz...Grr ... Yeti is... Zzzzz...

string.name: c30_f1
string.value: Yeti was just falling asleep... UNTIL NOW~ Grr~

string.name: c30_f2
string.value: Yeti is too hungry to sleep~ Yeti wants a snack~ Grr~

string.name: c30_f3
string.value: Grrr~ Yeti thinks this place is too noisy~ Yeti cannot sleep~ Grr~

string.name: c31_s1
string.value: Grr~ Yeti will dream something with the master~ Grr~

string.name: c31_s2
string.value: Yeti will sleep with the master.... zzzzz....

string.name: c31_s3
string.value: Grrr.....Zzzzz....

string.name: c31_f1
string.value: Yeti cannot go to bed~ Yeti wants to chill~ Grrr~

string.name: c31_f2
string.value: Yeti wants to have fun with the master~ Grr~

string.name: c31_f3
string.value: Yeti cannot sleep because Yeti misses Pepe very much~ Grrr

string.name: f1_s
string.value: Grr~ Master is the bomb~

string.name: f1_f
string.value: Grrr!!

string.name: f2_s
string.value: Yeti likes food~

string.name: f2_f
string.value: Yeti cannot eat anymore~Grr~

string.name: f3_s
string.value: Grr.... Just looking at something delicious makes Yeti's day~

string.name: f3_f
string.value: Yeti should stop eating wheh Yeti's full~ Grr~

string.name: f4_s
string.value: Master, eat with Yeti~ Yeti loves this rice~ Grr~

string.name: f4_f
string.value: Master is a bad person... And Yeti is very full.. Grr...

string.name: s1
string.value: Grr?

string.name: s2
string.value: Grrr...Yeti doesn not know that word.

string.name: s3
string.value: Yeti wants the master not to say that. Grr~

string.name: s4
string.value: Master never orders me to do that.Grr...

string.name: c1_s2
string.value: Gobble, Gobble.

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: OK I'll sit... gobble

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: The ground is cold, but I'll sit.

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: You're right, I will take a seat.

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: So I just need to sit here, right, ho ho??

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: Master, what do you mean?

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: Master has an echo... Gobble...

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: The sky is so nice... huh?

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: I don't want my feathers ruffled.

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: Master, I'll sit now

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: Take a seat? No problem! Gobble

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: You're so kind, Master. My legs were tired.

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: Ok, I'll get up when you say so.

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: Could not hear you, Master...

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Can you repeat that?

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: I feel fine, but thanks for the offer... gobble.

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: An empty belly encourages me to disobey

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: A chickadee can follow that one. Too easy!

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: I do my best to obey, Master

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: A snack to show your appreciation would be nice

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: Easy as pie...!

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: *yawn* So tired...

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: You're funny, Master.

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: Um, how about I stand?

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: No way. I'm fine.

string.name: c5_f1
string.value: ... confused...

string.name: c6_s1
string.value: Oops, sorry

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: Whoops! I'll do better...

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: Sorry... gobble...

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: ... I'll be nice.

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: You look upset? Hungry?

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: It wasn't me! Gobble

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: You're amusing, master! Haha!

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: You done?

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: I'm really sorry, master... gobble...

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: I don't like that look... I'm scared

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: I've been bad, Master...

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: I'll be good now.

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: You need a potion? You look funny...

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Master, it wasn't that bad

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: I've been a good pet for you, be nice.

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: It was the other Turkey!

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: Master, I'm really sorry...

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: Master, please don't eat me!

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: I have feelings too, I'm hurt

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: Sorry, Master. I'll obey from now on.

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: You already used your Mad ticket with me last time.

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: I'm innocent till proven guilty.

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: You're just shouting at me because you haven't eaten all day.

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: Not everyone can be a great Master, you'll get there with hard work.

string.name: c9_s2
string.value: Gob, Gob, Gobble!

string.name: c10_s1
string.value: Yes, I can stand.

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: So easy...

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: I'm good, aren't I?

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: No, gobble!

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: What, gobble?

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: They're called feathers.

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: The answer is... no.

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: Tada! You have such a good pet.

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: An easy one!

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: I'll always stand for my Master!

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: I grew!

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: Maybe I don't hear so good.

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: Nah, I'm comfortable.

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: Chickens may do that, but I do not.

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: My leg hurts, it needs to rest.

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: Truly, Turkeys are the best pets.

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: I needed to stretch. Thanks, Master!

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: I can see your face better from here!

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: I want a challenge, Master. Standing is easy.

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: Man, what? NO.

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: Maybe Tomorrow

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: Stand? Why?

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: Sticks and stones may break my bones, but only an oven can hurt me.

string.name: c13_s2
string.value: ... (gobble...)

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: Hahhh... got it.

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: Um, oops?

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: I only do what you tell me.

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: Keep telling yourself that.

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: I didn't know you were a comedian, Master!

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: Are you asking me to agree?

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: You're right, Master.

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: I need to listen more.

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: How did I miss that?

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: I'm so dumb...

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: I agree, you are stupid.

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: Bested by a Turkey, you should feel bad.

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: Master, I only understand clear commands.

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: I only heard you say something about a wet sock. Sorry.

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: Man, I am dumb today!

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: So obvious...!

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: You're much smarter than I am, Master.

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: Your IQ must be really high!

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: I was under the impression that you were the smart one. I was wrong.

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: I think you left your brains back in the Hunting grounds.

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: Wait, look on the ground, next to the small rock. There it is! Your brain!

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: Aren't you supposed to lead me around? Sheesh.

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: I'm ready for action, Master

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: Turkey can spot a scam anywhere. Watch out!

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: You have any Feed? It is delicious.

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: Yes, Turkeys do lay eggs.

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: What is wrong with you? Turkeys can't talk!

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: Why would I say that?

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: Nothing to really discuss.

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: How about "No Way"?

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: I like to travel, Master. You can take me anywhere.

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: Where is everybody? I like seeing other Turkeys.

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: It's always a good thing when you're nice to everyone.

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: I think you might need a new hairdo.

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: A talking Turkey? Wake up--you're dreaming.

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: My voice hurts, so I'm resting it.

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: You talk, I'll listen.

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: There was a feather in my ear. What did you say?

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: Your face is huge!

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: Turkeys are, by far, the best looking pet.

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: When are we going to see Zakum? I heard he's well armed!

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: Remember that doing quests can only help you!

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: Two words: Feed me!

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: ... (wheezing)...

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: I'll tell you later. Maybe.

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: The vocabulary of a turkey is not that developed!

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: I understand.

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: I'll obey.

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: Repeat that?

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: Gobble, Gobble... don't know.

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: I don't think so.

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: You got it!

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: I agree!

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: I think so...

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: You should try again. Later.

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: Not really, no.

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: I disagree.

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: Clear your voice and speak slowly.

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: This is correct.

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: That's right!

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: Right again, Master!

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: You don't want to mess with a Turkey, do you?

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: When my stomach is empty, my ears get clogged.

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: Ha! Try again!

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: love... gobble...

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: ... uh huh...

string.name: c24_s1
string.value: How nice...

string.name: c24_s2
string.value: I like you too, Master.

string.name: c24_s3
string.value: Thank you, Master!

string.name: c24_s4
string.value: I'm so happy now!

string.name: c24_f1
string.value: Hah, you're joking right?

string.name: c24_f2
string.value: I'm not buying what you're selling.

string.name: c24_f3
string.value: You must've been talking to that Mushroom over there.

string.name: c24_f4
string.value: Shaky hands? I see how it is...

string.name: c25_s1
string.value: I love you too, Master!

string.name: c25_s2
string.value: Your love is the fuel that keeps me going.

string.name: c25_s3
string.value: Love is a battlefield, and you're my best weapon.

string.name: c25_s4
string.value: I can feel your love from here, Master...

string.name: c25_f1
string.value: I can't feel the love tonight.

string.name: c25_f2
string.value: I don't trust you.

string.name: c25_f3
string.value: You'll have to prove it!

string.name: c25_f4
string.value: I can tell you don't mean it!

string.name: c26_s1
string.value: If your love was money, I'd be a rich bird.

string.name: c26_s2
string.value: It's so nice to hear you say that!

string.name: c26_s3
string.value: My feathers only flap for you!

string.name: c26_s4
string.value: Be still, my beating heart...

string.name: c26_f1
string.value: Right... you said that to someone else before

string.name: c26_f2
string.value: Oh, now you want to be affectionate? I don't think so.

string.name: c26_f3
string.value: The way to a Turkey's heart is through his stomach.

string.name: c26_f4
string.value: Lies. Filthy lies.

string.name: c27_s1
string.value: I've got my eye on you...

string.name: c27_s2
string.value: Don't move!

string.name: c27_s3
string.value: Go ahead. Wing it and see what happens...

string.name: c27_s4
string.value: I've got your back, relax.

string.name: c27_f1
string.value: I may need some glasses

string.name: c27_f2
string.value: Just for that, I'm closing my eyes.

string.name: c27_f3
string.value: Some food would help me see better...

string.name: c27_f4
string.value: My eyes tire of such trival sights.

string.name: c28_s1
string.value: Here's an egg for you!

string.name: c28_s2
string.value: This egg may give you superpowers. Use it wisely!

string.name: c28_s3
string.value: Much, much better than an apple.

string.name: c28_s4
string.value: Get some pepper and it will taste better.

string.name: c28_f1
string.value: I haven't laid an egg in a while, Master.

string.name: c28_f2
string.value: Someday, I may give you an egg. Today is not that day.

string.name: c28_f3
string.value: I don't have anything in my pockets. Guaranteed.

string.name: c28_f4
string.value: Better idea: How about you give ME an egg?

string.name: c29_s1
string.value: I think I got 2 inches off the ground that time!

string.name: c29_s2
string.value: Almost a foot!

string.name: c29_s3
string.value: I can fly... sort of...

string.name: c29_s4
string.value: Yes! Call me SuperTurkey!

string.name: c29_f1
string.value: You make me laugh.

string.name: c29_f2
string.value: Name the last time you saw a flying Turkey.

string.name: c29_f3
string.value: Haven't worked out my wings in a while, sorry.

string.name: c29_f4
string.value: I'd like to see you try. No jetpack, either.

string.name: c30_s1
string.value: Eat me!

string.name: c30_s2
string.value: How about some stuffing?

string.name: c30_s3
string.value: Do I make you hungry, Master? Do I?

string.name: c30_s4
string.value: Go ahead, I've got another leg.

string.name: c30_f1
string.value: you're sick! Get away from me!

string.name: c30_f2
string.value: You're hungry too? That makes two of us.

string.name: c30_f3
string.value: No cranberry sauce? Or gravy? No dice.

string.name: c30_f4
string.value: Stuff it.

string.name: c31_s1
string.value: I'm going to rest now...

string.name: c31_s2
string.value: Nap time!

string.name: c31_s3
string.value: I am feeling a little tired...

string.name: c31_s4
string.value: Good idea, Master.

string.name: c31_f1
string.value: I'm not tired right now.

string.name: c31_f2
string.value: The ground is rough.

string.name: c31_f3
string.value: My eyes aren't heavy, why should I sleep?

string.name: c31_f4
string.value: Nowhere close to bedtime. I don't think so.

string.name: c32_s1
string.value: You're so observant, Master. I'll take a short nap.

string.name: c32_s2
string.value: Feeling pretty sleepy, a nap would be good for me.

string.name: c32_s3
string.value: yawn... good idea...

string.value: This spot is perfect for a quick snooze.

string.value: WEK WEK~~ !

string.value: Sit? Like this? WEK WEK.

string.value: I can do it! WEK!

string.value: WEK~~ this is the way to do it, right?

string.value: Sit? Okay! I stll feel great though ~~~ WEK~ WEK~

string.value: I can't do it!! WEK!!

string.value: I never learned how to sit... weK!

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: ... WEEEKKKKK ...

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: Too easy ~~ WEK WEK!

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: Do I sit like this? WEK!

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: Fun!! WEK!

string.value: You must be kidding me... WEK

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: I'll do that later... WEK...

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: Don't let me do stupid things like this... WEK..

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: It's not like I'll be getting a prize for doing this... WEK

string.value: I can sit! I really can sit!!

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: This is good...

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: Give me something harder to do.

string.value: Look, I'm fat, and it's hard for me to sit.

string.value: Don't bother me

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: Hooo... hooo... what?

string.value: WEK WEK ~~

string.value: WEK!!! WEK!!!

string.value: WEK~! I'll be good.

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: WEK WEK~ don't scold me.

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: WEK~~ I'm so sorry.

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: WEK WEK... sniff sniff

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: Arrrghh... WEK

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: Umm... you're no different than me. WEK!

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: Don't tell me what to do! WEK!

string.value: I'm sad... WEK WEK.

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: I won't do that again... WEK... WEK....

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: Okay now ... calm down ... WEK WEK..

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: I get it. I'll be a good penguin now.

string.value: What do you want me to do? WEK!

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Did I do anything wrong? WEK?

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: Whatever. WEK

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: I feel hurt... WEK

string.value: Please forgive me...

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: You scare me...

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: My heart's been torn to pieces... sigh...

string.value: What can I do to make you feel better?

string.name: c8_f2

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: Ahhhhhh... that's it. WEK

string.value: Hmph... WEK

string.value: Long way to go before I poop. WEK

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: That's quite a relief. WEK

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: Hah, I ate a lil too much last night. WEK

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: Sorry. It's going to reak here. WEK.

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: Ou... WEK WEK

string.value: I don't want anyone seeing this. WEK

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: I haven't felt it, yet. WEK.

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: I'm constipating these days. WEK.

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: Here? NO. WEK.

string.value: Hey, don't look. It's not a pretty sight.

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: Dang, this smells pretty bad.

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: Master, don't step on this.

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Ahhh, this is quite a relief.

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: I can't poop now. I held on to it for too long.

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: I can't poop what I never ate.

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: Can you force yourself to poop?

string.value: WEK WEK ~~

string.value: WEK!!! WEK!!!

string.value: WEK~ WEK~~~!

string.value: Brilliant~ WEK!

string.name: c14_f4

string.value: Standing's my forte, WEK!

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: This is a piece of cake, WEK.

string.value: At your command, WEK!

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: I'm good, right? Give me something harder to do, WEK.

string.value: I'm sleepy, WEK.

string.value: NO! WEK!

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: Don't tell me what to do, okay? WEK!

string.value: I can do it. I'm the bomb, right?

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: If I keep practicing, I may be able to run one of these days.

string.value: The weather's beautiful today, perfect for a chit chat, WEK.

string.value: If you find somethng delicious, give me some, WEK.

string.name: c17_s3

string.name: c17_f2

string.value: Talk to someone else, WEK.

string.name: c17_f4

string.value: Any good movie to watch, WEK?

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: Tell me you love me the most, WEK.

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: Treat others just the way you want to be treated, WEK.

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: Take me to a seafood store, WEK.

string.value: No comment, WEK.

string.name: c18_f2

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: What? WEK?

string.value: If I ever turn back into a doll, please get me a water of life so I can keep hanging out with you.

string.value: I see a lot of elves these days. I heard they were very hard-working.

string.value: Don't tell others your ID and password.

string.value: YOU talk, and I listen.

string.value: I don't feel good.

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: Don't bother me. I'm just chillin here.

string.value: WEK WEK so warm~!

string.value: Now you gotta kiss me! WEK

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: Hug me hug me! WEK

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: Hehe, give me a warm hug. WEK

string.value: You smell, WEK.

string.value: I feel like hurling... WEK.

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: I'm too heavy for you to hug, WEK.

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: Too hot here! WEK!

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: Okay, come here. WEK!

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: Hug meeeee WEK!

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: You can hug me as long as you want, WEK!

string.value: Don't come near me! WEK!

string.value: NO! You haven't showered in days! WEK!

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: My goodness, you smell. WEK.

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: I got no time for you, WEK!

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: Don't hug me too hard. I can't breathe.

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: Now that felt good.

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: Awwww, it's embarassing though. Hug me when no one's looking.

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: Can we do something else?

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: You don't even love me.

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: Not you!

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: Hah... wEK.

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: My eyes are heavy... WEK.

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: I feel sooo tired... WEK.

string.value: I just woke up, WEK!

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: No, I wanna do something fun! WEK!

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: Look, it's well into the morning right now, WEK.

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: I don't feel like sleeping here, WEK.
