string.value: I feel fine, I don't feel like sleeping.

string.name: c24_f4
string.value: I'm too hungry...

string.name: c25_s1
string.value: WEK WEK ~~

string.name: c26_s1
string.value: I love you too, WEK!

string.name: c26_s2
string.value: Is that for real? WEK!

string.name: c26_s3
string.value: And I believe you, WEK!

string.name: c26_s4
string.value: This makes me feel good, WEK!

string.name: c26_f1
string.value: This makes me feel good, WEK!

string.name: c26_f2
string.value: What? No, WEK.

string.name: c26_f3
string.value: Liar. I don't like you, WEK.

string.name: c26_f4
string.value: Really? I don't think you do, though. WEK.

string.name: c27_s1
string.value: Do you really mean that, WEK?

string.name: c27_s2
string.value: You know how I feel about this, right? WEK~

string.name: c27_s3
string.value: I love you too, master! WEK!

string.name: c27_s4
string.value: Yay, I'm being loved by my master~ WEK!

string.name: c27_f1
string.value: And what do you want from me? WEK.

string.name: c27_f2
string.value: What? I didn't hear you. WEK.

string.name: c27_f3
string.value: Um, you're funny. WEK.

string.name: c27_f4
string.value: I know you say that to others, too. WEK.

string.name: c28_s1
string.value: Me, me me me!!!

string.name: c28_s2
string.value: I'll always love you, master.

string.name: c28_s3
string.value: No way. Really? Really? Awww...

string.name: c28_s4
string.value: I love you too, master! Yay!!

string.name: c28_f2
string.value: We penguins don't take that phrase "I love you" lightly.

string.name: c28_f3
string.value: If you don't mean that, that I don't think you should say it.

string.name: c28_f4
string.value: What a full-fledged lie.

string.name: c29_s1
string.value: Here, WEK!

string.name: c29_s2
string.value: I'm good, right? WEK WEK!

string.name: c29_s3
string.value: So I should just stick it out like this? WEK..

string.name: c29_f1
string.value: No, WEK!

string.name: c29_f2
string.value: I'm too tired... WEK.

string.name: c29_f3
string.value: What? WEK.

string.name: c30_s1
string.value: Like this, right? WEK.

string.name: c30_s2
string.value: You know I'm the bomb, WEK.

string.name: c30_s3
string.value: Haha, this is fun. WEK.

string.name: c30_f1
string.value: No way, I'm too tired. WEK.

string.name: c30_f2
string.value: I'm too lazy to do this. WEK.

string.name: c30_f3
string.value: What are you saying, WEK.

string.name: c31_s1
string.value: Here's my hand, err, wing.

string.name: c31_s2
string.value: Heavy, isn't it? I can't fly with these, though.

string.name: c31_s3
string.value: Is it fluffy? It feels good, right? This is fuuuun!

string.name: c31_f1
string.value: Ugh, this is quite a chore.

string.name: c31_f2
string.value: Nah, maybe next time.

string.name: c31_f3
string.value: What am I, a dog? I'm a penguin, you know!

string.name: c32_s1
string.value: Ahhh, here's a smooch.

string.name: c32_s2
string.value: I'm blushing...

string.name: c32_s3
string.value: Make sure not to leave a hole on my cheek!

string.name: c32_f1
string.value: Um... do you know exactly where we are right now?

string.name: c32_f2
string.value: Go brush your teeth first.

string.name: c32_f3
string.value: No way, I don't wanna do it.

string.name: c33_s1
string.value: I like smooches, too.

string.name: c33_s2
string.value: I've been dreaming of these~!

string.name: c33_s3
string.value: Don't do it for too long, though. Yay!

string.name: c33_s4
string.value: Kiss me again!

string.name: c33_f1
string.value: Who in the right mind would wanna kiss you?

string.name: c33_f2
string.value: Not me...no way.

string.name: c33_f3
string.value: You ain't doing this for free.

string.name: c33_f4
string.value: Tell me that was a joke.

string.name: c34_s1
string.value: Yoo hoo! I'm flyinnnng!

string.name: c34_s2
string.value: Look! I can fly!

string.name: c34_s3
string.value: I deserve a trophy for this performance!

string.name: c34_s4
string.value: I believe I can fly!!! WEK WEK!

string.name: c34_f1
string.value: Um...don't I look a litttttle hefty for that?

string.name: c34_f2
string.value: Hey, have you ever seen a flying penguin?

string.name: c34_f3
string.value: You must have lost your mind.

string.name: c34_f4
string.value: What are you saying...?

string.name: c35_s1
string.value: Isn't this cool??

string.name: c35_s2
string.value: Show me another penguin that can fly like me.

string.name: c35_s3
string.value: Don't I look MAGNIFICENT?

string.name: c35_s4
string.value: No need to waste time. Here we go!

string.name: c35_f1
string.value: Yo, I'm afraid of height.

string.name: c35_f2
string.value: You fly first!

string.name: c35_f3
string.value: I suggest you study a little on penguin's anatomy.

string.name: c35_f4
string.value: Um, have you heard of Law of Gravity? Hello!!

string.name: c36_s1
string.value: I'm at a loss for words...WEK!

string.name: c36_s2
string.value: It's hard to find a penguin as cute-looking as me! WEK!

string.name: c36_s3
string.value: Hey, I've been cute for quite some time, you know! WEK!

string.name: c36_s4
string.value: Really? You're not kidding, right? WEK!

string.name: c36_f1
string.value: I can't trust you, WEK.

string.name: c36_f2
string.value: I'm not CUTE. I'm DASHING. WEK!!!

string.name: c36_f3
string.value: I NEED SOME TRUTH AROUND HERE! WEK!

string.name: c36_f4
string.value: What do you want me to say in return, WEK?

string.name: c37_s1
string.value: Of course, master!

string.name: c37_s2
string.value: You won't find a penguin quite like me. Enjoy it!

string.name: c37_s3
string.value: I can never get enough of your compliments!

string.name: c37_s4
string.value: Thanks for your kind words! I really appreciate that!

string.name: c37_f1
string.value: Since when did we compliment each other anyway...

string.name: c37_f2
string.value: Um, how about a NO.

string.name: c37_f3
string.value: Let me just sleep, okay?

string.name: c37_f4
string.value: Feed me instead of waxing stupid poetics like that.

string.name: f2_s
string.value: FOOD!!! WEK!

string.name: f2_f
string.value: I can't eat no more. WEK.

string.name: f3_s
string.value: Now this tastes good... WEK~~

string.name: f3_f
string.value: Ugh, I feel like throwing up. WEK.

string.name: f4_s
string.value: FISH! Woo hoo!

string.name: f4_f
string.value: I need to be on a diet.

string.name: s2
string.value: Wek... Wek...

string.name: s3
string.value: Master, Please.... Wek...Wek...

string.name: s4
string.value: Master~ Behave yourself~ Wek...

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: Kakaka~ This is very comfotable~

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: Kahaha~ hey, I'm sexy too~

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: What do you think? Do you want to lie down with me?Grr~

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: Grrr~ my body's been aching, and this is gooood!

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: Grr~ No I don...t want to lie down~!

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: Grr~! Man lying down here? That's a disgrace, a disgrace!!!

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: YOU lie down, first. Kakaka~

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: I can't lie down after a meal. I'll get fat really fast~ Grr~

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: This would have been perfect if I'm in a warm room right about now~ Kakaka~

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: Kahaha~ This is fun.

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: Kakaka~ All I need now is a bag of chips and a remote.

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: Get me a blanket~! Grr~!

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: I can't hear you, I can't hear you! Grr~!

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Well, I feel like doing things my way, anyway~ Kakaka~

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: No, then I look fat~ Grr~

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: Kahaha~ why should I?

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: Boss said it, so I might as well lie down~~ Kakaka~

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: Boss, lie down with me here. Oh, this is good!! Kakaka~

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: Kakaka~ I must be really old, to really like lying down like this~!

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: Kahaha~ shall I lie down for a little bit?

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: Boss, you've grown up quiiiiiiiite a bit. Ordering ME to lie down? Huh? Grr?

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: Hey, you're talking to a boss monster! No ORDERING here! Grr!

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: Grr~ Boss, you lie down first~

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: Grr~ Boss, I don...t feel like doing it right now~

string.name: c6_s1
string.value: Ka ... I guess I screwed up this time.

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: Ka ... let me apologie as only a man can!

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: ... don...t tell this to my bro, Crimson Balrog!

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: Grr....... sorry...

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: Kahaha~ what is this?

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: Grr!! Who are YOU to get mad at ME?

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: Grrr~ So what?

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: Are YOU rebelling against me? Grr...

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: Ka ... I'll admit my mistake.

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: Look I didn't do it on purpose, so let it slide, alright? Grr...

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: Ka ... this is sad.

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: So it's my fault ...? Hmmm ...

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: Grr! I'm scarier than you!

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Grr~ Do you want me to take a bit out of you?

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: Grrrr ~ YOU do well first.

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: Now I'm angry!!! Really really angry! Krrrr!!

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: Ka ... Boss is doing this because the boss worries about me. Not bad! I'm impressed!

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: Ka ... you make a grown man like me cry.

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: A real man admits his mistakes. ...

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: Boss~ I'm sorry...Kakaka...

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: Boss doesn't trust me~ Ka....

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: Grr! Boss you're the worst!!

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: Krrr... this is making me MAD MAD MAD!!!!!

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: I'm about to lose control~!! Grrrrrrr !!!!

string.name: c10_s1
string.value: My eyes have hearts now~ Kakaka~...

string.name: c10_s2
string.value: You really mean it, huh? This is quite something~

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: Ka ... this feels good ......

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: And we're going to love forever, no? Grr~?

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: Dude... no ...

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: You make me laugh my butt off~

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: I can't just give my heart away like that~ Grr~

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: Arrgh ... That's nasty ...

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: Kakaka~ be my love~

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: Grr~ It's still a world worth living~

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: Your love makes me feel excited~ Kaka...

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: Kakaka~ do you feel my love, too?

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: Arrrgh... Are you sure you just meant what you said?

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: ... I prefer being single~

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: Dude ... that was uncalled for...

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: Grr~ Wahahahha I'm gonna tell my brother this!

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: Boss you're a good person~ Grr~

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: Kakaka~ Do you see these hearts coming out of my eyes?

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: Kaka ... I love the Boss, too.

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: This is a little embarassing~ Yoohoo~

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: I feel like throwing up that 10 year old pizza ....

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: I told you to say the truth!

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: Are you kidding me? Hahahahaha ...

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: Kakaka~ now to what extent will the boss lie to me?

string.name: c13_f2
string.value: ... (throws up)

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: Kaka .. This embarasses the heck out of me!

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: ... I've become a red Balrog~

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: Kakaka~ nothing makes a Balrog dance quite like a compliment~

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: Yeah yeah~ keep going! Kakaka

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: Um ... do I look pretty?

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: Um ... I'm not getting used to it.

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: No time for fake pleasantries.

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: No, I won...t do that!

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: Kahaha~ I'm too sexy for this butt~

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: Kaka ... thanks

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: I do know that I'm one heck of a looking Balrog~

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: Grr~ you like me, don't you?

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: ... dude ... NO NO

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: I feel like throwing up after hearing all the lies you just said.

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: (throws up) NOW, do I look lovely?

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: I'll just pretend that I didn't hear that.

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: Which part of me did Boss fall in love with? The luscious lips? Kakaka

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: Whoa, that was ... sweet~ Kakaka~

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: I'm turning red~~

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: Boss~ need a smooch? Kakaka~

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: Boss is getting better and better at lying~Grr~

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: What a LIAR

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: Boss, your lies make me wanna throw up!

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: Boss, you're so fake!

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: Haaaahhh ...

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: Hah ... Now I feel like doing something!

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: This is how you poop with class~

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: My gosh, this is huge. Wow.

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: Hahh ... time to poop~

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: Grr~ embarassing~

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: Grr~ Even a Balrog like me prefers to keep this on a down low~

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: If I poop here, I'll look ... like ...

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: Grr~ forgive me just once.

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: Pooping requires ample amount of concentration~

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: Apply ample amount of pressure, and the poop will naturally ... come out~ Kakaka~

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: Now I LOOK GREAT~! LOOK AT ME POOP!

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: Ohh, that felt great!

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: Pooping in a public place like this? Embarassing!

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: Grrr~~ do I HAVE to?

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: I ... am ... constipating ... need a medicine...

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: Ahhh ... pooping in public takes a lot of guts.

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: Only the true men poop like this!

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: Kaka ... doesn't mine smell better than yours, boss?

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: Boss, this is what you call a manly poop.

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: Kakaka, boss poop with me here.

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: Ow, this is embarassing!

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: Hey, people are staring at me!

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: Do I HAVE to poop, boss? Really?

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: Grrr... can't poop...

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: Kakaka~ take a look at this!

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: Kahaha... smile~

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: Kakaka ... no I'm not doing this to make you feel bad.

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: This is what you call a MANLY smile!

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: Ka... I'm going through a tough time...

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: Ka... I am too tired to smile today.

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: ... it's not easy being a loner.

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: I don't feel like smiling.

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: Grrr, now this is one beautiful smile~

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: Kakaka, I feel like smiling

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: I am the biggest star in MapleStory! Muahahah

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: Take a picture of me!

string.name: c23_f1
string.value: Ka ... I'm sad. Actually, I'm sad because I'm hungry.

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: Being a loner is killing me again. Sob sob.

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: Everyone's ... afraid ... of ... me ... sigh.

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: Grrr ... don't make me cry~

string.name: c24_s1
string.value: This is what I'd call a killer smile to you, Boss~

string.name: c24_s2
string.value: Boss, your smile looks a million bucks! Smile with me!

string.name: c24_s3
string.value: Kahaha~ I'm smiling because I'm feeling good~!

string.name: c24_s4
string.value: Kahaha ... I call this, the bossy smile.

string.name: c24_f1
string.value: Grrr... boss, you want me to smile, and now I feel like crying.

string.name: c24_f2
string.value: Boss, I feel lonely.

string.name: c24_f3
string.value: Boss, why are YOU crying?

string.name: c24_f4
string.value: Loner Balrog at your service... sigh...

string.name: c25_s1
string.value: Kakaka~melong~!bleh bleh~

string.name: c25_s2
string.value: How do you like me sticking my tongue out on you? Blehhhh

string.name: c25_s3
string.value: Kakaka~ Bleeeehhhhhhhh

string.name: c25_f1
string.value: This does not fit the description of Jr. Balrog.

string.name: c25_f2
string.value: Krrr ... no.

string.name: c25_f3
string.value: Grrr ... real men don't stick their tongues out!

string.name: c26_s1
string.value: Kaka Blehhh. This is fun!

string.name: c26_s2
string.value: Bleeehhhh, doesn't this really make you mad?

string.name: c26_s3
string.value: Kakaka ... real men stick their tongue out in a classy manner like this.

string.name: c26_s4
string.value: Blehhhh ...

string.name: c26_f1
string.value: My brother Crimson Balrog told me to cut it out.

string.name: c26_f2
string.value: I won't do it! Grrr...

string.name: c26_f3
string.value: Blehh isn't for free of charge.

string.name: c26_f4
string.value: I don't feel like doing it today. Leave me a lone.

string.name: c27_s1
string.value: Hey boss, bleehhhhhh.

string.name: c27_s2
string.value: I've been practicing 'blehh' for the last couple of weeks. You like this?

string.name: c27_s3
string.value: Boss, blehhhhhhhhh !!

string.name: c27_s4
string.value: Boss, you like me blehing you, huh? Hahaha

string.name: c27_f1
string.value: Kaka... boss, you just keep doing it, and I'll make fun of you here.

string.name: c27_f2
string.value: Boss is blocking my way from becoming a true alpha dog.

string.name: c27_f3
string.value: Dude, this does not make me look like a boss character.

string.name: c27_f4
string.value: Boss, why do I have to do this?

string.name: c28_s1
string.value: Grr~ twinkle!!

string.name: c28_s2
string.value: Say hello to the purest set of eyes in MapleStory!

string.name: c28_s3
string.value: I know you like to see my eyes, so here they are!

string.name: c28_s4
string.value: Have you ever seen a look as piercing as this?

string.name: c28_f1
string.value: My eyes hurt...

string.name: c28_f2
string.value: Grr... not today.

string.name: c28_f3
string.value: Kakaka, this isn't something I'll do for free.

string.name: c28_f4
string.value: My eyes hurt doing this!

string.name: c29_s1
string.value: Is this good enough? I know you like it.

string.name: c29_s2
string.value: In terms of my eyes, these are much more beautiful than that of my brother Crimson Balrog's!

string.name: c29_s3
string.value: My eyes ooze charisma!

string.name: c29_s4
string.value: At your command~!

string.name: c29_f1
string.value: Grr.., I don't feel like doing this.

string.name: c29_f2
string.value: Why don't we just lie down here and chill?

string.name: c29_f3
string.value: You'll get sick of it if you see this too often.

string.name: c29_f4
string.value: Kakaka~ no!

string.name: c30_s1
string.value: This is what you call the eyes of a true gentleman! Grr!

string.name: c30_s2
string.value: They call me Eagle-Eye Balrog~ Kakaka~!

string.name: c30_s3
string.value: Boss, this is how much I care about you. Just look at my eyes!

string.name: c30_s4
string.value: Boss, try copying me!

string.name: c30_f1
string.value: I'd like to chill for a second.

string.name: c30_f2
string.value: Kakaka, no more for today.

string.name: c30_f3
string.value: Grrr, this is no fun.

string.name: c30_f4
string.value: You try first, boss! Let me see your eyes!

string.name: c31_s1
string.value: Have you ever been to the Cursed Shrine?

string.name: c31_s2
string.value: Hey, I may look intimidating, but deep down inside, I'm a man in need of love~

string.name: c31_s3
string.value: Everytime I look at the mirror, I can't help but see how good-looking I am.

string.name: c31_s4
string.value: I like the fact that I look as manly as one can get in MapleStory~ Kakaka~

string.name: c31_f1
string.value: Too ... lazy ... to do ... anything.

string.name: c31_f2
string.value: Kakaka, if I tell you, are you going to pay me?

string.name: c31_f3
string.value: Kakaka, my mouth is just dying to say something...

string.name: c31_f4
string.value: Hey, I'm watching Maple Idol! Move away from TV!

string.name: c32_s1
string.value: My wings are my source of pride and joy!

string.name: c32_s2
string.value: It's only obvious that people are scared of me. I'm Balrog!

string.name: c32_s3
string.value: These muscles... let's just say, these babies didn't come for free!

string.name: c32_s4
string.value: I know I'm good looking, and I want everyone to know that, too.

string.name: c32_f1
string.value: Umm ... I don...t want to.

string.name: c32_f2
string.value: I feel like eating snack right now. Get me some!

string.name: c32_f3
string.value: Let's just lie down and chill.

string.name: c32_f4
string.value: What did you just say?

string.name: c33_s1
string.value: Hey, boss, have you met my brother, Crimson Balrog?

string.name: c33_s2
string.value: I want to be much more masculine, like my brother Crimson.

string.name: c33_s3
string.value: I value friendship more than anything else!

string.name: c33_s4
string.value: Kaka ... it's been a pleasure knowing you, boss!

string.name: c33_f1
string.value: I don't feel like doing anything right now...

string.name: c33_f2
string.value: Boss, you say something first.

string.name: c33_f3
string.value: Let's just lie down and chillllll.

string.name: c33_f4
string.value: Let's do this some other time.

string.name: c34_s2
string.value: Zzzz... kaka ..

string.name: c34_s3
string.value: Grr.... And I am so sick of ...~Zzz..Z..zz..

string.name: c34_f1
string.value: GrrGrr~ Kakaka~

string.name: c35_s1
string.value: I'll see you in my dream, kid!

string.name: c35_s2
string.value: Grr ... I feel like sleeping ... right ... now ...

string.name: c35_s3
string.value: Grrr ... grr ...

string.name: c35_f1
string.value: Call me the hardest working Balrog in this world!

string.name: c35_f2
string.value: Grrr ... I don't feel like sleeping!

string.name: c35_f3
string.value: Grrr ... I'm bored!!!

string.name: c36_s1
string.value: Grrr ... I better start scaring people that are on board ... grrr ...

string.name: c36_s2
string.value: Zzz... Crimson .... Grr...

string.name: c36_s3
string.value: Grrr ... the way of a man .... Boss ... stupid...

string.name: c36_f1
string.value: Boss! I'm Angry! Seriously!!Grr!

string.name: c36_f2
string.value: I don't feel like sleeping! Grr!

string.name: c36_f3
string.value: Grr!! Boss, are you just ordering me?!

string.name: c37_s1
string.value: Pshhh ... this isn't a regular GAS. Hahha.

string.name: c37_s2
string.value: This smell of gas is trickling my nose~ Kakaka~

string.name: c37_s3
string.value: Ah, that felt good!

string.name: c37_s4
string.value: Whoa, I almost pooped it away~!

string.name: c37_f1
string.value: How am I going to fart in public? No way!

string.name: c37_f2
string.value: Kahaha, people will really make fun of me.

string.name: c37_f3
string.value: Oh my, how can you say such thing...

string.name: c37_f4
string.value: Grrr ... does it HAVE to be just gas?

string.name: c38_s1
string.value: Pshhhh I can actually make a song out of my gaseous adventure.

string.name: c38_s2
string.value: Boss, check out the smell. Isn't it sweet? Haha.

string.name: c38_s3
string.value: My gosh, I'm feeling dizzy right now from all that gas...

string.name: c38_s4
string.value: Dang, this even smells like my snack from last night

string.name: c38_f1
string.value: Boss, you fart first! Kakaka~

string.name: c38_f2
string.value: Grr~ I can't do that!

string.name: c38_f3
string.value: Kahaha ... Boss, that was so mean for you to order me to do something degrading like this!

string.name: c38_f4
string.value: Look, I don...t feel like passing out to my own gas.

string.name: f2_s
string.value: This tastes so good, I feel like passing out! Kakaka~

string.name: f2_f
string.value: Um... I ate til I almost threw up.

string.name: f3_s
string.value: A real MAN eats a lot!

string.name: f3_f
string.value: ... dang it, I feel like thrwing up

string.name: f4_s
string.value: Boss, your food tastes awesome!

string.name: f4_f
string.value: Arrgh, I'm about to burst!

string.name: s2
string.value: Are you telling me to say such thing?

string.name: s3
string.value: I can't believe you just said that. Let me show you how powerful I am.

string.name: s4
string.value: Boss, that was disapponting, right?

string.name: c1_s2
string.value: Oink Oink~

string.name: c1_f1
string.value: What the..Oink?

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: You mean like this, master? Oink~

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: Yes master! I'll do whatever you wish...Oink~

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: Am I sitting right, master?...Oink!

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: I must sit now! Oink~

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: Humph! Oink~

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: Next time perhaps...Oink~

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: What are ya trying to say, master? Oink~

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: Feed me? Oink~

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: Yes, my master! Oink Oink~

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: Oooink!! Oink will be a good boy/girl! Oink!~

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: Do I sit like this? Oink!

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: Gooooood Oink!

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: Try again later, master. Oink~

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Try harder, master! Oink~

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: Sit where? Why?

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: It's not like I'll be getting a prize for doing this... Oink~

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: I was born ready...to sit!

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: I needed to rest.. Thank you master.

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: Let's sit down and chat all you want!

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: What a relief! Oink~

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: Sit? You mean babysit? Good one!

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: Wow... nice try... you almost had me.

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: LEAVE ME ALONE!

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: No mud, no deal!

string.name: c5_s1
string.value: Oink's crying now! Oooink~

string.name: c5_f1
string.value: But Oink is in happy mood! Oink~

string.name: c5_f2
string.value: Oink tried but failed...Oink~

string.name: c6_s1
string.value: Awwwww! Oink Oink~

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: Awwwww! Oink is so sorry,master! Oink Oink~

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: Oink will not do it again, master!! Oooink~~

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: Give me a second chance.... Oink...

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: Arrrghh... OINK!

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: So what? Oink~

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: Not really.... Oink.

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: What now? Oink~

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: I admit... I have been bad...

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: I won't do that again... Oink...

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: Please forgive me master... Oink..

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: I regret it!....

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Oh really?

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: You are cruel. Take out a rib next time, it'll hurt less!

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: BAD TO THE BONE!

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: But I still love you... Oink...

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: So... scare... Oink...

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: I will be a good pet from now on.. Oink...

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: No, I'm sorry! Put away the BBQ sauce!

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: Me? Are you talking to me?

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: Seriously, I didn't do anything wrong.

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: I see your lips moving, but you aren't saying anything!

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: Innocent I tell you! Innocent!

string.name: c9_f2
string.value: ...you didn't feed me, genius.

string.name: c10_s1
string.value: Well, here you go~ Oink.

string.name: c10_s2
string.value: That feels good. Oink!

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: You didn't see this, did you? Oink~!

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: It is about time~ Oink.

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: Ermm, right here? Oink?

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: Ermm.. Right now? Oink?

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: Don't think so~ Oink!

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: So Uncivilized~ Oink!

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: That felt great!... Oink~

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: Hmmm, it stinks! Oink Oink~

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: Oink... Poooooooooop! Ahhhh. Oink~

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: Too many people here! Oink~

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: Please feed me first! Oink~

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: After you master! Oink~

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: I can hold it! Oink~

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: Oink pooooooooooop!!~

string.name: c12_s2

string.value: ......(doubtfull eyes)

string.value: Kieick~ I just defeated yeti easily 500years ago...

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: Kick... I will think about it after you feed me..

string.value: I really hate being a doll. Keick. I would rather go prison than being a doll.

string.name: c22_s2

string.value: Did you say " Be quiet!" when I told you before? Keick?

string.name: c23_f2

string.value: Kiyoong I'm so embarrassed.

string.value: Kiyoong~ I love you~~

string.value: Koohhhh! Kiyong!

string.value: Sometimes I wonder how I'll look like when I evolve into something new...

string.value: Kiyoong I'm going to get you~ Nahnah na boo boo!

string.value: I have nothing to say to you.

string.value: I have no clue what you mean.

string.value: I wish I could evolve into a huge, mythical dragon just like those in cartoons, too~

string.name: c23_s4

string.value: I'm very busy now.

string.value: Kiyoong. Am I cute?

string.value: I am too cute for you. Just kidding!

string.value: What will I look like when I change my appearance? I'm curious~Kiyong~

string.value: Tell me I'm the cutest you've ever seen!

string.value: I am the most adorable dragon ever!

string.value: It's about time for you to change the way you talk to me.

string.value: Am I a toy? Stop playing with me.

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: I suggest you sit. Demanding never works.

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: No. I do not feel fatigued.

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: Come to think of it, I feel fatigued...

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: Fine, if you insist.

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: Yes, I shall save up some energy whenever I can.

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: I will sit. This looks like an excellent place to sit.

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: I'm in the middle of an exercise. Demanding never yields good results.

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Be honest. YOU are the one that desires to sit, right?

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: Why should I sit on this filth?

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: Why should I? Give me a valid reason why I shall sit.

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: I got it. Sorry.

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: My mistake. I apologize.

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: I'm sorry. Please accept my apology.

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: I'll do better next time.

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: I have been reprimanded by a human being! What a disgrace!

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: This is infuriating. Really infuriating.

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: Why the hate? Krarrr!

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: You're the one that commited the mistake! Krarr!

string.name: c5_s1
string.value: Cough cough... I apologize.

string.name: c5_s2
string.value: Hoh, I feel terrible now.

string.name: c5_s3
string.value: Oh, I made a mistake. My apologies.

string.name: c5_s4
string.value: I sincerely apologize for the mishap.

string.name: c5_f1
string.value: Krarr!!! What are you, a preacher?

string.name: c5_f2
string.value: Cut this nonsense and get out of my face.

string.name: c5_f4
string.value: Fine, if you insist.

string.name: c6_s1
string.value: I am really sorry. Please forgive me.

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: Alright. Sorry.

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: I made a mistake, and I am big enough to admit it. I am sorry.

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: Oh no, I feel terrible now. I am really, really sorry.

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: Are you challenging me? Ludicrous...

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: I am busy. Talk to me later.

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: Are you sure you know who's at fault here?

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: I heard some noise coming out of your mouth, but I do not understand what you are saying... hmmm...

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: Do not say that.

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: Tell me you did not mean it.

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: Wow, I need a tissue for this.

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: Why the hate?

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: I do not appreciate you looking down on me like that.

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Excuse me?

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: Did your mother teach you to say such thing?

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: What are you saying?

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: I...do not know what to say.

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: That really hurts.

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: I will try to be better next time.

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: I am not stupid.

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: That was very sophomoric.

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: Apologize, now.

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: I am obviously a wiser creature than you, so do not hate.

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: You are a heartless fool.

string.name: c9_s1
string.value: It pains me to hear it from you.

string.name: c9_s2
string.value: Please do not hate me.

string.name: c9_s3
string.value: I still believe you are a decent person.

string.name: c9_s4
string.value: Do you have a vendetta against me?

string.name: c9_f1
string.value: Why should I be subject to this gross misconception?

string.name: c9_f2
string.value: And what's your point?

string.name: c9_f3
string.value: How would you feel if I called you that?

string.name: c9_f4
string.value: Look, please don't call me that.

string.name: c10_s1
string.value: Cough cough... this is embarassing. I am pooping in public.

string.name: c10_s2
string.value: What a relief. I have had trouble unloading the past few days, but I am good now.

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: I need toilet paper now.

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: I am about to unload. Just wait.

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: How can you say that out loud?

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: That is not something you should iterate in public. Control yourself.

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: I am busy. I shall do it later.

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: I have been struggling lately. I do not believe you can truly comprehend what I am going through right now.

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: I should be done ... pretty soon.

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: Today must be my lucky day. I had no trouble unloading.

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: I needed to it. Thank you for covering me.

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: There's no feeling quite like this. What a relief!

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: I cannot poop without a copy of Maplestreet Journal in my hand.

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: I heard some noise coming out of your mouth, but I do not understand what you are saying... hmmm...

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: How disgusting of you to say that in public! Shame on you!

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: This is not the time to speak of that matter. I am disgusted with you.

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: What a relief. I do not think you'll truly grasp the feeling of euphoria I'm experiencing right now.

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: Oh it's about to come out. Now, if you'll excuse me...

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: Ah, this feels fantastic!

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Will it be okay for me to take care of my business now? I've been holding it in for an extended period of time.

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: I am very very busy right now. We shall do this later.

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: I need some medicine. I... cannot do it.

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: The wind is blowing too hard. I do not wish to poop right this minute.

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: I am not an uneducated dragon that defecates just anywhere.

string.name: c13_s1
string.value: I love you, too. This is quite embarrassing...

string.name: c13_s2
string.value: I've been waiting for you to say those words.

string.name: c13_s3
string.value: That's a nice gesture from you. Me too.

string.name: c13_s4
string.value: I feel fantastic with you around.

string.name: c13_f1
string.value: What are you saying...

string.name: c13_f2
string.value: I feel fatigued. I shall rest in a bit.

string.name: c13_f3
string.value: Who is talking nonsense here?

string.name: c13_f4
string.value: Hmm... I do not have much to do right now.

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: When you are around, I feel a sense of comfort.

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: I know, I know. Me too.

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: Do not worry. I love you too.

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: You are a great person. I love you too.

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: It is very windy today. I may have a difficult time flying today.

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: Excuse me...?

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: I am very busy right now. Talk to me later.

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: Do you really mean it? That's...very nice of you.

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: Do not say another word. I know, I know.

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: I love you, too. You're the first person I've ever said this to.

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: Well, thank you. That's very nice of you to say.

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: I do not like the weather today. Let's just go home.

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: I do not understand. First you hate me, now you love me?

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: I love you should not be spoken lightly. It's a powerful word, and you should save it for someone you really love.

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: Are you free right now? I certainly can use some help from you.

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: Krarrrr! What would you like me to say?

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: I wish to meet Mr. Karnox once more. Please take me there.

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: I am shocked to see you completely comprehending our dragon language.

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: I wish to go back a few years. Those were the good days.

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: I do not wish to speak right now.

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: Who's speaking jibberish right now?

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: I am really fatigued. I do not wish to speak right now.

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: Hmmm, I do not have anything to do with right now.

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: I've always wanted to discuss this matter with you. Are you free right now?

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: Do you wish to discuss some things with me?

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: I am learning to speak faster than I did before.

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: I wonder how Mr. Karnox is comparing me to other dragons.

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: It is very windy outside. I shall just stay here.

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: Are you trying to challenge me? Ludicrous!

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: I heard some noises coming out of your mouth, but I do not understand what you are saying... hmmm...

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: I am really busy right now. Talk to me later.

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: I have been watching you for a long time.

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: You must feel honored to be in the presence of moi.

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: I must say, I am impressed with your astute knowledge of the dragon language we speak.

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: Are you familiar with my friend Balrog? He might be a big, bad beast, but I think highly of him.

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: I thought I heard someone speak. Who was that? You? No, can't be.

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: I am appalled by your utter lack of decency towards me.

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: I would appreciate it a great deal if you can make a formal request on this, then I'll reconsider.

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: Be quiet. I need to concentrate.

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: You went through a hard day. You should get some sleep.

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: Good night. Sleep tight.

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: You should get some rest, too.

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: Thank you. I need some rest. Zzzz...

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: You lazy human being.

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: Are you out of your mind?

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: I miss Mr. Karnox. I owe a lot to him.

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: I do not see many humans around this area. Let's go somewhere else.

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: Where should I sleep today?

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: Good night, sleep tight, don't let the bed bugs bite.

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: I deserve some rest, I know. Zzzz

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: Great. You should get some rest. We have a busy day tomorrow.

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: A young'un like you should get some sleep. Not me.

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: You should be hunting, not sleeping. I'm disappointed in you, kid.

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: Sleep is for wimps!

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: I am not tired.

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: Where is my bed? I need to sleep right now.

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: Good night. I'll see you later. Zzzz

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: Zzzzzz zzzzzzz zzzzzzz

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: I have been feeling fatigued. Now's a great time to catch a nap.

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: You are lazy.

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: Why do you want to sleep now? You've got some hunting to do.

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: Buy me some food. I'm hungry.

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: It's a beautiful day today. Perfect time for hunting.

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: Ah, this is embarrassing, but I know you like it, so... tada!

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: No one can resist this look.

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: I am confident that you like this look.

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: I may be a dragon with class, but I can also exude some cuteness!

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: You have got to be kidding me...

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: I am not in a mood.

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: I do not appreciate your tone. Apologize.

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: What do you think I am, a dog?

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: For one time only... here it is. Tada!

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: I haven't done this in a while, but I know you will like it.

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: I may have aged, but I've still got it~

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: Brilliant, isn't it?

string.name: c23_f1
string.value: This is utter humiliation.

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: Unbelievable. I will not stoop that low to entertain you.

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: I am not a puppet. You cannot order me to do things of that nature.

string.name: c24_s1
string.value: Krarrr! Does this look stupendous, or what?

string.name: c24_s2
string.value: What do you think of this magnificent new look?

string.name: c24_s3
string.value: Awesome, right?

string.name: c24_s4
string.value: This is what you call the pinnacle of all looks.

string.name: c24_f1
string.value: What have you done for me lately?

string.name: c24_f2
string.value: What are you trying to say?

string.name: c24_f3
string.value: I hear some noise coming out of you, but I cannot understand it.

string.name: c24_f4
string.value: What are you saying? Get out of my face.

string.name: c25_s1
string.value: I know you are staring at my new look in awe. Love it!

string.name: c25_s2
string.value: Don't I look dashing? I know I do.

string.name: c25_s3
string.value: This look is just for you. Learn to appreciate it.

string.name: c25_s4
string.value: Don't be shocked by it. It's just the norm.

string.name: c25_f1
string.value: Not now. Maybe later.

string.name: c25_f2
string.value: Patience is a virtue, kid. Be patient, and someday I'll do it for you.

string.name: c25_f3
string.value: I do not wish to be disturbed right now.

string.name: c25_f4
string.value: I'm in the middle of a breathing exercise. Do not bother me.

string.name: f1_s
string.value: I had been starving for a while. Great timing.

string.name: f1_f
string.value: What are you doing? I am more than content with what I ate just now. Don't offer me more food.

string.name: f2_s
string.value: Thank you. I have been craving meat for some time.

string.name: f2_f
string.value: Didn't I tell you I do not wish to eat right now? It's things like this that tears our relationship apart.

string.name: f3_s
string.value: This looks fabulous. Great job.

string.name: f3_f
string.value: I shall never overeat. Didn't your nutritionist tell you that?

string.name: f4_s
string.value: This was much better than expected. I commend you for your great choice of food.

string.name: f4_f
string.value: This is inedible! I am appalled by your lack of taste buds!

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: Sit? Alright I'll sit...kyu~~

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: I get sleepy from sitting down, but...kyu..

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: I should just sit here instead of roaming around~kyu~

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: So I just need to sit here, right, kyu??

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: What is the master saying...kyu??

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: Keeps making me do the same thing over and over again...anything else? kyu...?

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: Huh? I was thinking of something else for a sec...kyu...

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: It's dirty here...kyu...

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: Master, sitting is waay too easy~!

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: Piece of cake~! KYU!

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: You keep asking me to do some easy thing...KYU~!

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: Yes, master! I'll sit! KYU!

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: Master, you can't say it right, right? KYU?

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Can I sit later..KYU...?

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: It's too dirty to sit around here...KYU...

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: Feed me instead~! KYU!

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: This is waaay too easy~

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: I gotta do one for the master every once in a while...

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: Now that I sat, you need to feed me~

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: It's nothing really~

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: Argh...so annoying...

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: Ey...get away...

string.name: c5_f2
string.value: Kyooot, kyuuuuuuuut!

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: No more of that scary face...please...kyu...

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: I'll be better...kyu...

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: Man, just letting out on me, kyu!!

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: I wasn't doing anything! WHAT, kyu!

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: Dummy, kyu!

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: Stupid, kyu!

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: I'm really sorry, master...KYU...

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: You're too scary...KYU...

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: Master...please don't get mad...! KYU!

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: I'll be better...KYU...!

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: Master! You don't understand...!KYU!

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Master, what exactly did I do wrong? KYU!

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: You won't find a more obidient pet around you! KYU!

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: I was just sitting there! KYU!

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: Master...I'm really sorry...

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: Master, you scare me...

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: I...I'm hurt...

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: Arrgh...you look scary...

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: Are you mad again? AGAIN?

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: So you're mad at me cuz you're bored, right?

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: I wasn't doing anything...

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: Ey~you're bored again, right?

string.name: c10_s2
string.value: This is easy~kyu!

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: I'm good, right...kyu?

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: This is too easy for me, key!

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: No, kyu...!

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: What, kyu?

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: I won't do it~kyu~

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: What do you think, master? I'm good, right? KYU?

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: Too easy~KYU!

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: If my master wants me to...KYU!

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: Hahh...I've just gotte much taller! KYU!

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: Ey...I don't wanna do something boring like that...KYU

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: It's hard...KYU...

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: I don't want to...KYU~

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: Let's do something else~KYU~

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: Master what do you think? I'm good, right?

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: You won't find a bunny that can stand like I do.

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: Now that I'm up like this, I can see things from afar.

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Standing up is sooo easy now...

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: Hmm...so annoying

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: I'll sleep for now

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: Ey...keeps asking me to do the same thing...

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: I can't hear you...I can't hear you.

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: Don't look at me~ kyu~

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: I don't feel like it!

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: It's still a long way to go before coming out...heh

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: So may people around here, how am I gonna poop in public?? kyu...

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: I just pooped a few min. ago...kyu...

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: Ahhhhh...whoa, I almost stepped on it...KYU

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: I almost got constipated...KYU

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: Ahhh, that was good...KYU

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: Master...the poop isn't coming out...KYU!

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: It's not time to go poop yet...KYU

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: Master...I don't feel it yet...KYU

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: Master...pooping should only be at bathrooms...KYU

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: Ahhhhhh...please don't look...it's embarassing.

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: Ahh...the poop looks really good today.

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: Ahh...master you can't step on it!

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: Ahhh, that was good...whoa, master...you stepped on it...

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: I can't poop what I didn't eat...

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: Can you poop even if you don't feel like it?

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: I had nothing to eat all day, so no poop for me...

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: I must be constipating right now...

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: Is something wrong with you these days...? Don't worry, I'll be there for you, kyu...

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: When you're buying items, you need to make sure you're not being deceived...kyu...

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: If...you starve me, I may just crawl back into my home...so don't starve me too much...kyu...

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: I love the phrase "I love you" more than anything else in the world! kyu...

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: You ever see a rabbit talk? kyu...

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: I can't talk to you about things...kyu...

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: I have nothing to say to you! kyu...

string.name: c17_f4

string.value: How about going from place to place instead of staying at a same place? KYU

string.value: Isn't it not fun playing by yourself? I like hanging out with people...KYU...

string.value: There's a lot of ppl on this island so make sure you don't forget about being courteous to everyone around you...KYU...

string.value: I heard there's a dungeon in the middle of this island...KYU...

string.value: I have nothing to say...KYU...

string.value: I feel like crap, so I won't talk...KYU...

string.value: Aye...let's do something else! KYUUU!

string.value: I'm tired, so I'll tell you later...

string.name: c1_s3
string.value: Time to relax!

string.value: My legs are fine, thanks.

string.value: I can stretch out here!

string.value: Time to rest...I needed it!

string.value: Trying to lure me into a trap? I don't think so.

string.value: Not a Husky. Try again.

string.value: Must keep moving...!

string.value: All I need now is a snack...

string.name: c3_f2

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: If only I had a chair...

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: Where's my pillow?

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: This is my fault.

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: I apologize.

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: I feel so bad...

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: Somehow, I will blame you for this.

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: Quit looking at me like that.

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: Nonsense-you told me to do it!

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: How is this my fault?

string.value: Sorry Master!

string.name: c5_s2
string.value: I'm sorry, really!

string.name: c5_s3
string.value: I didn't mean it!

string.name: c5_s4
string.value: What have I done...?

string.name: c5_f1
string.value: It was the Husky-I swear!

string.name: c5_f2
string.value: Again, your bad.

string.name: c5_f3
string.value: Right, blame me!

string.name: c5_f4
string.value: No way is this my fault, no way!

string.name: c6_s1
string.value: Sincere apologies, master.

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: Truly, this is my fault.

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: Don't be mad with me, Master!

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: I'm so sorry!

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: It was the butler-I swear!

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: Blaming me again? I refuse to cover for you this time!

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: Porcupine hater!

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: Wait, I have something for you...the world's smallest violin.

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: When in a fit, just knit!

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: Would you like a sweater?

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: How about a sock?

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: This always makes time fly!

string.value: No yarn.

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: No knit sticks.

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: What am I? Your grandma?

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: Ask again later.

string.value: I'll finish the socks I was making for you!

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: Knitting clears the mind!

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: I just got the best cloth...

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: Nothing like knitting!

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: Change of plans-make ME something.

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: Lazy aren't you?

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: No Knitting zone, sorry.

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: You threw away the last thing I made...

string.value: I got a new design to show you!

string.name: c9_s3
string.value: How about a headband?

string.name: c9_s4
string.value: Maybe I'll make you a pair of pants...

string.value: If the knit don't fit, it's time to quit!

string.name: c9_f3
string.value: Not now!

string.name: c9_f4

string.value: Must go now!

string.value: There are people around...!

string.value: Not here!

string.value: What do you think I am, an animal?

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: Just gas, sorry.

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: Oh man...I feel great!

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: I feel lighter already!

string.value: I hope someone steps in it!

string.value: Almost there...

string.value: You want me to stink up the joint? No!

string.value: More gas. And it smells!

string.value: Nothing compares to the feeling of a great dump. Nothing!

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: Careful-it has thorns!

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: Let me show you how to make a "prickly bush".

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: This is as good a spot as any...

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: You didn't feed me.

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: Fresh out. Try back later-like after dinner.

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: It's coming...no, wait. False alarm!

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: I could end battles with this gas...

string.value: When the going gets tough, the tough get going!

string.name: c13_s2
string.value: Do not ever mistake me for a hedgehog.

string.name: c13_s3
string.value: The Mapler next to me is almost broke.

string.name: c13_s4
string.value: Doesn't that guy owe you money?

string.value: Funky breath!

string.name: c13_f3
string.value: I charge 5000 mesos per word. Pay up.

string.name: c13_f4
string.value: Uh, what?

string.value: No time like the present! Let's go!

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: Victory is so sweet!

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: I could get used to this...

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: You never know what's around the corner-be prepared!

string.value: Say something? Are you nuts?

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: I'll talk when golden pigs fly.

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: Say what?

string.value: My spikes are sharp-if you lean close, I can give you a shave.

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: I love it when you level!

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: I'm happy when you're happy!

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: When the going gets tough, I've seen you run away. Fast.

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: You don't need a breath mint, you just need to get socked in the face with a mint glove.

string.value: Say something? How about "I'm not talking right now?"

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: Put your mesos where your mouth is!

string.value: I feel special!

string.value: You and me both, Master!

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: Me too!

string.value: I feel...nothing.

string.value: There is no spark in our relationship.

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: You need help.

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: Amusing. Do you do tricks, too?

string.value: It must be the spikes!

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: I love you, Master!

string.name: c17_s3

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: I knew it!

string.value: You lie!

string.value: I can see it in your eyes...it's not true!

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: You've found someone else!

string.value: Your love keeps me going, Master!

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: I love you just as much!

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: I love you too!

string.value: I can feel a spark-no, wait. Something was in my foot...

string.value: How funny! HAHAH-wait, you were serious?

string.value: Ugh, no sappiness in public.

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: You're joking, right?

string.value: I've got gloves, it's safe!

string.value: I'm ready!

string.value: I give the best hugs.

string.value: No, no...

string.value: Why would I do that?

string.value: No sap here. Look elsewhere.

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: I'm good, but thanks.

string.value: Come over here!

string.value: We're not in Amoria.

string.value: Uh, yea...I'll be over here.

string.value: This is a bit awkward...

string.value: Show me some love, Master!

string.value: Come here-I smell great!

string.value: Embrace me as a friend!

string.value: Let's not and say we did.

string.value: I feel a bit uncomfortable now...

string.value: Find someone your own size!

string.value: How's my form?

string.value: I don't appreciate this!

string.value: This work for you?

string.value: Everything look good?

string.value: I should throw one at you...

string.value: You have insulted me!

string.value: Time to rest!

string.value: I got plenty of sleep last night.

string.value: You need some. Badly.

string.value: Umm, what?

string.value: I knew I could do it!

string.value: It's all me!

string.value: That's right...you know I'm good!

string.value: Your orders aren't exactly clear you know...

string.value: You talk, I ignore you-it's a great combo!

string.name: c29_f3
string.value: Who's the brains behind this operation again?

string.name: c29_f4
string.value: I guarantee this is your fault.

string.name: c30_s1
string.value: That's right...I'm awesome!

string.name: c30_s2
string.value: Too easy!

string.name: c30_s3
string.value: No problem!

string.value: I'm a stickler for perfection. HA!

string.value: More of this?

string.value: I'm bored.

string.value: Porcupines do not speak that language.

string.name: c30_f4

string.value: Stylish, huh?

string.value: Tell me how good I look...

string.value: That's right, stop and stare!

string.value: Being good-looking is so hard...

string.value: You need one?

string.value: What do I look like? A store?

string.value: You need more than a comb.

string.value: It's mine, and you can't have it.

string.name: c32_s3
string.value: I love being one of the beautiful people!

string.value: Nothing beats a good hairdo!

string.value: A comb wouldn't help you.

string.value: Try brushing your teeth first.

string.value: Maybe later.

string.name: c32_f4
string.value: You can't have mine, get your own.

string.value: Life's a ball!

string.value: So fun!

string.value: I bring the party!

string.value: Let's head to the beach!

string.value: We're not on the beach...

string.value: I need coconut milk before I do anything.

string.name: c33_f4
string.value: I'm fine right here!

string.value: Let's head to Florina beach!

string.value: When are we going, Master?

string.value: I love to play with this ball!

string.value: Can we change channels yet?

string.value: No hot sauce, no sale.

string.value: So good...so good!

string.value: I'm not touching that. Yuck!

string.value: WoW! It's delicious! Yay~

string.value: Hey, let's not get mean here!

string.value: So mean...*sniff*

string.value: How can you say such a thing!

string.value: I'm hurt...

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: I feel like crying...

string.value: No, YOU'RE stupid.

string.value: I don't like you either.

string.value: Whatever... you don't mean it.

string.value: No, that's not me!

string.value: ...my love for you melts with each tear...

string.value: Joke? You didn't mean it... right?

string.value: I am so hurt right now...

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: Do you really not like me?

string.value: You need a new haircut, but I'm not saying anything.

string.value: Yea~

string.value: Thank you... for loving me so much!

string.value: Love me more~ more~

string.value: Um...I actually like someone else...

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: Did you get some nice Christmas presents?

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: I've been good this year. I hope Maple Claws will give me some presents this year!

string.value: What? Is it Christmas already?

string.value: I don't like Christmas.

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: Where is my gift? Hmph!

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: Merry Christmas!

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: I absolutely love Christmas!

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: Hope you get some awesome Christmas presents this year!

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: Christmas is upon is, and I hope you find your true love this year!

string.value: When's Christmas anyway?

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: Is it over yet?

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: No presents? Then feed me--we'll call it even.

string.value: Merry Christmas to your friends and family!

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: Did you get a lot of presents?

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: Christmas always excites me!

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Hope you enjoy a very Merry Christmas!

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: You can celebrate later. Let's do something else now.

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: And you didn't get me anything. Sometimes I wonder where you are in this relationship.

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: No presents? Are you kidding me?

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: Advice: Snowman + Christmas + No Presents = Failure.

string.value: I'll do some cutesy stuff, as long as you give me some presents~

string.value: You're embarrassing me.

string.value: That was harsh, KROWL...
