string.name: c12_s3
string.value: That was scary. Kiii...

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: I'll be better... much better....

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: I'm good, you're bad... Yes that's it!

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: Bad! You don't love me anymore!

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: I'm the most obedient pet around! AHHH

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: Say it again and I'll ignore you.

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: Don't look at me~

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: You expect me to poop in public?

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: I just did...

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: No Master... No...

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: Don't want to!

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: It's embarassing...

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: Ahhh I feel so much better...

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: Ahhh, that was good...

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: Look at that Master... Have you ever seen a monkey poop?

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: How can I poop when nothing's coming out?

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: What did you just say?

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: I don't feel like it! ARP! ARP!

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: It isn't nice for a monkey to poop here...

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: Ah that feels good...

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: Oh that was fast...

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: Ah that is what I call real Monkey Business!

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: How am I supposed to pee when you didn't even feed me?

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: The toilet isn't here Master...

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: Why don't you poop in public too?

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: Don't you have anything better to do than asking me to poop the whole day?

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: ARP!! ARP!!

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: Me too!

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: That's nice of you...

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: Wow really? Thanks!

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: Yeah right....

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: Feed me first.

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: Me ear feels a little itchy here...

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: I can't hear yooooooooo...

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: I love you too Master.. kiiii...

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: Hmm, Master you're so nice to me!

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: I feel nice and warm inside!

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: I love you too! Give me a hug!

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: Are you sure Master?

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: That was a typo right?

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: I'm sure you don't! ARP!

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: You're referring to somebody else, right?

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: You're the best Master a monkey can have!

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: I love you too! What about going for a hunt together?

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: Keep loving me!

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: I'm such a lucky monkey to have you as my Master

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: It is bad to tell lies Master, Please don't.

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: I love bananas more than I love you!

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: Are you sure? You haven't hugged me for ages!

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: I'm sure you love your new weapon more! ARP!

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: This is easy!

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: Yay, I can stand!

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: What did you just say?

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: Don't feel like it! ARP!

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: What? Sit?

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: I'm standing... Aren't I?

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: Look! I'm standing!

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: Master aren't I good?

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: I love standing, do you?

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: I can stand! I can stand!

string.name: c23_f1
string.value: No food, no stand!

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: Huh? My ear feels a liitle itchy here...

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: Stand? Strand? Stan?

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: I'll stand if you feed me!

string.name: c24_s1
string.value: Have you ever seen a monkey standing so straight?

string.name: c24_s2
string.value: Look Master! Aren't I good at this?

string.name: c24_s3
string.value: Up! I'm standing UP!

string.name: c24_s4
string.value: I did it! Master! I'm standing!

string.name: c24_f1
string.value: I'd rather climb a tree!

string.name: c24_f2
string.value: Can't you see I'm already standing?

string.name: c24_f3
string.value: Monkeys don't stand... we swing!

string.name: c24_f4
string.value: I'm tired running after you! I don't want to stand!

string.name: c25_s1
string.value: Look master, do you see a banana there?

string.name: c25_s2
string.value: I love the way you talk to me.

string.name: c25_s3
string.value: I love bananas! Do feed me more of those!

string.name: c25_s4
string.value: I love you Master! Do you love me too?

string.name: c25_f1
string.value: NO! Don't feel like talking!

string.name: c25_f2
string.value: What do you expect me to say?

string.name: c25_f3
string.value: I'm hungry.

string.name: c25_f4
string.value: I want to sleep instead...

string.name: c26_s1
string.value: Instead of killing monsters, you can do quests to level up too!

string.name: c26_s2
string.value: Monkeys love bananas! I bet you didn't know that.

string.name: c26_s3
string.value: I hate people who abuse their pets, don't you?

string.name: c26_s4
string.value: If you don't feed me, I'll go back home and not come out!

string.name: c26_f1
string.value: It is rude to wake a monkey from its sleep! ARP!

string.name: c26_f2
string.value: Talk talk talk.. I want to do something else.

string.name: c26_f3
string.value: Tell me honestly, have you ever heard a monkey speak?

string.name: c26_f4
string.value: I have nothing to say to you! ARP! ARP!

string.name: c27_s1
string.value: We pets are created by Cloy of Henesys.

string.name: c27_s2
string.value: If you don't feed me well, I'll just run away!

string.name: c27_s3
string.value: If you buy me a meso magnet and item pouch I can collect all your loot for you!

string.name: c27_s4
string.value: I won't live forever, so do treasure me when I'm around!

string.name: c27_f1
string.value: What do you expect me to tell you when I'm always following you around?

string.name: c27_f2
string.value: Don't you have any other things to do?

string.name: c27_f3
string.value: Why don't you ask my lupin brothers to talk to you instead?

string.name: c27_f4
string.value: Isn't it better for you to talk to your buddies instead?

string.name: c28_s1
string.value: Play with me! kiiii...

string.name: c28_s2
string.value: What shall we do?

string.name: c28_s3
string.value: Are you bored too?

string.name: c28_s4
string.value: Good to hear that!

string.name: c28_f1
string.value: What did you just say?

string.name: c28_f2
string.value: I am hungry

string.name: c28_f3
string.value: Play with yourself!

string.name: c28_f4
string.value: So annoying!

string.name: c29_s1
string.value: Wow really?

string.name: c29_s2
string.value: I've wanted to play with you all day long!

string.name: c29_s3
string.value: What do you want to do?

string.name: c29_s4
string.value: Let's have some fun!

string.name: c29_f1
string.value: Go somewhere else!

string.name: c29_f2
string.value: Can't you see I'm busy now?

string.name: c29_f3
string.value: Feed me first... then I will think about it!

string.name: c29_f4
string.value: Don't even want to move my tail...

string.name: c30_s1
string.value: I've been waitiing for you to say that!

string.name: c30_s2
string.value: You rock!

string.name: c30_s3
string.value: It's about time!

string.name: c30_s4
string.value: I'm thinking of how we are going to play Master!

string.name: c30_f1
string.value: Food! Food! Food! Food first!

string.name: c30_f2
string.value: We just did, didn't we?

string.name: c30_f3
string.value: What did you just say?

string.name: c30_f4
string.value: Well... I am sleepy now...

string.name: c34_s1
string.value: Hmmm... So comfortable!

string.name: c34_s3
string.value: Yawn... Sleepy sleepy!

string.name: c34_f1
string.value: Who sleeps in the middle of the day? Not me!

string.name: c34_f2
string.value: It's PLAYTIME!

string.name: c34_f3
string.value: How to sleep when I'm hungry?

string.name: c34_f4
string.value: Read me a story first?

string.name: c35_s1
string.value: Good night Master...

string.name: c35_s2
string.value: Yawn... Bedtime!

string.name: c35_s3
string.value: That was kind of you Master, I'm indeed tired!

string.name: c35_s4
string.value: Cuddle me!

string.name: c35_f1
string.value: Don't want to sleep! Let's climb trees instead?

string.name: c35_f2
string.value: I just woke up! ARP!

string.name: c35_f3
string.value: I'm not as lazy as you think Master...

string.name: c35_f4
string.value: If you aren't training, I am!

string.name: f1_s
string.value: kii! kii!

string.name: f2_s
string.value: Food... Food...

string.name: f2_f
string.value: I am so full!

string.name: f3_s
string.value: Master! This is so delicious!

string.name: f3_f
string.value: No more for me... too full!

string.name: f4_s
string.value: Master! I like this a lot!

string.name: f4_f
string.value: Master... are you trying to kill me?

string.name: s2
string.value: No, no, nope.

string.name: s3
string.value: I thought you were a good Master...

string.name: s4
string.value: Kii, I thought I told you, I am against those bad words.

string.name: c1_s1
string.value: Yip! Yip!

string.name: c1_s2
string.value: Yip! Yip! Yip!

string.name: c1_f1
string.value: *Pant Pant*

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: I sat. Yip!

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: I'm a good boy, right? Gimme a treat! Yip yip!

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: Yip! Yip! Ooh, comfy!

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: Yip! Yip! I sat, so gimme a treat!

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: Yip? No! No!

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: Yip! Yip! I can't do it!

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: I wanna stand. Yip!

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: You sit down too, master! Yip!

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: Yip! Yip! I like sitting.

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: Yip! I'm good at everything!

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: Too easy! Yip yip!

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: You're taking it easy on me 'cause you care. Right, master? Yip!

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: *Whimper* I don't wanna!

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Yip! Yip! This is hard!

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: Yip! Sorry master, but I can't!

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: Yip! My legs are numb. I can't move...

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: Yip! There's nothing I can't do if I'm with you, master!

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: Yip! Yip! I practice every day, just for you!

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: Master! Master! Look at me! Yip!

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: Am I doing good, master? Am I? Yip!

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: Yip! Yip! I can't, my butt hurts!

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: This is boring. Let's try something harder! Yip!

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: I can't. Why? I don't know... Yip...

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: Yip? Watch me!

string.name: c5_s1
string.value: Yip... Yip... Yip...

string.name: c5_f2
string.value: Yip! Yip!

string.name: c6_s1
string.value: Yip! Sorry! Sorry!

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: Yip. I'll do what you tell me...

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: Yip. I'm sorry! I'm sorry!

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: I'll do better. Yip!

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: Yip! I didn't do anything bad!

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: Yip! I thought you liked me!

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: I didn't do anything... Yip.

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: Grr... Bad master!

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: Sorry. I'll be good! Yip yip!

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: I'll do my best. Yip!

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: I didn't know any better. Forgive me! Yip!

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: *Whimper* Forgive me!

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: It was a mistake! Forgive me! Yip!

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Yip! Everyone makes mistakes.

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: Yip! It was just one mistake!

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: You're mean... Yip!

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: Yip! Yip! I'll be careful.

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: *Whimper* Forgive me!

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: Yip! I'm sorry, master!

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: My mistake! Yip! Sorry, master!

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: Yip! Don't be mad!

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: It's just a tiny mistake. Yip!

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: I don't wanna be in trouble. Yip!

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: I didn't do it! Yip!

string.name: c9_f2
string.value: Yip? Yip?

string.name: c10_s1
string.value: No? No?

string.name: c10_s2
string.value: *Whimper* I don't get it...

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: *Whimper* You're bad...

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: Yip! I am too a smart doggy!

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: Yip! Takes one to know one!

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: Yip! Yip! I agree!

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: You and me both. Yip!

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: Bad joke! Yip!

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: Yip! I am smart! I am!

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: Yip? You really think so?

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: But you still like me, right? Right?

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: I still like you, master. Yip!

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: Yip! I'm tired of this joke.

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: I know you don't mean it. Yip!

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: Let's talk about something else. Yip!

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: Grr... You're no fun...

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: Why so serious, master? Yip!

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: I think I'm smart... Yip.

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: Well, I think you're the bee's knees! Yip!

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: *Whimper* Bad, master! Bad!

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: Is this a new game? Yip! Idiot! Mutt! Bad master!

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: I know you don't mean it. Yip!

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: Yip! Stop lying to me!

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: No! Yip! I'm a big strong doggy!

string.name: c13_f1
string.value: Yip? Yip yip?

string.name: c13_f2
string.value: Yip! Yip yip!

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: I-I think it moved! Yip!

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: I pooped! I pooped! Yippee!

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: Yip! Yip! Your turn, master!

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: I thought I was constipated, but...nope! Yip!

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: Yip! But I already did! Yip!

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: I can't. My tummy hurts. *Whimper*

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: *Whimper* Poo is dirty.

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: Yip! I need a bag for my poop!

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: Poop. Poop! Hee hee! Poop!

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: Yip! This one looks just like me! Yip!

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: Yip! Yip! Okay, now clean it up!

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: Watch out! I pooped there! Yip!

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: I can't just poop all day, you know? Yip!

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: Yip... I think I'm constipated... Grr...

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: I'm trying, but there's nothing to poo.

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: Master, bathrooms are for pooping!

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: Yip! It doesn't smell bad, does it?

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: Wipe my butt, please. Yip!

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: *Whimper* Look at it! It's huge!

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: Yip! Yip! Be careful! I dumped it right next to you.

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: Yip! I don't wanna poop!

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: I can't go right now. Yip yip!

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: *Whimper* I'll go tomorrow.

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: You first, master! Yip!

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: I like waking up early! Yip yip yip!

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: You're my favorite! If anyone else likes you, I'll bite 'em! Yip!

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: Yip! Let's do a quest! Wanna do a quest? Let's do a quest!

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: When I look into your eyes, it's like I can read your mind. Yip!

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: Yip! Yip! I'm studying humanese!

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: Yip! Yip! I wanna be quiet right now. Yip yip yip yip yip!

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: *Whimper* It's so cloudy today. I wish the sun was out.

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: I got nothing special to say. Yip!

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: Admins never ask for your password! Yip! What's a password?

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: I could look at you all day. Yip yip!

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: Is there really a scary dragon living in Leafre? Yip!

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: Yip! What do you like most about me, master? Yip yip!

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: Yip! Woah, I'm so out of it right now.

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: I tried to look up my horoscope, but I can't read. Yip!

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: Yip! Yip yip! My back ITCHES!

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: Yip! Yip! I can read your miiiind!

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: Thanks to all the treats, I got a tummy! Yip!

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: I'm not scared of no monsters! Just gimme potions. Yip!

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: You look JUST like me, master. Yip!

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: Yip! Yip! My tail's wagging! Look at it go!

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: I'm hungry. Gimme a snack. Yip!

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: Let's get on a boat! Yip!

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: Yip. What do you want me to say?

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: Yip yip yip! Tell me a joke!

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: Don't I look cool? Yip! Yip!

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: I can do this all by myself! Yip!

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: Am I doing it right?

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: Yip! Yip! My tummy's on the ground.

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: Yip! Does this make my butt look big?

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: Ah, where'd you go?

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: This is hard... Yip!

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: Gimme more time to practice. Yip! Yip!

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: Aren't I good? Gimme a treat! Yip!

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: I practiced hard. Yip!

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: Yip! I can do ANYTHING! Yip yip!

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: How do I look? Yip!

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: Brr, the floor's cold. Yip!

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: Ugh, my stomach. It hurts to crawl. Yip yip!

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: I'm still working on it. Teach me to do it better! Yip.

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: Yip! Yip! This is uncomfortable!

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: I could do this with my eyes closed. Yip!

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: I'm a good boy, right! Gimme a treat! Gimme a treat! Yip!

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: Like this? Yip!

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: I'd even get you the stars from the sky if you ask me, master. Yip!

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: Sitting down is more comfy. Yip!

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: Yip yip! This is haaaard!

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: *Whimper*My back huuurts. Someone hit me yesterday!

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: Yip! Yip! This is too hard.

string.value: Yip yip yip!

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: Yip! Yip! Yip!

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: Yip? Yip?

string.name: c24_s1
string.value: I'm your best pet! Yip!

string.name: c24_s2
string.value: I'll follow you anywhere! Yip!

string.name: c27_s2
string.value: You know how I feel about this, right? WEK~

string.name: c27_s3
string.value: I love you too, master! WEK!

string.name: c27_s4
string.value: Yay, I'm being loved by my master~ WEK!

string.name: c27_f1
string.value: And what do you want from me? WEK.

string.name: c27_f2
string.value: What? I didn't hear you. WEK.

string.name: c27_f3
string.value: Um, you're funny. WEK.

string.name: c27_f4
string.value: I know you say that to others, too. WEK.

string.name: c28_s1
string.value: Me, me me me!!!

string.name: c28_s2
string.value: I'll always love you, master.

string.name: c28_s3
string.value: No way. Really? Really? Awww...

string.name: c28_s4
string.value: I love you too, master! Yay!!

string.name: c28_f2
string.value: We penguins don't take that phrase "I love you" lightly.

string.name: c28_f3
string.value: If you don't mean that, that I don't think you should say it.

string.name: c28_f4
string.value: What a full-fledged lie.

string.name: c29_s1
string.value: Here, WEK!

string.name: c29_s2
string.value: I'm good, right? WEK WEK!

string.name: c29_s3
string.value: So I should just stick it out like this? WEK..

string.name: c29_f1
string.value: No, WEK!

string.name: c29_f2
string.value: I'm too tired... WEK.

string.name: c29_f3
string.value: What? WEK.

string.name: c30_s1
string.value: Like this, right? WEK.

string.name: c30_s2
string.value: You know I'm the bomb, WEK.

string.name: c30_s3
string.value: Haha, this is fun. WEK.

string.name: c30_f1
string.value: No way, I'm too tired. WEK.

string.name: c30_f2
string.value: I'm too lazy to do this. WEK.

string.name: c30_f3
string.value: What are you saying, WEK.

string.name: c31_s1
string.value: Here's my hand, err, wing.

string.name: c31_s2
string.value: Heavy, isn't it? I can't fly with these, though.

string.name: c31_s3
string.value: Is it fluffy? It feels good, right? This is fuuuun!

string.name: c31_f1
string.value: Ugh, this is quite a chore.

string.name: c31_f2
string.value: Nah, maybe next time.

string.name: c31_f3
string.value: What am I, a dog? I'm a penguin, you know!

string.name: c32_s1
string.value: Ahhh, here's a smooch.

string.name: c32_s2
string.value: I'm blushing...

string.name: c32_s3
string.value: Make sure not to leave a hole on my cheek!

string.name: c32_f1
string.value: Um... do you know exactly where we are right now?

string.name: c32_f2
string.value: Go brush your teeth first.

string.name: c32_f3
string.value: No way, I don't wanna do it.

string.name: c33_s1
string.value: I like smooches, too.

string.name: c33_s2
string.value: I've been dreaming of these~!

string.name: c33_s3
string.value: Don't do it for too long, though. Yay!

string.name: c33_s4
string.value: Kiss me again!

string.name: c33_f1
string.value: Who in the right mind would wanna kiss you?

string.name: c33_f2
string.value: Not me...no way.

string.name: c33_f3
string.value: You ain't doing this for free.

string.name: c33_f4
string.value: Tell me that was a joke.

string.name: c34_s1
string.value: Yoo hoo! I'm flyinnnng!

string.name: c34_s2
string.value: Look! I can fly!

string.name: c34_s3
string.value: I deserve a trophy for this performance!

string.name: c34_s4
string.value: I believe I can fly!!! WEK WEK!

string.name: c34_f1
string.value: Um...don't I look a litttttle hefty for that?

string.name: c34_f2
string.value: Hey, have you ever seen a flying penguin?

string.name: c34_f3
string.value: You must have lost your mind.

string.name: c34_f4
string.value: What are you saying...?

string.name: c35_s1
string.value: Isn't this cool??

string.name: c35_s2
string.value: Show me another penguin that can fly like me.

string.name: c35_s3
string.value: Don't I look MAGNIFICENT?

string.name: c35_s4
string.value: No need to waste time. Here we go!

string.name: c35_f1
string.value: Yo, I'm afraid of height.

string.name: c35_f2
string.value: You fly first!

string.name: c35_f3
string.value: I suggest you study a little on penguin's anatomy.

string.name: c35_f4
string.value: Um, have you heard of Law of Gravity? Hello!!

string.name: c36_s1
string.value: I'm at a loss for words...WEK!

string.name: c36_s2
string.value: It's hard to find a penguin as cute-looking as me! WEK!

string.name: c36_s3
string.value: Hey, I've been cute for quite some time, you know! WEK!

string.name: c36_s4
string.value: Really? You're not kidding, right? WEK!

string.name: c36_f1
string.value: I can't trust you, WEK.

string.name: c36_f2
string.value: I'm not CUTE. I'm DASHING. WEK!!!

string.name: c36_f3
string.value: I NEED SOME TRUTH AROUND HERE! WEK!

string.name: c36_f4
string.value: What do you want me to say in return, WEK?

string.name: c37_s1
string.value: Of course, master!

string.name: c37_s2
string.value: You won't find a penguin quite like me. Enjoy it!

string.name: c37_s3
string.value: I can never get enough of your compliments!

string.name: c37_s4
string.value: Thanks for your kind words! I really appreciate that!

string.name: c37_f1
string.value: Since when did we compliment each other anyway...

string.name: c37_f2
string.value: Um, how about a NO.

string.name: c37_f3
string.value: Let me just sleep, okay?

string.name: c37_f4
string.value: Feed me instead of waxing stupid poetics like that.

string.name: f2_s
string.value: FOOD!!! WEK!

string.name: f2_f
string.value: I can't eat no more. WEK.

string.name: f3_s
string.value: Now this tastes good... WEK~~

string.name: f3_f
string.value: Ugh, I feel like throwing up. WEK.

string.name: f4_s
string.value: FISH! Woo hoo!

string.name: f4_f
string.value: I need to be on a diet.

string.name: s2
string.value: Wek... Wek...

string.name: s3
string.value: Master, Please.... Wek...Wek...

string.name: s4
string.value: Master~ Behave yourself~ Wek...

string.name: c1_s1
string.value: Mew! Mew!

string.name: c1_s2
string.value: Mrrrow! Mew!

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: Like this? Meow!

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: Okay, let's rest here. Meow!

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: Mew! So comfortable!

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: Good idea, master!

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: Meow... Here?

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: I don't want to sit here.

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: Am I still okay? Meow!

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: Let's walk some more.

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: Yes, a rest would be nice.

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: Shall we take a break?

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: Okay! Here? Right here?

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: Oh, my legs are sore. Thank you. Mrow!

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: Ew, the floor's dirty here!

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Don't order me around like that! Meow!

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: Meow... I don't sit in places like this.

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: Ask me nicely.

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: You read my mind. Mew!

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: A nice, leisurely rest would be nice...mrow!

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: Some weather, huh? Let's relax for a while, master. Meow!

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: Whatever you want, master. Meow!

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: Meow. Don't tell me what to do!

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: You can't always get what you want, master.

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: Do I look like a remote control cat to you?

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: Enough. Stop it.

string.name: c5_s2
string.value: Hm... Meow!

string.name: c5_f2
string.value: Meow! Meow!

string.name: c6_s1
string.value: Meow! I'm sorry.

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: I won't do it again. Meow!

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: Meow... I'm scared, master.

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: Don't hit me!

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: Why are you doing this? MROW!

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: What have I done wrong? Meow!

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: You're so weird!

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: Meow! Why are you in such a bad mood?

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: Please...cut me some slack. Mew.

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: I'm sorry! Forgive me! Forgive me!

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: I-I c-c-can't stop cryyyyiiiing!

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: H-how can you yell at me like that?!

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: Why are you taking it out on me? MROW!

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Don't make me mad!

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: Meow! I didn't do anything wrong. Bad master!

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: You're heartless!

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: I'm sorry! I won't do it again. Meow...

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: You're not enjoying this, are you?

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: Meow... D-don't get mad...

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: Are you really abandoning me? Meow! Meow!

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: You'll regret this, master! Meow!

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: I-I'll run away!

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: You're so annoying! Mew!

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: You're asking for it! MROW!

string.name: c10_s2
string.value: Meow! Me too!

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: Master! Mew!

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: You're the best!

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: Come again?

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: I can't hear you. Meow?

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: Liar! I don't believe you! MROW!

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: Meow! ...You're embarrassing me.

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: Really? Meow!

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: Say it again! Say it again! Mew!

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: MEOW! You're the best! Mew! Mew!

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: Are you feeling okay?

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: Mrow... You know I'm a cat, right?

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: I'm sure you say that to all your pets.

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: Mrrow... What can I say to that?

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: ...Well, I am lovable.

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: I'm happy to follow you around. Meow!

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: I'm the luckiest cat.

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: You're the best master. I'll follow you forever!

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: Well... I don't know...

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: Meow! You're weirding me out!

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: Love is fine, but I'm hungry!

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: Stop joking around.

string.name: c13_s2
string.value: Ah! Shh, someone will hear you!

string.name: c13_s3
string.value: Please look the other way.

string.name: c13_f2
string.value: Right here? Really?

string.name: c13_f3
string.value: How rude!

string.name: c13_f4
string.value: This is not a restroom! Meow, meow!

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: Can you get me some toilet paper, master?

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: D-don't watch me!

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: Mew! Was that too loud...?

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: Ah, hide me! Meow...

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: Why...are you telling me to do this?

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: D-disgusting. Meow.

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: I don't get you...

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: Really? You want me to...?!

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: Meow! Oh... Feels good!

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: No one's watching, right? Watch out for me. Meow!

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: I made you a gift, master!

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: Errr... I don't have to! Meow!

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: I don't need to go! Do you, master?

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: Really? You're so weird...

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: Meow... What am I suppose to do here...?

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: Meow! Everyone's watching! I can't do it here!

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: *Yawn* Goodnight.

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: Goodnight! Meow!

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: Maybe a little cat nap would be good...

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: You should sleep, too.

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: Meow. It's not time for bed yet...

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: Meow! The sun's still high in the sky!

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: Bedtime already? Meow?

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: Aren't you sleepy, master? I'm sleepy.

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: Nothing beats sleeping on a soft pillow.

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: So tired! Goodnight, master!

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: I love sleeping.

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: Don't let anyone wake me up. Meow!

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: Can't I just sleep when I want to? Mrow!

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: Why are you putting me to bed? It's too early!

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: I can't sleep here!

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: I still want to play! Mew!

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: This was a such a long day.

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: I feel like sleeping for 3 days. Meow!

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: You're sleepy, too?

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: Sweet dreams. Dream about me-ow!

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: Oh, just let me sleep already!

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: I told you, I don't want to sleep! Meow!

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: Isn't it too early for bed?

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: Why do you always want to sleep, master? Meow!

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: What do you want me to say? Huh? Meow!

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: I grew up in an elegant palace.

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: Have you ever met as eloquent a cat as I?

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: What should we talk about? Meow!

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: Nothing to talk about...

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: I'm enjoying the quiet.

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: I'm thirsty... Can I have a red potion?

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: It's your turn to talk, master.

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: I hope this conversation never ends!

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: Have you ever had a Power Elixir? How did it taste? I want one!

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: I'm glad you're my master, master.

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: What is your favorite pet?

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: Why do you keep saying that? Mew!

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: What are you talking to me for? Bored?

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: You can't talk me into liking you more, master. Mew!

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: You are truly skilled at bothering your pets.

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: What's your wish? My wish is to be your kitty forever.

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: Keep working hard! Meow!

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: The most important thing is health. The second most important thing is...also health.

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: Watch me! Watch me! MEOW!

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: No thank you. Talking to you makes me mad.

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: Why talk when we could eat instead? Mrow!

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: Don't you have any other friends?

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: I'd rather talk to a wall.

string.name: f2_s
string.value: Meow! Yummy!

string.name: f2_f
string.value: I don't want to eat anymore. Meow!

string.name: f3_s
string.value: I've been waiting for this!

string.name: f3_f
string.value: Meow... I'm full...

string.name: f4_s
string.value: Oh, I like this!

string.name: f4_f
string.value: Don't you have something different? Meow. Meow.

string.name: s2
string.value: Meow! I hate bad words.

string.name: s3
string.value: Meow! How can you talk to me like that...?

string.name: s4
string.value: Meow! Are you a bad person, master?

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: Neigh! So comfortable!

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: Like this? Wehee...

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: I need some rest...proompfh...

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: I should rest a bit while I freshen up!

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: Neigh? But the ground is dirty...

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: I'll pass...proompfh...

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: I like standing just fine.

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: I want to walk a bit more.

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: I was feeling rather tired...neigh...

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: Why don't you come sit with me master...neigh...

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: Okay, you should get some rest too, master. Proompfh...

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: Good idea. My legs were feeling a bit tired!

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: I don't wanna...proompfh...

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: I don't want to get dirt in my hair!

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: I'll pass. Wehee.

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: I'm not gonna sit! Proompfh.

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: Fatigue is not good for the skin...neigh...

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: The wind feels so good...neigh...

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: How did you know I wanted some rest?

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: Anything for you master...wehee.

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: Hmmpfh! Don't try to coerce me!

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: I'm too lazy to fold my legs...wehee...

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: How can I sit in a place like this? No way! Hmmpf!

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: Enough. Stop it.

string.name: c6_s1
string.value: I'm sorry...

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: You're scaring me, master...neigh...

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: I won't do it again...

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: I'm sorry, master!

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: I don't know what this is about!

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: I can't hear you! Wehee, wehee!

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: Master, what's wrong?

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: Neigh? What?

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: I'm sorry... I won't do it again...

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: Please don't hate me...

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: Proompfh... I still like you best...

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: Master, why are you mad at me?

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Proompfh, I'm gonna get mad too!

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: I didn't do anything wrong!

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: Master, you're being unfair!

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: Master...I'm sorry for hurting your feelings...

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: Baaaahhhh... I'm so sorry... Sniff...

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: Neigh...please forgive me...I'll be a good unicorn...

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: I still love you master...neigh...

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: Master...your face is wrinkled...it's ugly...

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: Why are you so upset with me?

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: Leave me alone, master! Proompfh!

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: I'm gonna rebel! I'll show you!

string.name: c10_s1
string.value: Er, me too, master!

string.name: c10_s2
string.value: Me too!

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: Yay, master!

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: You're the best!

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: I can't hear you!

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: Whatever! I'm hungry!

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: So I'm the prettiest unicorn, right?

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: I love hearing that from you.

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: Please tell me every day.

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: My heart is yours, wehee.

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: Master... I know I'm pretty and all, but...

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: I've heard it so many times...

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: Ah, no thanks. Wehee.

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: Neigh... What can I say to that?

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: Heeee... Brushing my mane was worth it!

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: Master, I love you so much!

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: Master, you finally see my worth. Brr...

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Master, I'm so lucky to have met you. Proomph...

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: Please don't be so mushy before I eat...

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: Master... That's just weird.

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: Neigh...I prefer the company of horses...

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: Master... That's nice... But you smell funny.

string.name: c13_s2
string.value: What did I eat...?

string.name: c13_s3
string.value: Ahh, much better.

string.name: c13_f2
string.value: Here? How?

string.name: c13_f4
string.value: I don't want to!

string.value: Lala, I am singing a song of repentance!

string.value: I am of a noble personage.

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: I can get angry as well! You...cough cough...my throat...

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: I am innocent!

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: You judge me so harshly?

string.value: My tears flow freely...wehee...

string.value: You must not like me anymore.

string.value: I acknowledge my mistake. I am sorry!

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: Please accept the apology of a unicorn prince.

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: Lala...you are so uncivil!

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: I am quite disappointed in you!

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: Sigh...It is only natural for a horse to move forward!

string.name: c10_s2
string.value: I'm so touched!

string.value: Woohoo! So happy!

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: La ti da ti daaah!

string.value: I am truly sorry, but I cannot return the sentiment.

string.value: I am not the right one for you.

string.value: Are...you sick or something?

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: You are grossing me out!

string.value: You are beautiful as well.

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: Lala, I'm so happy...

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: I am so happy!

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: My heart is on fire!

string.value: Sorry, I am engaged.

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: You shouldn't lie.

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: I refuse!

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: Are you teasing me?

string.value: Lala... My heart is yours as well!

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: I hope that your heart shall never change.

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: I will stand by you always!

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: I will overcome our differences, to stand by you!

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: I shall be returning to my kingdom soon.

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: Calm yourself! I...am a unicorn.

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: We are of different classes. I am sorry.

string.value: Did you at least bring me some sugar cubes?

string.value: That feels nice!

string.name: c13_s4
string.value: If that is what you desire...

string.name: c13_f4
string.value: I am not that primitive!

string.value: Now I need some paper...

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: Hrrgh... Aaah! Success!

string.value: I am a prince, but I can be down to earth! Hrrgh!

string.value: Such a natural feeling. Hrrgh!

string.value: Dignity and elegance are my pride and calling.
