string.name: c8_s1
string.value: I like it when you are angry, Mr'kuma. I will be angry too!

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: Yes! Let's find some little kids to yell at!

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: Everytime you yell, I feel a little more at home...

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: Ha! More! Tell me how worthless I am!

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: You always say the same insults. Think up something new!

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: I know you can do better than that, Mr'kuma.

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: I know you have more rage in you than that...

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: I don't want to be flattered right now!

string.name: c9_f2
string.value: Rak'a unar...

string.name: c10_s2
string.value: W-why you say?

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: What I do wrong?

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: Kr'ishmor! Leave me alone!

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: I no understand.

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: You know better...

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: Why you talk like wimp, Mr'kuma?

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: Grauk-mouthed unar! You think I simple?!

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: I no fall for trick. Old Mr'kuma trick me like this long ago.

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: Blech! Human words so nasty.

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: I...love...you...too...HAHAHAHAH! I lie good!

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: Hand over wallet, Mr'kuma. You go crazy in your mind.

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: ...What you want from me?

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: I come back when you not trying to eat me.

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: You are the cruelest of all masters...and I like it.

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: Are you mad at me because I tortured your goldfish? He was asking for it!

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: That is the rudest thing you can say in demon culture!

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Now I see you are just trying to be mean to me. Thank you, Mr'kuma!

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: There is no such thing as love.

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: My heart is cold and black like a piece of coal!

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: I'm almost getting used to this constant abuse.

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: You're just trying to make me get mad again.

string.name: c13_s1
string.value: Ha! Pthbbbtt!

string.name: c13_s2
string.value: Poona drakla!

string.name: c13_s3
string.value: Drakla, Mr'aku?

string.name: c13_f1
string.value: Oh...gra drakla.

string.name: c13_f2
string.value: Rak! Drakla m'raktoom!

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: Why say word "poop" all time, Mr'aku?

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: Make fire from bottom area!

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: You like drakla so much? I give to you.

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: You have weird enjoyments, Mr'aku.

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: I empty belly already!

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: Drakla stuck. Bottom much itchy.

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: I not eat enough monster today!

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: You no treasure drakla. It MY drakla!

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: Master, you love pooping as much as I do!

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: I bet I can burn a hole in the ground with this one...

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: I love stinking up your fresh air, Mr'kuma.

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: Empty out everything, master. Even your soul!

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: I'm not done digesting yet!

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: I'll let go of this poop when I darn well feel like it.

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: My bottom still hurts from the last one.

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: I have got to stop eating so many spicy monsters.

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: Mmm...chak'to unar...zzz

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: Kwa! Heheheh!

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: Nyah nyah! Grauk drakla!

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: Good unar. We find many nightmare!

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: I like sleep. Let me eat many monster heads when wake.

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: You sleep too, Mr'kuma. I steal many wallet for you later.

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: No! You try take my eyeballs while I sleep!

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: I no want to! I want eat shopkeeper toes!

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: No rest for wicked!

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: Sleep yourself, Mr'putama. I go find demon friends.

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: I could go for a little power nap on some hot coals.

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: Don't destroy any villages without me, okay, Mr'kuma?

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: I'll wake up when home freezes over.

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: Pitchforks, fire, and screaming people. This is going to be a great dream.

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: You can go to sleep if you want. I promise not to chew on your nose.

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: I don't need to rest! I'm an infernal machine!

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: I ate an entire case of espresso beans while you weren't looking.

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: I know better than to trust you.

string.name: c19
string.value: talk|chat|say

string.name: c20
string.value: talk|chat|say

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: My name Invidia.

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: I start big jealousy.

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: I am beautiful voluptuous woman-demon!

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: I am Mr'kuma to ghost of jealousy like you are Mr'kuma to me.

string.name: c21
string.value: talk|chat|say

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: Have you felt jealousy of another, unar-master?

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: I will let you avoid jealousy, if you prove that you are strong.

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: You will see the firey hand of jealousy!

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: If you can make me jealous, we can have a real relationship.

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: I make poona energy for you, Mr'kuma!

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: See my power! We destroy much together!

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: True demon power!

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: My real form is scary, Mr'kuma!

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: I no perform like kr'grana.

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: You do trick. I want laugh when you fall.

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: That very personal...

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: I show you already! You have bad brain!

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: What if I did this at your next surprise party?

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: Let's go scare some little girls with this trick!

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: With this power, I could conquer all of you puny humans.

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: Bask in awe, master! I am a being of pure terror!

string.name: c23_f1
string.value: How about I torch all your underwear instead?

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: Are you sure? You can never unsee it.

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: Shouldn't we be undermining somebody's hope?

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: I'll eat your eyebrows if you tell me that again!

string.name: f3_s
string.value: Is good, Mr'kuma.

string.name: f3_f
string.value: I already fat!

string.name: f4_s
string.value: Keep it coming!

string.name: f4_f
string.value: What are you trying to do to me?!

string.name: s1
string.value: Ha! Unia, Mr'aku.

string.name: s2
string.value: You...like demon joke?

string.name: s3
string.value: Old boss call me that. He so cool.

string.name: s4
string.value: Hey! Even we demons have some etiquette.

string.name: c1_s1
string.value: So it shall be.

string.name: c1_s2
string.value: As you wish.

string.name: c1_f2
string.value: I see no purpose in sitting.

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: I am bound to oblige.

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: Why are you mortals always so frivolous with your wishes?

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: Does this please you, oh temporary master?

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: I am already floating.

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: My cloud is perfectly comfortable.

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: Have you decided your real wishes yet?

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: May I do something else? Grawr?

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: You have such strange requests.

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: Is this what mortals enjoy?

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: This is oddly enjoyable.

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: Does this make me look more regal?

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: Wish denied.

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: You are wasting my powers!

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: Wouldn't you rather I eat someone?

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: Enough of your trivialities!

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: I just place my bottom upon the ground?

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: Sitting with you is quite relaxing.

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: I am able to conjure the powers of the heavens as well, you know?

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: I will, should you bring me a loaf of the meat variety.

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: Seven hundred thousand years of magical power and you ask me to sit.

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: Ask me for riches like a normal person!

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: I am seated already, mortal. Are you blinded with awe?

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: Speak to me when you have discovered respect.

string.name: c5_s1
string.value: That was not your desire?

string.name: c5_s2
string.value: I will attempt to be better.

string.name: c5_f1
string.value: Your mortal ways confound me.

string.name: c6_s1
string.value: You are a cruel master!

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: That may be a slight overreaction.

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: Well, if you put it that way...

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: Do not blame me for being myself!

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: You dare assault me?!

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: Perhaps it is YOU who are at fault, mortal!

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: I have done nothing to earn your scorn!

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: A bolt of lightning might change your attitude.

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: I understand, you are under a lot of stress.

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: I am above your mortal emotions.

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: Was I so wrong? It was only a squirrel!

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: I will not be sad! I will not be sad!

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: One of these days, I'm going to drop this marble on your head.

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Why, you ill-tempered little goblin!

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: Is this how you mortals treat one another?!

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: I will watch you fry one day.

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: Fine, I am sorry.

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: I haven't felt this bad since I ate that priest.

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: I find you strangely terrifying, mortal.

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: I have shamed a thousand generations of my ancestors.

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: But I have done everything you asked!

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: You are the most fickle mortal I've ever met.

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: You are adorable when you are angry.

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: Find something else to yell at!

string.name: c9_s1
string.value: You are not entirely repulsive.

string.name: c9_s2
string.value: I hope you do not come to harm.

string.name: c9_f2
string.value: Um, I...

string.name: c10_s1
string.value: You find my presence...enjoyable?

string.name: c10_s2
string.value: I-I guess I...like you?

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: Hmm. Yes.

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: Um, right.

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: Aren't you supposed to be trembling in fear?

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: Master, this is highly inappropriate.

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: I will not be talked down to!

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: You are making my scales itch.

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: Why do my cheeks feel warm? WHAT HAVE YOU DONE TO ME?!

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: My heart thumps when you say these measly words!

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: You are my favorite mortal.

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: I believe you mortals would say, "ditto".

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: My dragon heart is not to be trifled with.

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: Do not say anything you will regret.

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: I, uh, have to wash my scales tonight.

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: Hey, how about those Green Mushrooms? Very green, aren't they?

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: Would you like me to take you flying?

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: I will move the heavens for you!

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: Might a humble dragon receive a kiss?

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: I know.

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: Are mortal affections given so freely?

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: I am sure you say this to all your pets.

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: You are a fibber! Grawr!

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: Who needs love when you have power?!

string.name: c13_s1
string.value: Very well.

string.name: c13_s2
string.value: My eyes may be closed, but I have the reflexes of a water dragon!

string.name: c13_s3
string.value: I was already going to do that.

string.name: c13_s4
string.value: Do not disturb me.

string.name: c13_f1
string.value: Perhaps you'll think of a better wish later.

string.name: c13_f2
string.value: Grawr! It is not my nap time!

string.name: c13_f3
string.value: You summoned me for this?!

string.name: c13_f4
string.value: I have little need for such things.

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: I suppose I could use a recharge.

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: As you wish, mortal.

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: The weather IS quite nice...gryaaawn.

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: We mighty dragons have no need for sleep!

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: I am wide awake.

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: This place is not fit for my great slumber!

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: I am no cat, content to lie in the sun!

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: May I rest upon your lap? This cloud is quite cold.

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: Oh, the dreams I will have!

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: Finally, a celestial nap!

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: Your wish is granted, mortal! Zzzzzz

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: What if I were to eat you in my sleep?

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: This area is too loud! My dragon ears are sensitive.

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: Can't we go battle some monsters?

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: I JUST drank some dragon coffee!

string.name: c16
string.value: talk|chat|say

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: Allow me to fill in your pitiful knowledge of dragons...

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: I was once a mere thunder lizard, until I caught this orb.

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: Do know you how luck you are? Let me tell you.

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: If that is what you wish...

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: Come closer and I will...

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: I did not descend from the heavens to banter!

string.name: c17
string.value: talk|chat|say

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: Your world is teeming with life.

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: Mortal lives fascinate me.

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: My mane is made of the finest spun gold.

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: I am omnipotent and all powerful, but I do get a little lonely.

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: Hold on, let me see if I have anything...NO.

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: Why do you waste my power?

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: I have nothing to say.

string.name: c18
string.value: talk|chat|say

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: Your enormous head must be quite a burden.

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: Does this orb make my tail look fat?

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: All behold the glory of my master and its silly face!

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: My wisdom sounds much better in the original Dragon.

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: What do you want to talk about?

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: You talk.

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: Here I am, talking.

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: Stand back, puny mortals!

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: Watch in awe!

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: Steel yourselves!

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: Your mind will be blown!

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: Give me a moment, mortal!

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: I am no mere pet!

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: Do the powers of the gods so amuse you?

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: This show of force is quite exhausting.

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: Grawr! Look at all these lightning bolts!

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: My thunder will break the heavens!

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: Graaaaawwwwrrr!!! It's show time!

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: This is no mere trick! This is an event!

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: I tire of these petty displays.

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: We JUST did that.

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: Have you nothing better to wish for?!

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: My powers must recharge.

string.name: c21
string.value: This meat is so lustrous!

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: My eternal tummy is full!

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: Rawr! Such earthly delights!

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: I will sink through my cloud if I eat another bite!

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: I try to say no, but my belly continues to rumble.

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: No more, I have much...um...business to attend to.

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: Truly you are a great chef, master!

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: Do not look upon me. I am such a fat dragon...

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: You will not be my master forever...

string.name: c22
string.value: I do not comprehend your ridiculous ways.

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: I WILL eat you. You are but a worm in my eyes.

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: Do not curse the commander of lightning!

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: True demon power!

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: My real form is scary, Mr'kuma!

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: I no perform like kr'grana.

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: You do trick. I want laugh when you fall.

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: That very personal...

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: I show you already! You have bad brain!

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: What if I did this at your next surprise party?

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: Let's go scare some little girls with this trick!

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: With this power, I could conquer all of you puny humans.

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: Bask in awe, master! I am a being of pure terror!

string.name: c23_f1
string.value: How about I torch all your underwear instead?

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: Are you sure? You can never unsee it.

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: Shouldn't we be undermining somebody's hope?

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: I'll eat your eyebrows if you tell me that again!

string.name: f3_s
string.value: Is good, Mr'kuma.

string.name: f3_f
string.value: I already fat!

string.name: f4_s
string.value: Keep it coming!

string.name: f4_f
string.value: What are you trying to do to me?!

string.name: s1
string.value: Ha! Unia, Mr'aku.

string.name: s2
string.value: You...like demon joke?

string.name: s3
string.value: Old boss call me that. He so cool.

string.name: s4
string.value: Hey! Even we demons have some etiquette.

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: I'm down with that! Teehee!

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: Wanna to sit together?

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: Awesome! Let's snuggle!

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: Arooooo! This is the best!

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: How come?

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: Aroo! No way!

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: Stop trying to domesticate me!

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: Shake that tail!

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: Being leisurely is great!

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: The wind is singing!

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: Come here!

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: I'd sit if this were a rose field.

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: I'm a free fox! I sit for no one!

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: I hate this dusty ground. Gimme sand!

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: Don't order me around!

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: I was hoping we'd get to do that soon.

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: I'm pretty when I sit, huh?

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: This place is cooler than my star.

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: Perfect! I was missing you.

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: Huh? Arooo!

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: I don't wanna follow orders!

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: Buy me a chair!

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: No problemo! Yeeyap!

string.name: c6_s1
string.value: I'm sorry.

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: Arooo, I've been so bad!

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: I thought you liked me!

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: I didn't mean to upset you.

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: You're not my prince!

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: I don't like you either!

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: Whatever, I'm going back to my star!

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: You're so mean all the time!

string.name: c7_s1

string.value: Here's a nice gassy burp for you!

string.name: c30_s3
string.value: No one can match my burping skills!

string.name: c30_s4
string.value: You know you love me!

string.name: c30_f1
string.value: You think I'll just do whatever you ask I thought you were smarter.

string.name: c30_f2
string.value: I need to eat in order to burp, you know...

string.name: c30_f3
string.value: I ate onions and garlic just now... no burping! No cuteness!

string.name: c30_f4
string.value: How do I put this No?

string.name: c31_s1
string.value: I'm tired. I need to sleep. Squerch...

string.name: c31_s2
string.value: So sleepy... let me sleep... squerch...

string.name: c31_s3
string.value: My eyes are closing squerch...

string.name: c31_f1
string.value: How am I going to sleep if I'm not even tired! Squerch!

string.name: c31_f2
string.value: You sleep! Squerch!

string.name: c31_f3
string.value: Feed me! Squerch!

string.name: c32_s1
string.value: ...you... come... sleep... with... me... Squerch.

string.name: c32_s3
string.value: Don't go eat something good while I'm asleep! Squerch.

string.name: c32_f1
string.value: Master, I just slept!

string.name: c32_f2
string.value: So you can doodle on my fins? No thanks!

string.name: c32_f3
string.value: I'm hungry! Can't sleep! Feed me!

string.name: f1_s
string.value: Squerch! Squerch! Squerch!

string.name: f1_f
string.value: Ka squerch?

string.name: f2_s
string.value: FOOD! FOOD!

string.name: f2_f
string.value: I am about to blow up... squerch...

string.name: f3_s
string.value: Master, this is so delicious... squerch!!!

string.name: f3_f
string.value: No mas... Squerch.

string.name: f4_s
string.value: This is as good as it gets!

string.name: f4_f
string.value: Are you trying to kill me, master?

string.name: s2
string.value: Squerch? You asking doesn't always mean me doing

string.name: s3
string.value: Squerch! My precious mouth will not spit those venomous words!

string.name: s4
string.value: Please, no... no flavors like that... Squerch.

string.name: c1_s2
string.value: Baa baa!

string.name: c1_f2
string.value: (Pretends to be indifferent.)

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: I'm a nice lamb that obeys well!

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: I was going to sit, baa!

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: (It sits down quietly.)

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: I was actually planning to rest, baa!

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: I'm going to play more, baa!

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: I can't hear you, baa!

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: Speak louder, baa!

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: (You've been ignored...)

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: Baa, I'm tired...

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: Flying is tiring too, Baa!

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: Baa baa, you should sit down too.

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: My fluff aches, baa!

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: Baa baa? What did you say?

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: I can't hear you, I can't hear you, baa baa!

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: I'm going to fly around more, baa baa!

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: No, baa baa.

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: Should we rest a bit? Baa baa.

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: Baa baa, let's rest together.

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: Baa baa! What a peaceful feeling!

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: Baa! Let's rest a bit.

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: Baa baa? Are you talking to me?

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: I don't hear anything, baa baa!

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: What are you saying, baa?

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: Baa? What's with you all of sudden?

string.name: c5_s2
string.value: Baa baa...

string.name: c5_f2
string.value: Baa baa!!!

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: I'm sorry, baa!

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: Baah! (It appears to be calling its mother...)

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: Baa! Don't do this to me...

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: Don't make me too angry.

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: Baa... maybe I should change owners.

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: You are so UN-caring. Baa.

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: I don't even wanna hear it...

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: Baa baa! It's all my fault!

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: Baa! Did I really mess up that badly?

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: Baa... I won't do that again...

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: Hmph, I'll be the bigger ram.

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: My patience has limits, baa baa.

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: Are you going to keep this up, baa?

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: If only I had a nicer owner...

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: Baa!! *Cries*

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: Why do you always yell at me... *Cries*

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: I'm going to tell my mommy, baa baa...

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: Wahhhh! You're just mean because you're bigger than me!

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: I really wish I could just smack you, baa baa.

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: I'm gonna call animal protective services!

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: I can get scary when I'm angry, baa...

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: Baa baa... THAT does it! (Veins popping.)

string.name: c9_s2
string.value: Baa! (Looks happy.)

string.name: c9_f1
string.value: Baa baa?

string.name: c10_s1
string.value: Baa! You're embarrassing me.

string.name: c10_s2
string.value: You sure are nice!

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: Baa baa! I like, I like!

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: I like you very much also!

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: Baa? What did you say?

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: Baa baa. You aren't supposed to joke around like that.

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: ... (You've been ignored.)

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: Treat me well when you have the chance, baa.

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: Baa baa baa!

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: Baa! I'm always on your side!

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: Baa! I love it!

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: I can't hear you.

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: I said... I can't hear you!

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: Baa Baa! I got it, I got it!

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: Baa! I love hanging out with you!

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: What a happy day!

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: Meehee! I like you too!

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Baa! Affectionate actions make Pufframs dance!

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: Baa! Say it louder.

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: Baa baa. I already know your feelings.

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: So what do you want me to do, baa baa?

string.name: c13_s1
string.value: Hahh! Baahhh!!!

string.name: c13_s4
string.value: First things first!!

string.name: c13_f1
string.value: Why are you so rude?

string.name: c13_f2
string.value: I'm shocked, I don't even have words.

string.name: c13_f3
string.value: (Little veins are popping out on its forehead.)

string.name: c13_f4
string.value: Do you KNOW what you are saying?

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: Baa! Baa Baa Baa...

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: Hahh! That felt nice...

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: Baa... Now's the time!!

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: *Grunt* Whew...

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: Something needs to go in for something to come out!

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: You talk nonsense, Baa Baa.

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: Hmph! Baa Baa.

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: Baa Baa, don't push it...

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: Baa baa! Every day is a healthy day!!

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: *Grunt* Baa...

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: Baa baa... it's coming out!!

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: It's not going to come out just because you whine!

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: Baa... let's have some common sense, shall we?

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: Baa baa... You want to get smacked?

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: I'll let you off for today...

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: (Already asleep.)

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: Baa baa...

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: Baa... *smacks lips*

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: See you tomorrow, baa baa...

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: I can't hear you!

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: (It's ignoring you...)

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: No! I want to play more!

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: I want to play more, baa baa!

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: (It's out cold.)

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: Baa... I'm tired...

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: *Snores* Baa...

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: Baa baa... I'm tired...

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: What's that noise?

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: The sun's still up!

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: Don't joke around, okay?

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: Not sleepy!

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: Baa... someday I'll soar higher than a dragon. Baa...

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: (It passed right out.)

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: Good night... baa baa...

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: Baa baa...

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: Can't you see that my eyes are still WIDE open?

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: Baa baa? What are you saying?

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: I just woke up...

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: I'm not that lazy, baa baa.

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: Baa Baa! So today, I'm going to... (Now it won't stop talking.)

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: Are you amazed by flying lambs? So the secret of our race is...

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: Maple World is a pretty nice place to live, baa baa.

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: When we were living up in the sky, angels mistook us for clouds.

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: Is it strange that I talk?

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: Baa baa, how annoying!

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: I'm tired right now.

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: Baa? Weren't we talking just a second ago?

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: Have you every had a Cloud Candy? It's the baaaaa-st.

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: I want some Cloud Candy!

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: If there's one thing I hate, it's wolves.

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: We are called Pufframs because we live above the clouds.

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: Baa baa... just leave me alone...

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: I don't want to talk right now, baa.

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: Mmm... are you hungry for a conversation?

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: (It pretends not to hear you.)

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: Baa baa, would it be better to walk or fly?

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: Baa baa, you want to hear something interesting?

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: Which one of us do you think can fly faster? Me or the eagle?

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: To the Pufframs, the Golden Horn is a symbol of adulthood.

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: You look bored... too bad I'm not!

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: I'm too hungry to talk!

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: (It appears to be thinking about something.)

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: What if I say no, baa baa?

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: Baa baa!

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: This is the Puffram booty dance!!

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: Sounds annoying, Baa Baa.

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: Am I in the circus or something, baa baa?

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: Baa baa... I said, it sounds annoying...

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: I actually have this super cool trick... but I don't feel like it right now.

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: (Jumps up and down.) Baa! Baa! Baa! Baa!

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: Meehee! You likey, baa baa?

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: Puffram-only special... booty dance!!

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: It's super fun when you do it above the clouds, baa baa.

string.name: c23_f1
string.value: Baa... maybe next time...

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: Can't I just be your pet?

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: Too hungry... no strength... baa baa.

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: How embarrassing, baa baa.

string.name: f1_f
string.value: Baa baa...

string.name: f2_s
string.value: Looks delicious!

string.name: f2_f
string.value: I ate a lot today...

string.name: f3_s
string.value: Baa baa, eating time's my favorite time!!

string.name: f3_f
string.value: I'm full...

string.name: f4_s
string.value: Thank you for the food!

string.name: f4_f
string.value: I'm full now, baa baa.

string.name: s2
string.value: You want to get reported, baa baa?

string.name: s3
string.value: Be nice, baa baa!

string.name: s4
string.value: I'm so disappointed in you, baa baa!!

string.name: c1_s2
string.value: Sit? Sit!

string.name: c1_f1
string.value: Rawk...

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: If you say so...

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: Why should I listen to you?

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: Do I look like a dog to you? Sit, indeed!

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: Yes, perhaps I shall rest my wings. RAWK!!

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: Rawk! Rawk rawk!

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: Who are you to order me around? Hm?

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: Birds can't sit, you featherless buffoon!

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: I'm sitting already! I'm sitting RIGHT NOW!

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: Yes, yes, what is it?! I swear, if you tell me to sit one more time...

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: I would be DELIGHTED if you joined me! Don't you have a chair?

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: Very well. But what's this? No cushion?

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: And if I say no?

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: You dare tell me to sit? RAWK!

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: Where shall I sit? On your shoulder? Or on your head?

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: The dictionary defines 'sit' as resting with the torso vertical and the body supported on the buttocks. Correct?

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: Yes, it's nice to sit with my intellectual equal. RAWK!

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: Let's sit in silence, mm-hmm?

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: Yes, I am quite tired. We've been on a long journey, and I fear I've talked myself into a stupor. RAWK!

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: Why do you insist I sit?

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: Don't you know any other commands?!

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: How dull.

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: No. No, that's quite all right. Rawk!

string.name: c5_s1
string.value: No... Don't... Bad...

string.name: c5_f1
string.value: Rawk...

string.name: c6_s1
string.value: Perhaps I was bad. But you'll hear no apology from me!

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: Don't you think you're overreacting?

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: Of course. It won't happen again. Whatever you say.

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: What can I say? My apologies.

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: Rawk... Rawk rawk rawk!

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: Rawk... What did I do?

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: I simply don't understand.

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: What is the meaning of this? Unbelievable...

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: I've nothing to say to a tyrant like you!

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: How does throwing a temper tantrum help anything?

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: There's no need to be so forceful.

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: I understand. But is this really my fault?

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: What is it NOW?

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: I'll hear you out. What did I do wrong this time?

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: Hmph, you must be bored.

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: Rawk! Do you want an apology?

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: If you can explain to me what I did wrong, I will be more than happy to apologize.

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: Perhaps what I did was wrong, but will an apology REALLY make you feel better?

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: I know what I did was wrong! I don't need you to remind me.

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: Yes, I'm a bad parrot. Does that make you feel better?

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: Enough. I've had enough!

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: I have nothing to say to you. RAWK!

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: I don't know what you're talking about, and I don't care!

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: Think this over. Don't you value our friendship? RAWK!

string.name: c9_s1
string.value: Love you! Rawk!

string.name: c9_s2
string.value: That's more like it!

string.name: c9_f1
string.value: Rawk...

string.name: c10_s1
string.value: Love, love. Such a sweet word!

string.name: c10_s2
string.value: You like me? You really like me?

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: Is your love true? Oh, who cares!

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: I'd blush, but parrots can't blush...

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: Sorry, but my heart belongs to a little parakeet in Henesys.

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: How awkward.

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: But what will the other parrots think?

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: RAWK! LIAR!

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: The love between parrot and master is forever!

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: Is it the color of my feathers that did it? Or the manly shape of my beak?

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: Sh, keep your voice down! You're embarrassing me...

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: Caaan you feeel the love tooooday...

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: Prove it!

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: No! I won't let you break this parrot heart!

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: Sure, you say that now, but isn't this just a flight of fancy?

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: Hee hee! RAWK!

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: My melancholy heart, once dark like Kerning City's nighttime sky, is brightened by your affection! CRAAAAW!!

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: Yes! Very good! Let's have fun! RAWK!

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: Thank you. Not that I feel the same way, but it's nice to hear.

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: I know.

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: You find me attractive? Is that what you're telling me?

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: Do you feel a special kinship for me? Or is it something more?

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: Love? I simply can't understand it.

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: Love? Bah! Who needs it?

string.name: c13_s1
string.value: Rawk! How degrading!

string.name: c13_s2
string.value: Good idea to lighten the load. Makes it easier to fly. Rawk!

string.name: c13_s3
string.value: Rawk! You need a sample? I didn't know you were a doctor!

string.name: c13_s4
string.value: I feel so refreshed. I feel like I can fly! Rawk!

string.name: c13_f1
string.value: Sorry. Stomach's not feeling up to the task today!

string.name: c13_f2
string.value: What a thing to say! Rawk!

string.name: c13_f3
string.value: What a disgusting thing to say!

string.name: c13_f4
string.value: I can't do...THAT on command!

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: Rawk! I'll just make a little room for lunch.

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: Rawk! I was going to do that, anyway!

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: Very well. Fire main cannon!

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: You can tell I've been eating the good stuff because it doesn't smell. Ha!

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: Feed me first. Rawk!

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: Stop asking me to do such base things! RAWK!

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: I'm not a faucet, you know. It doesn't happen on command.

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: Think before you speak! Think!

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: That's a child's word. I prefer the word feces, myself.

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: Observe, as my body excretes the waste it's built up through the digestive process!

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: I've got stage fright. Mind singing a song to help me relax?

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: R-rawk! Wait for it...

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: RAWK! That didn't feel right out. Maybe I should see a doctor...

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: How did you know I had to go? That's a little unsettling...

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: Why don't you look after your business, and I'll look after my own? Rawk!

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: I seem to be having trouble. Do you have some yogurt I could eat? Rawk!

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: Sweet dreams! Rawk!

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: This is nice sleeping weather. Rawk!

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: I may not have eyelids, but I can sleep with the best of them!

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: Remember, even when I sleep, I'm watching you! Zzz...

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: Not sleepy, not one bit!

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: What will you do while I sleep? Rawk!

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: It's much too early for that!

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: You won't put ME to sleep!

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: Perhaps I'll wake up early and get the worm... Rawk!

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: I'm going to eat well and sleep right. Goodnight!

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: Goodnight, and may you dream of many eagles.

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: Rawk! I can't sleep right after eating!

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: No. I get headaches if I sleep too much.

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: I'll not sleep my life away! RAWK!

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: I'll sleep when I please, thank you very much!

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: Sometimes I get so busy counting sheep I forget to actually sleep.

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: Nothing like a good nap when you're feeling sleepy!

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: I'll dream of pigs and slimes tonight. I just know it.

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: My friends say I talk to much. Makes it hard to sleep. That's not true, is it? RAWK!

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: I can't sleep on the floor! Bring me some nice, comfortable branches to perch on.

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: I can't talk now. I'd rather chat! Rawk! Rawk! RAAAWK!

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: You're going to hit me after I fall asleep, right? I'm on to you!

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: That's okay. I slept yesterday.

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: You're just trying to get me to shut up, aren't you? Rawk!

string.value: talk|chat|say

string.value: I thought you'd never ask!

string.value: Sometimes the cap'n doesn't use good grammar! Rawk!

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: Don't get me wrong, Adriano's a fine navigator. But isn't he a little too quiet?

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: Bonkey is dumb as a brick. I wouldn't want to be on his bad side, though!

string.value: Quick! Get me a navigator and a helmsman, and we'll set sail for Florina Beach!

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: Secrets? No such thing. If you can tell one person, you can tell everybody!

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: They say it's not good to talk too much, but I've never found this to be the case! Rawk!

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: A pirate ship is blind without a good parrot in the crow's nest! Rawk!

string.value: talk|chat|say

string.value: Here's a question! Why is it always night in Magatia and day in Ariant?

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: Who're the strongest people in Maple World? First Cygnus, then Aran. Third would be the ruler of the Elves, but she's long gone...

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: Is the Black Mage real? No one's seen him, have they? It all sounds made up to me!

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: According to this, a pirate is someone who...attacks ships at sea and steals from others. Huh, go figure...

string.value: Rawk! Rawk!

string.value: Sit back, relax, and enjoy the show. Rawk!

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: Dun, dun, DUN!

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: Not until I've warmed up!

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: I don't perform tricks. Do I look like a mere pet to you? RAWK!

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: Wouldn't you rather have a deep conversation?

string.name: c22_f4

string.value: Zzzzz... Zzzzz.

string.value: I was about to sleep anyway.

string.name: c24_s4
string.value: You need to wake me up later.

string.name: c24_f1
string.value: Don't tell me what to do.

string.name: c24_f2
string.value: It's not time to sleep yet.

string.name: c24_f3
string.value: I feel fine, I don't feel like sleeping.

string.name: c24_f4
string.value: I'm too hungry...

string.name: c25_s1
string.value: WEK WEK ~~

string.name: c26_s1
string.value: I love you too, WEK!

string.name: c26_s2
string.value: Is that for real? WEK!

string.name: c26_s3
string.value: And I believe you, WEK!

string.name: c26_s4
string.value: This makes me feel good, WEK!

string.name: c26_f1
string.value: This makes me feel good, WEK!

string.name: c26_f2
string.value: What? No, WEK.

string.name: c26_f3
string.value: Liar. I don't like you, WEK.

string.name: c26_f4
string.value: Really? I don't think you do, though. WEK.

string.name: c27_s1
string.value: Do you really mean that, WEK?

string.name: c27_s2
string.value: You know how I feel about this, right? WEK~

string.name: c27_s3
string.value: I love you too, master! WEK!

string.name: c27_s4
string.value: Yay, I'm being loved by my master~ WEK!

string.name: c27_f1
string.value: And what do you want from me? WEK.

string.name: c27_f2
string.value: What? I didn't hear you. WEK.

string.name: c27_f3
string.value: Um, you're funny. WEK.

string.name: c27_f4
string.value: I know you say that to others, too. WEK.

string.name: c28_s1
string.value: Me, me me me!!!

string.name: c28_s2
string.value: I'll always love you, master.

string.name: c28_s3
string.value: No way. Really? Really? Awww...

string.name: c28_s4
string.value: I love you too, master! Yay!!

string.name: c28_f2
string.value: We penguins don't take that phrase "I love you" lightly.

string.name: c28_f3
string.value: If you don't mean that, that I don't think you should say it.

string.name: c28_f4
string.value: What a full-fledged lie.

string.name: c29_s1
string.value: Here, WEK!

string.name: c29_s2
string.value: I'm good, right? WEK WEK!

string.name: c29_s3
string.value: So I should just stick it out like this? WEK..

string.name: c29_f1
string.value: No, WEK!

string.name: c29_f2
string.value: I'm too tired... WEK.

string.name: c29_f3
string.value: What? WEK.

string.name: c30_s1
string.value: Like this, right? WEK.

string.name: c30_s2
string.value: You know I'm the bomb, WEK.

string.name: c30_s3
string.value: Haha, this is fun. WEK.

string.name: c30_f1
string.value: No way, I'm too tired. WEK.

string.name: c30_f2
string.value: I'm too lazy to do this. WEK.

string.name: c30_f3
string.value: What are you saying, WEK.

string.name: c31_s1
string.value: Here's my hand, err, wing.

string.name: c31_s2
string.value: Heavy, isn't it? I can't fly with these, though.

string.name: c31_s3
string.value: Is it fluffy? It feels good, right? This is fuuuun!

string.name: c31_f1
string.value: Ugh, this is quite a chore.

string.name: c31_f2
string.value: Nah, maybe next time.

string.name: c31_f3
string.value: What am I, a dog? I'm a penguin, you know!

string.name: c32_s1
string.value: Ahhh, here's a smooch.

string.name: c32_s2
string.value: I'm blushing...

string.name: c32_s3
string.value: Make sure not to leave a hole on my cheek!

string.name: c32_f1
string.value: Um... do you know exactly where we are right now?

string.name: c32_f2
string.value: Go brush your teeth first.

string.name: c32_f3
string.value: No way, I don't wanna do it.

string.name: c33_s1
string.value: I like smooches, too.

string.name: c33_s2
string.value: I've been dreaming of these~!

string.name: c33_s3
string.value: Don't do it for too long, though. Yay!

string.name: c33_s4
string.value: Kiss me again!

string.name: c33_f1
string.value: Who in the right mind would wanna kiss you?

string.name: c33_f2
string.value: Not me...no way.

string.name: c33_f3
string.value: You ain't doing this for free.

string.name: c33_f4
string.value: Tell me that was a joke.

string.name: c34_s1
string.value: Yoo hoo! I'm flyinnnng!

string.name: c34_s2
string.value: Look! I can fly!

string.name: c34_s3
string.value: I deserve a trophy for this performance!

string.name: c34_s4
string.value: I believe I can fly!!! WEK WEK!

string.name: c34_f1
string.value: Um...don't I look a litttttle hefty for that?

string.name: c34_f2
string.value: Hey, have you ever seen a flying penguin?

string.name: c34_f3
string.value: You must have lost your mind.

string.name: c34_f4
string.value: What are you saying...?

string.name: c35_s1
string.value: Isn't this cool??

string.name: c35_s2
string.value: Show me another penguin that can fly like me.

string.name: c35_s3
string.value: Don't I look MAGNIFICENT?

string.name: c35_s4
string.value: No need to waste time. Here we go!

string.name: c35_f1
string.value: Yo, I'm afraid of height.

string.name: c35_f2
string.value: You fly first!

string.name: c35_f3
string.value: I suggest you study a little on penguin's anatomy.

string.name: c35_f4
string.value: Um, have you heard of Law of Gravity? Hello!!

string.name: c36_s1
string.value: I'm at a loss for words...WEK!

string.name: c36_s2
string.value: It's hard to find a penguin as cute-looking as me! WEK!

string.name: c36_s3
string.value: Hey, I've been cute for quite some time, you know! WEK!

string.name: c36_s4
string.value: Really? You're not kidding, right? WEK!

string.name: c36_f1
string.value: I can't trust you, WEK.

string.name: c36_f2
string.value: I'm not CUTE. I'm DASHING. WEK!!!

string.name: c36_f3
string.value: I NEED SOME TRUTH AROUND HERE! WEK!

string.name: c36_f4
string.value: What do you want me to say in return, WEK?

string.name: c37_s1
string.value: Of course, master!

string.name: c37_s2
string.value: You won't find a penguin quite like me. Enjoy it!

string.name: c37_s3
string.value: I can never get enough of your compliments!

string.name: c37_s4
string.value: Thanks for your kind words! I really appreciate that!

string.name: c37_f1
string.value: Since when did we compliment each other anyway...

string.name: c37_f2
string.value: Um, how about a NO.

string.name: c37_f3
string.value: Let me just sleep, okay?

string.name: c37_f4
string.value: Feed me instead of waxing stupid poetics like that.

string.name: f2_s
string.value: FOOD!!! WEK!

string.name: f2_f
string.value: I can't eat no more. WEK.

string.name: f3_s
string.value: Now this tastes good... WEK~~

string.name: f3_f
string.value: Ugh, I feel like throwing up. WEK.

string.name: f4_s
string.value: FISH! Woo hoo!

string.name: f4_f
string.value: I need to be on a diet.

string.name: s2
string.value: Wek... Wek...

string.name: s3
string.value: Master, Please.... Wek...Wek...

string.name: s4
string.value: Master~ Behave yourself~ Wek...

string.name: c1_s2
string.value: Quack Quack Quack!

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: My legs ARE getting tired

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: You're the boss...

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: Quack! Is this the right place?

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: Okay, okay, I'm sitting!

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: Quack! Who do you think you are?

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: Are you TRYING to make me fat and lazy?

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: Why don't you sit? Quack!

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: No way, White Ducks get dirty too easily!

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: Quack! I love to relax!

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: Watch me, it's easy.

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: I'm waiting for a challenge.

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: Quack quack! You got it Boss!

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: Who do you think you are?

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Now is not a good time...

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: It's too dirty to sit around here...

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: Just because you're lazy doesn't mean I am.

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: Is it because I'm ugly?

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: Quack! Don't be angry!

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: Quaaaack I'm sorry!

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: So sorry boss!

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: Don't take your anger out on me!

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: I didn't do anything!

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: Quack quack! Dummy!

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: Stupid, quack.

string.value: Quack! I feel really bad.

string.name: c5_s2
string.value: You really scare me...

string.value: Quack! I'm trying really hard!

string.name: c5_s4
string.value: Don't make that face!

string.name: c5_f1
string.value: Quack, that's a bad look for you.

string.name: c5_f2
string.value: I didn't do anything wrong!

string.name: c5_f3
string.value: You get what you deserve!

string.name: c5_f4
string.value: I was just sitting there, quack quack!

string.name: c6_s1
string.value: Wow boss, I really didn't mean it!

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: Quack, I'm really scared right now!

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: That was mean.

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: Whoa, you look scary...

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: You should try anger management.

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: You can't boss me around!

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: I'm innocent!

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: You must be REALLY bored...

string.value: Sure thing!

string.value: Quack! No Problem!

string.value: Man I'm good.

string.value: I wanted to stretch my legs anyway!

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: Quack quack, I don't think so.

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: I'm pretty happy sitting.

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: So annoying...quack quack!

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: QUACK! I don't feel like it.

string.value: You're lucky to have such a smart duck.

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: Such a simple request!

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: Whatever you want boss!

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: Hey, I'm much taller now! Quack Quack.

string.value: Quack! Sounds boring.

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: I'm too tired!

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: Not now boss.

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: Let's just stay here!

string.value: I must be REALLY good, right?

string.value: You won't find a Rudolph that can stand like I do

string.name: c9_s3
string.value: Now that I'm up like this, I can see things from afar

string.name: c9_s4
string.value: Standing up is sooo easy now.

string.value: Man, so annoying

string.name: c9_f2
string.value: I'd rather sleep for now.

string.value: I can't hear you. I can't hear you

string.value: So embarassing, quack!

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: Don't look!

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: Quack! It's smelly!!

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: No, I don't feel like it.

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: I'm too shy!

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: Quack! It's rude to poop in public!

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: I poop when I want to.

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: That was incredible!

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: That's the last time I eat at the pet park!

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: Quack!Thanks boss, I needed that!

string.value: It's just not coming out!

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: I don't really need to.

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: I'd poop if you fed me.

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: Quack Quack I don't tell you when to poop!

string.value: Ahhhhhh, please don't look. It's embarassing

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: Ahh...the poop looks really good today

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: Careful, you might step in it!

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: That's a big smell for a small duck!

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: Why don't you poop?

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: I'd rather have some lunch.

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: I have a lot on my mind right now, sorry.

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: My poop is none of your business!!

string.name: c13_s1
string.value: I'm behind you 100%!

string.name: c13_s2
string.value: Don't forget to feed me!

string.name: c13_s3
string.value: I like getting closer to you.

string.value: I love hearing I LOVE YOU!!

string.value: No. I spit when I talk.

string.name: c13_f2
string.value: You don't understand me.

string.value: Get some friends!

string.name: c13_f4
string.value: I don't want to talk to you!

string.value: I'd like some adventure please!

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: It's fun being a travelling duck!

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: Quack! How about this weather?

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: I'd like to hear a joke!

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: Just being near you makes me bored.

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: I can't talk to someone uglier than I am.

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: I think I have a sore throat!

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: Quack! I'm a duck, not a professional film and television actor!

string.value: Have you thought about getting a haircut?

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: Somebody needs to go on a diet!

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: An apple a day keeps the doctor away!

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: Let's go do something fun!

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: Don't you have anyone to talk to?

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: You must be pretty unpopular...

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: Maybe another time.

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: It's not me, it's you.

string.value: I love hugs! Quack quack!

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: Yay! Hug me!

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: Nothing like a duck hug! Quack quack!

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: Somebody smells...and it's not me.

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: Quack! You stink!

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: It's too hot in here!

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: I don't hug ugly people.

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: Big hugs for my favorite boss!

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: Let's hug it out!

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: I feel so close to you! Quack!

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: Quack! You're so cuddly!

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: Do I look like I want to hug you? QUACK!

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: Go jump in a lake! Seriously...you smell.

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: Boss, don't you have any perfume?

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: I have a headache.

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: Yay! I want a hug!

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: Quack Quack! Duck hugs are the best!

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: I'd take a duck hug over a bear hug any day!

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: I thought you'd never ask!

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: I don't hug people I don't like.

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: I'm hungry.

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: Maybe if you were level 200.

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: Quack! I love you too!

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: Quack! You're not so bad yourself!

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: Thanks! Quack quack.

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: Do we need to have a talk?

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: You must be joking.

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: Well I don't love you!

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: QUACK! Love someone else!

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: You're great, boss!

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: I'm a lucky duck!

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: Quack quack, I love you too!

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: Quack! I love feeling loved!

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: I only love those who shower.

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: I like long walks, especially when they are taken by people who annoy me.

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: I don't like liars.

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: Well I love...food.

string.value: Right back at you!

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: You're the best!

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: I love hearing that!

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: You're so good to me!

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: I don't really care.

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: You need to decide if you love me or hate me.

string.value: Prove it.

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: I don't believe you!

string.value: It's my feathery charm.

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: Yup, I'm adorable!

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: How can you resist this face? Quack!

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: I got it from my mom!

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: I'm having a horrible hair day.

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: I'm not a performing monkey!

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: Quack! Get away.

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: Maybe if you feed me!

string.value: I'm getting a big head!

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: Say it again! You know you love me!

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: I do it for you boss!

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: Quack! I'm so cute it should be illegal!

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: It's a blessing and a curse.

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: I just want to be left alone.

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: Quack quack, why don't you be cute?

string.value: Is this what you want?

string.value: It's one of my best qualities!

string.name: c24_s3
string.value: Anything you want boss! You got it!

string.value: Man, I'm a handsome duck!

string.value: I'm don't do stupid tricks for stupid people.

string.name: c24_f2
string.value: Being cute doesn't just happen! It takes time and effort.

string.value: That is SO last year.

string.value: You're not the boss of me! Well...technically you are.

string.value: Glad you see my true potential!

string.value: I'm the best looking swan in the country!

string.name: c25_s3
string.value: I should be a model.

string.name: c25_s4
string.value: Beauty is on the outside!

string.value: I'm just an ugly duckling.

string.name: c25_f2
string.value: Being beautiful doesn't just happen! It takes time and effort.

string.value: Why are you so demanding?

string.name: c25_f4
string.value: Make me.

string.value: I don't want to sleep right now!

string.value: Quack!! I'm not tired!

string.value: No! I'd rather eat.

string.value: Boss, I'm exhausted!

string.value: You know best!

string.value: Sigh...I guess I can do that.

string.value: Is this what you mean?

string.value: Are you tired or something?

string.value: No, not right now.

string.name: c27_f3
string.value: Are you trying to get rid of me?

string.name: c27_f4
string.value: You can't tell me what to do!

string.value: Yay! I love a good nap!

string.value: Okay, but can we get some lunch when I wake up?

string.value: I'd enjoy catching some Z's! Zzzz...

string.value: I don't take cat naps, I take duck naps!

string.name: c28_f2
string.value: No. You're not my mom.

string.value: I want to go swimming!

string.name: c28_f4
string.value: I can't sleep if I'm not tired!

string.value: I could dance all night!

string.value: Oh yea! Shake your tailfeather!

string.value: How many times will you ask me to dance?

string.name: c29_s4
string.value: It's time to party!

string.value: Leave me alone!

string.name: c29_f2

string.value: Let's get on a boat! Yip!

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: Yip. What do you want me to say?

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: Yip yip yip! Tell me a joke!

string.name: f1_s
string.value: Yip yip! Yay!

string.name: f2_s
string.value: Yip yip!! I want some bacon!

string.name: f2_f
string.value: I really don't like this...

string.name: f3_s
string.value: Yip yip!! You are the best, master!!

string.name: f3_f
string.value: Give me all the foods!

string.name: f4_s
string.value: That was the best! Gimme more!

string.name: f4_f
string.value: I-I can't eat anymore...

string.name: s2
string.value: Master, you can't do that.

string.name: s3
string.value: Yip yip! How could you say that?

string.name: s4
string.value: Be careful master!! Everyone's watching!

string.name: c1_s2
string.value: Sit? Sit!

string.name: c1_f1
string.value: Rawk...

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: If you say so...

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: Why should I listen to you?

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: Do I look like a dog to you? Sit, indeed!

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: Yes, perhaps I shall rest my wings. RAWK!!

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: Rawk! Rawk rawk!

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: Who are you to order me around? Hm?

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: Birds can't sit, you featherless buffoon!

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: I'm sitting already! I'm sitting RIGHT NOW!

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: Yes, yes, what is it?! I swear, if you tell me to sit one more time...

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: I would be DELIGHTED if you joined me! Don't you have a chair?

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: Very well. But what's this? No cushion?

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: And if I say no?

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: You dare tell me to sit? RAWK!

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: Where shall I sit? On your shoulder? Or on your head?

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: The dictionary defines 'sit' as resting with the torso vertical and the body supported on the buttocks. Correct?

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: Yes, it's nice to sit with my intellectual equal. RAWK!

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: Let's sit in silence, mm-hmm?

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: Yes, I am quite tired. We've been on a long journey, and I fear I've talked myself into a stupor. RAWK!

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: Why do you insist I sit?

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: Don't you know any other commands?!

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: How dull.

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: No. No, that's quite all right. Rawk!

string.name: c5_s1
string.value: No... Don't... Bad...

string.name: c5_f1
string.value: Rawk...

string.name: c6_s1
string.value: Perhaps I was bad. But you'll hear no apology from me!

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: Don't you think you're overreacting?

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: Of course. It won't happen again. Whatever you say.

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: What can I say? My apologies.

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: Rawk... Rawk rawk rawk!

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: Rawk... What did I do?

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: I simply don't understand.

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: What is the meaning of this? Unbelievable...

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: I've nothing to say to a tyrant like you!

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: How does throwing a temper tantrum help anything?

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: There's no need to be so forceful.

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: I understand. But is this really my fault?

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: What is it NOW?

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: I'll hear you out. What did I do wrong this time?

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: Hmph, you must be bored.

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: Rawk! Do you want an apology?

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: If you can explain to me what I did wrong, I will be more than happy to apologize.

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: Perhaps what I did was wrong, but will an apology REALLY make you feel better?

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: I know what I did was wrong! I don't need you to remind me.

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: Yes, I'm a bad parrot. Does that make you feel better?

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: Enough. I've had enough!

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: I have nothing to say to you. RAWK!

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: I don't know what you're talking about, and I don't care!

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: Think this over. Don't you value our friendship? RAWK!

string.name: c9_s1
string.value: Love you! Rawk!

string.name: c9_s2
string.value: That's more like it!

string.name: c9_f1
string.value: Rawk...

string.name: c10_s1
string.value: Love, love. Such a sweet word!

string.name: c10_s2
string.value: You like me? You really like me?

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: Is your love true? Oh, who cares!

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: I'd blush, but parrots can't blush...

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: Sorry, but my heart belongs to a little parakeet in Henesys.

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: How awkward.

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: But what will the other parrots think?

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: RAWK! LIAR!

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: The love between parrot and master is forever!

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: Is it the color of my feathers that did it? Or the manly shape of my beak?

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: Sh, keep your voice down! You're embarrassing me...

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: Caaan you feeel the love tooooday...

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: Prove it!

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: No! I won't let you break this parrot heart!

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: Sure, you say that now, but isn't this just a flight of fancy?

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: Hee hee! RAWK!

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: My melancholy heart, once dark like Kerning City's nighttime sky, is brightened by your affection! CRAAAAW!!

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: Yes! Very good! Let's have fun! RAWK!

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: Thank you. Not that I feel the same way, but it's nice to hear.

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: I know.

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: You find me attractive? Is that what you're telling me?

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: Do you feel a special kinship for me? Or is it something more?

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: Love? I simply can't understand it.

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: Love? Bah! Who needs it?

string.name: c13_s1
string.value: Rawk! How degrading!

string.name: c13_s2
string.value: Good idea to lighten the load. Makes it easier to fly. Rawk!

string.name: c13_s3
string.value: Rawk! You need a sample? I didn't know you were a doctor!

string.name: c13_s4
string.value: I feel so refreshed. I feel like I can fly! Rawk!

string.name: c13_f1
string.value: Sorry. Stomach's not feeling up to the task today!

string.name: c13_f2
string.value: What a thing to say! Rawk!

string.name: c13_f3
string.value: What a disgusting thing to say!

string.name: c13_f4
string.value: I can't do...THAT on command!

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: Rawk! I'll just make a little room for lunch.

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: Rawk! I was going to do that, anyway!

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: Very well. Fire main cannon!

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: You can tell I've been eating the good stuff because it doesn't smell. Ha!

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: Feed me first. Rawk!

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: Stop asking me to do such base things! RAWK!

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: I'm not a faucet, you know. It doesn't happen on command.

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: Think before you speak! Think!

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: That's a child's word. I prefer the word feces, myself.

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: Observe, as my body excretes the waste it's built up through the digestive process!

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: I've got stage fright. Mind singing a song to help me relax?

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: R-rawk! Wait for it...

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: RAWK! That didn't feel right out. Maybe I should see a doctor...

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: How did you know I had to go? That's a little unsettling...

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: Why don't you look after your business, and I'll look after my own? Rawk!

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: I seem to be having trouble. Do you have some yogurt I could eat? Rawk!

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: Sweet dreams! Rawk!

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: This is nice sleeping weather. Rawk!

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: I may not have eyelids, but I can sleep with the best of them!

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: Remember, even when I sleep, I'm watching you! Zzz...

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: Not sleepy, not one bit!

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: What will you do while I sleep? Rawk!

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: It's much too early for that!

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: You won't put ME to sleep!

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: Perhaps I'll wake up early and get the worm... Rawk!

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: I'm going to eat well and sleep right. Goodnight!

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: Goodnight, and may you dream of many eagles.

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: Rawk! I can't sleep right after eating!

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: No. I get headaches if I sleep too much.

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: I'll not sleep my life away! RAWK!

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: I'll sleep when I please, thank you very much!

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: Sometimes I get so busy counting sheep I forget to actually sleep.

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: Nothing like a good nap when you're feeling sleepy!

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: I'll dream of pigs and slimes tonight. I just know it.

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: My friends say I talk to much. Makes it hard to sleep. That's not true, is it? RAWK!

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: I can't sleep on the floor! Bring me some nice, comfortable branches to perch on.

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: I can't talk now. I'd rather chat! Rawk! Rawk! RAAAWK!

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: You're going to hit me after I fall asleep, right? I'm on to you!

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: That's okay. I slept yesterday.

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: You're just trying to get me to shut up, aren't you? Rawk!

string.name: c19
string.value: talk|chat|say

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: I thought you'd never ask!

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: Sometimes the cap'n doesn't use good grammar! Rawk!

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: Don't get me wrong, Adriano's a fine navigator. But isn't he a little too quiet?

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: Bonkey is dumb as a brick. I wouldn't want to be on his bad side, though!

string.name: c20
string.value: talk|chat|say

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: Quick! Get me a navigator and a helmsman, and we'll set sail for Florina Beach!

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: Secrets? No such thing. If you can tell one person, you can tell everybody!

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: They say it's not good to talk too much, but I've never found this to be the case! Rawk!

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: A pirate ship is blind without a good parrot in the crow's nest! Rawk!

string.name: c21
string.value: talk|chat|say

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: Here's a question! Why is it always night in Magatia and day in Ariant?

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: Who're the strongest people in Maple World? First Cygnus, then Aran. Third would be the ruler of the Elves, but she's long gone...

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: Is the Black Mage real? No one's seen him, have they? It all sounds made up to me!

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: According to this, a pirate is someone who...attacks ships at sea and steals from others. Huh, go figure...

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: Hello! Hello! Kraw want a cracker!

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: Rawk! Rawk!

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: Want to see something cool?

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: Sit back, relax, and enjoy the show. Rawk!

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: Welcome to the Parrot Show.

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: Dun, dun, DUN!

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: Not until I've warmed up!

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: I don't perform tricks. Do I look like a mere pet to you? RAWK!

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: Wouldn't you rather have a deep conversation?

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: Sorry, I only perform tricks for people I respect.

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: It may be the same trick as last time, but it's always exciting!

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: Finally! I was getting sick of talking!

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: For you, I can do this all day!

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: I'll keep going 'til all my feathers fall off! Rawk!

string.name: c23_f1
string.value: I'm all tricked out.

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: Want to see it again? Really?

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: Forget it, all right? Just forget it!

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: I'm all out of feathers here.

string.name: f1_s
string.value: Food! Food! Food!

string.name: f1_f
string.value: Do I look like a pig to you? Knock it off with the food!

string.name: f2_s
string.value: I was hungry enough to eat a shark! Thanks!

string.name: f2_f
string.value: Keep this up and I'll be too heavy to fly! Rawk!

string.name: f3_s
string.value: I could eat cherries for every meal. Rawk!

string.name: f3_f
string.value: I'm stuffed! I don't think I could even eat another cherry.

string.name: f4_s
string.value: All this chattering has given me an appetite!

string.name: f4_f
string.value: Rawk! You're not fattening me up, are you?

string.name: s1
string.value: I may talk a lot, but even I wouldn't say that!

string.name: s2
string.value: Let's keep it civil, shall we?

string.name: s3
string.value: I know I didn't hear that right. Did I?

string.name: s4
string.value: I see what kind of person you are.

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: Huh? What?

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: Sitting now!

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: Already sitting!

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: Right away!

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: On it!

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: No, sir!

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: I refuse.

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: What? Whaaaat?!

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: By your command!

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: Yes, immediately!

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: No can do, sir.

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: How humiliating...

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: I apologize.

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: I can't sit anymore.
