string.value: Oops, sorry.

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: Huh? What?

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: I repent!

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: See my tears!

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: Excuse me.

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: Please stop.

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: I'm sorry.

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: Yes, I apologize.

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: I don't know what to say...

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: I repent.

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: I disagree!

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: What did I do?

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: Why are you doing this?

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: Oh boy!

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: Huh? What?

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: Me too.

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: No answer.

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: I love you too.

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: I'm blushing.

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: You're making me happy...

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Ah, I'm so happy. What to do?

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: You're making me uncomfortable.

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: That's unexpected...

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: I...don't feel the same way.

string.name: c13_s1
string.value: Pooping, sir.

string.name: c13_s2
string.value: Ah... Hurr.

string.name: c13_f4
string.value: Huh? What?

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: Easy does it.

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: That's better.

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: Stomach's empty.

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: So full...

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: I have a strong stomach.

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: Finally succeeded.

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: I feel lighter somehow...

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: I haven't pooped in days...

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: I cannot obey.

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: Not in public!

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: Enough of this...

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: Huh? What?

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: Nap time!

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: Overnight shift...

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: Yes, a nap would be good.

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: I will sleep now.

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: Yes, I was about to drop off...

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: I could use a good rest.

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: Not sleepy.

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: I have things to do.

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: I have insomnia.

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: No, I won't.

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: I'm hungry! Yip yip!!

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: Do you hate me?

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: Please don't scold me...

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: Yip! I'm sorry master...

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: I'll stop pooping on your socks...

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: Yip yip yip!

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: I'm disappointed in you master!

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: I'm gonna run away!

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: I didn't do anything wrong, hmph!

string.name: c9_s2
string.value: Yip yip!

string.name: c10_s1
string.value: I'm your best pet! Yip!

string.name: c10_s2
string.value: I'll follow you anywhere! Yip!

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: Yip yip yip! I'm so happy!

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: Liar! Yip!

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: You're not talking to me, right? I am a dog. Yip!

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: I pooped in your slippers this morning. Yip!

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: Yip! Food?

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: I love you too! Yip!

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: You're the best master in the whole wide world!

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: I love you too, master! Yip yip yip!

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: Yip! You're nice.

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: Yip? Of course you do! I'm adorable!

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: Don't you have someone better to say that to? Yip!

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: Liar liar! Yip yip!

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: You don't mean it. *Whimper*

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: I love you SO much! Yip yip!

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: Yip! You're embarrassing me!

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: If you tell that to another pet, I'll bite you! Yip!

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: I'll follow you anywhere! Yip!

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: You're just saying that. Yip?

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: Liar, liar, pants on fire!

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: You can't fool me. Yip!

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: Bad joke! Yip!

string.name: c13_s1
string.value: I-I think it moved! Yip!

string.name: c13_s2
string.value: I pooped! I pooped! Yippee!

string.name: c13_s3
string.value: Yip! Yip! Your turn, master!

string.name: c13_s4
string.value: I thought I was constipated, but...nope! Yip!

string.name: c13_f1
string.value: Yip! But I already did! Yip!

string.name: c13_f2
string.value: I can't. My tummy hurts. *Whimper*

string.name: c13_f3
string.value: *Whimper* Poo is dirty.

string.name: c13_f4
string.value: Yip! I need a bag for my poop!

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: Poop. Poop! Hee hee! Poop!

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: I can't just poop all day, you know? Yip!

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: Yip! Yip! Okay, now clean it up!

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: Watch out! I pooped there! Yip!

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: I can't just poop all day, you know? Yip!

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: Yip... I think I'm constipated... Grr...

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: I can't just poop all day, you know? Yip!

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: Master, bathrooms are for pooping!

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: Yip! It doesn't smell bad, does it?

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: Wipe my butt, please. Yip!

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: *Whimper* Look at it! It's huge!

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: Yip! Yip! Be careful! I dumped it right next to you.

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: Yip! I don't wanna poop!

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: I can't go right now. Yip yip!

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: *Whimper* I'll go tomorrow.

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: You first, master! Yip!

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: Zzz... Zzz...

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: I'm pooped! G'night!

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: Yip! You go to sleep!

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: It's play time, not sleep time! Grr...

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: Wait, I just buried a raccoon somewhere and I have to find it!

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: *Whimpers* You said we could play fetch!

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: Yes! I'm gonna get that rabbit this time.

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: Yip! I'm headed for snoozeland!

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: Night-night, master!

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: Wake me up when it's chow time!

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: I'm too hungry to sleep.

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: I'm a tough pup! I don't need sleep!

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: Maybe you need a nap! Yip!

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: Yip yip! No! I think I smell an intruder!

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: Yip... yip... zzzz.

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: One Blue Birdy... two Blue Birdy...

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: Zzz... Zzz...

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: Gotta chase my tail! Gotta chase my tail!

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: What? Wait! There might be snakes around here!

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: If I sleep too much, I'll turn into a piggy puppy, yup!!

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: Yip! Give me a salmon treat and I'll think about it!

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: I like waking up early! Yip yip yip!

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: You're my favorite! If anyone else likes you, I'll bite 'em! Yip!

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: Yip! Let's do a quest! Wanna do a quest? Let's do a quest!

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: Aww... why are my legs so short?!

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: Yip! Yip! I'm studying humanese!

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: I'm hungry. Gimme a snack. Yip!

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: *Whimper* It's so cloudy today. I wish the sun was out.

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: I got nothing special to say. Yip!

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: Admins never ask for your password! Yip! What's a password?

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: I could look at you all day. Yip yip!

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: Is there really a scary dragon living in Leafre? Yip!

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: Yip! What do you like most about me, master? Yip yip!

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: Yip! Woah, I'm so out of it right now.

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: I tried to look up my horoscope, but I can't read. Yip!

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: Yip! Yip yip! My back ITCHES!

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: Yip! Yip! I can read your miiiind!

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: Thanks to all the treats, I got a tummy! Yip!

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: I'm not scared of no monsters! Just gimme potions. Yip!

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: You look JUST like me, master. Yip!

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: Yip! Yip! My tail's wagging! Look at it go!

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: Yip yip! I can't understand human language, yip!!

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: Let's get on a boat! Yip!

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: Yip. What do you want me to say?

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: Yip yip yip! Tell me a joke!

string.name: f1_s
string.value: Yip yip! Yay!

string.name: f2_s
string.value: Yip yip!! I want some bacon!

string.name: f2_f
string.value: I really don't like this...

string.name: f3_s
string.value: Yip yip!! You are the best, master!!

string.name: f3_f
string.value: Give me all the foods!

string.name: f4_s
string.value: That was the best! Gimme more!

string.name: f4_f
string.value: I-I can't eat anymore...

string.name: s2
string.value: Master, you can't do that.

string.name: s3
string.value: Yip yip! How could you say that?

string.name: s4
string.value: Be careful master!! Everyone's watching!

string.name: c1_s1
string.value: So it shall be.

string.name: c1_s2
string.value: As you wish.

string.name: c1_f2
string.value: I see no purpose in sitting.

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: I am bound to oblige.

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: Why are you mortals always so frivolous with your wishes?

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: Does this please you, oh temporary master?

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: I am already floating.

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: My cloud is perfectly comfortable.

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: Have you decided your real wishes yet?

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: May I do something else? Grawr?

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: You have such strange requests.

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: Is this what mortals enjoy?

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: This is oddly enjoyable.

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: Does this make me look more regal?

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: Wish denied.

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: You are wasting my powers!

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: Wouldn't you rather I eat someone?

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: Enough of your trivialities!

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: I just place my bottom upon the ground?

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: Sitting with you is quite relaxing.

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: I am able to conjure the powers of the heavens as well, you know?

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: I will, should you bring me a loaf of the meat variety.

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: Seven hundred thousand years of magical power and you ask me to sit.

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: Ask me for riches like a normal person!

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: I am seated already, mortal. Are you blinded with awe?

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: Speak to me when you have discovered respect.

string.name: c5_s1
string.value: That was not your desire?

string.name: c5_s2
string.value: I will attempt to be better.

string.name: c5_f1
string.value: Your mortal ways confound me.

string.name: c6_s1
string.value: You are a cruel master!

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: That may be a slight overreaction.

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: Well, if you put it that way...

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: Do not blame me for being myself!

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: You dare assault me?!

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: Perhaps it is YOU who are at fault, mortal!

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: I have done nothing to earn your scorn!

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: A bolt of lightning might change your attitude.

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: I understand, you are under a lot of stress.

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: I am above your mortal emotions.

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: Was I so wrong? It was only a squirrel!

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: I will not be sad! I will not be sad!

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: One of these days, I'm going to drop this marble on your head.

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Why, you ill-tempered little goblin!

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: Is this how you mortals treat one another?!

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: I will watch you fry one day.

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: Fine, I am sorry.

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: I haven't felt this bad since I ate that priest.

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: I find you strangely terrifying, mortal.

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: I have shamed a thousand generations of my ancestors.

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: But I have done everything you asked!

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: You are the most fickle mortal I've ever met.

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: You are adorable when you are angry.

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: Find something else to yell at!

string.name: c9_s1
string.value: You are not entirely repulsive.

string.name: c9_s2
string.value: I hope you do not come to harm.

string.name: c9_f2
string.value: Um, I...

string.name: c10_s1
string.value: You find my presence...enjoyable?

string.name: c10_s2
string.value: I-I guess I...like you?

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: Hmm. Yes.

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: Um, right.

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: Aren't you supposed to be trembling in fear?

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: Master, this is highly inappropriate.

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: I will not be talked down to!

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: You are making my scales itch.

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: Why do my cheeks feel warm? WHAT HAVE YOU DONE TO ME?!

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: My heart thumps when you say these measly words!

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: You are my favorite mortal.

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: I believe you mortals would say, "ditto".

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: My dragon heart is not to be trifled with.

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: Do not say anything you will regret.

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: I, uh, have to wash my scales tonight.

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: Hey, how about those Green Mushrooms? Very green, aren't they?

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: Would you like me to take you flying?

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: I will move the heavens for you!

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: Might a humble dragon receive a kiss?

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: I know.

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: Are mortal affections given so freely?

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: I am sure you say this to all your pets.

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: You are a fibber! Grawr!

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: Who needs love when you have power?!

string.name: c13_s1
string.value: Very well.

string.name: c13_s2
string.value: My eyes may be closed, but I have the reflexes of a water dragon!

string.name: c13_s3
string.value: I was already going to do that.

string.name: c13_s4
string.value: Do not disturb me.

string.name: c13_f1
string.value: Perhaps you'll think of a better wish later.

string.name: c13_f2
string.value: Grawr! It is not my nap time!

string.name: c13_f3
string.value: You summoned me for this?!

string.name: c13_f4
string.value: I have little need for such things.

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: I suppose I could use a recharge.

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: As you wish, mortal.

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: The weather IS quite nice...gryaaawn.

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: We mighty dragons have no need for sleep!

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: I am wide awake.

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: This place is not fit for my great slumber!

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: I am no cat, content to lie in the sun!

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: May I rest upon your lap? This cloud is quite cold.

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: Oh, the dreams I will have!

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: Finally, a celestial nap!

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: Your wish is granted, mortal! Zzzzzz

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: What if I were to eat you in my sleep?

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: This area is too loud! My dragon ears are sensitive.

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: Can't we go battle some monsters?

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: I JUST drank some dragon coffee!

string.name: c16
string.value: talk|chat|say

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: Allow me to fill in your pitiful knowledge of dragons...

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: I was once a mere thunder lizard, until I caught this orb.

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: Do know you how luck you are? Let me tell you.

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: If that is what you wish...

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: Come closer and I will...

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: I did not descend from the heavens to banter!

string.name: c17
string.value: talk|chat|say

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: Your world is teeming with life.

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: Mortal lives fascinate me.

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: My mane is made of the finest spun gold.

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: I am omnipotent and all powerful, but I do get a little lonely.

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: Hold on, let me see if I have anything...NO.

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: Why do you waste my power?

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: I have nothing to say.

string.name: c18
string.value: talk|chat|say

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: Your enormous head must be quite a burden.

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: Does this orb make my tail look fat?

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: All behold the glory of my master and its silly face!

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: My wisdom sounds much better in the original Dragon.

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: What do you want to talk about?

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: You talk.

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: Here I am, talking.

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: Stand back, puny mortals!

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: Watch in awe!

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: Steel yourselves!

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: Your mind will be blown!

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: Give me a moment, mortal!

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: I am no mere pet!

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: Do the powers of the gods so amuse you?

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: This show of force is quite exhausting.

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: Grawr! Look at all these lightning bolts!

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: My thunder will break the heavens!

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: Graaaaawwwwrrr!!! It's show time!

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: This is no mere trick! This is an event!

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: I tire of these petty displays.

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: We JUST did that.

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: Have you nothing better to wish for?!

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: My powers must recharge.

string.name: c21
string.value: This meat is so lustrous!

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: My eternal tummy is full!

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: Rawr! Such earthly delights!

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: I will sink through my cloud if I eat another bite!

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: I try to say no, but my belly continues to rumble.

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: No more, I have much...um...business to attend to.

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: Truly you are a great chef, master!

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: Do not look upon me. I am such a fat dragon...

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: You will not be my master forever...

string.name: c22
string.value: I do not comprehend your ridiculous ways.

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: I WILL eat you. You are but a worm in my eyes.

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: Do not curse the commander of lightning!

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: True demon power!

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: My real form is scary, Mr'kuma!

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: I no perform like kr'grana.

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: You do trick. I want laugh when you fall.

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: That very personal...

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: I show you already! You have bad brain!

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: What if I did this at your next surprise party?

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: Let's go scare some little girls with this trick!

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: With this power, I could conquer all of you puny humans.

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: Bask in awe, master! I am a being of pure terror!

string.name: c23_f1
string.value: How about I torch all your underwear instead?

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: Are you sure? You can never unsee it.

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: Shouldn't we be undermining somebody's hope?

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: I'll eat your eyebrows if you tell me that again!

string.name: f3_s
string.value: Is good, Mr'kuma.

string.name: f3_f
string.value: I already fat!

string.name: f4_s
string.value: Keep it coming!

string.name: f4_f
string.value: What are you trying to do to me?!

string.name: s1
string.value: Ha! Unia, Mr'aku.

string.name: s2
string.value: You...like demon joke?

string.name: s3
string.value: Old boss call me that. He so cool.

string.name: s4
string.value: Hey! Even we demons have some etiquette.

string.name: c1_s1
string.value: Peng? Peng?

string.name: c1_s2
string.value: Peng! Peeng!

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: So I sit like this? Peng?

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: Peeng? I sat like you told me to!

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: Are you worried that my feet are tired?

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: Sitting sure is comfortable, peng!

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: Peng? How do I sit?

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: ?? I don't speak human yet!

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: Show me how to do it! Peeng!

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: I have to sit on this bare ground? Peng?

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: You sit down too, master! You look tired! Peng!

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: It's a good thing my butt is so fluffy! Peng peng!

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: Peng, thank you master! I was actually kinda tired.

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: Ah, it feels like I came to a picnic! Peng peng!

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: I'm gonna look like a cushion if I sit... peng peng...

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: My legs aren't even hurting... do I really have to sit? Peng?

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: I don't want to sit unless it's on your lap... Peeng...

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: My legs are too short... Peng...

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: Now that I sat down, I feel sleepy... peng...

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: I'll do whatever you tell me to!

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: I was actually feeling a bit tired! Peng!

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: Peng peng! You sit down and rest too!

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: Sitting makes my belly look fat.

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: Right now, I feel more comfortable standing! Peng!

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: Once I sit, it will be hard to get up, peng...

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: Peng? What did you say?

string.name: c5_s1
string.value: Peeeng... Peng...

string.name: c5_f1
string.value: Peng! Pe-pe-pe-pe-peng!

string.name: c5_f2
string.value: Peng? Peng peng!!

string.name: c6_s1
string.value: Hearing that from you hurts my feelings. Peng.

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: Peeng... I didn't do it on purpose...

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: I'm sorry! Peng peng!

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: I didn't think it will make you angry. Peeng...

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: Peeng? I don't get what I did wrong?

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: Peeng! But I told you that I didn't mean to!

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: Are you just taking your anger out on me? Peng peng!

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: You're scolding me for eating too much, aren't you? Peng peng!

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: Don't get angry. I won't do it again... peng peng...

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: I just did that to get your attention!

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: Peeng... I'll be careful from now on...

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: Peeng! Sorry! Don't hate me!

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: Peng peng! I didn't do anything wrong.

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Peeng! You started it.

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: It's hard to understand your words! Peng peng!

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: Peng! You're a real jerk sometimes!

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: A-are you gonna throw me away? Peng...

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: Peeng. Hearing that makes me so sad.

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: I bet you're saying that for my own good.

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: I deserved that. Peng.

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: I learned it from watching you!

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: Peeng! I hate it when you get mad for no reason.

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: Peeng! Sometimes I just want to fly away!

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: I'm gonna tell Chloe!

string.name: c9_s2
string.value: Peng pe-pe-pe-peng!

string.name: c10_s1
string.value: Peng peng! Anything for you!

string.name: c10_s2
string.value: Peng! A smooch for you!

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: Peng! When I met you, it was love at first sight!

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: Peng... you're embarassing me!

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: What did you say, master?

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: That was a really bad joke, peng peng.

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: I'll pretend I didn't hear that, master... peeng...

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: I know what you feel, but that's just... peng...

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: I was waiting for those words! Peng peng!

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: A smooch on your cheek! *Mwah*

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: I'll give you a smooch anytime! Peng peng peng!

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: Peng... this is a little weird, but I like it.

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: Are you serious? Peng peng?

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: We are in public!

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: You caught me off guard...

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: Peng? What did you just say?

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: You really like smoochies!

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: Peng peng! I love giving smooches!

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: Give me a smooch too, master!

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Love you!

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: I thought I heard something weird...

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: Master, are you that lonely?

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: It's like the violent winds of El nath...

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: I'm more into other penguins...

string.name: c13_f2
string.value: Peng peng peng peng!

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: Peeng! Excuse me for a second then!

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: Peeeng! I'll be careful then!

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: Penguins only poop a little!

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: Peeng! There's my poo!

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: Peng... I'm embarrassed.

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: Peeng... we are in public!

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: Peeng peeng... I didn't even eat that much...

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: Peeng... I don't feel like pooping.

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: Peeng! Can you block for me?

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: Peeng... so embarrassing...

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: Peeng! I feel weird!

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: Peeng! So refreshing!

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: Take me to a restroom! Peeng?

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: Peeng peeng... do I really have to?

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: I think I need a laxative... Peeng...

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: Peng... pooping is so embarrassing!

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: Gently like a Penguin! Peeng!

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: Don't forget to clean up after I'm done! Peeng!

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: Cover me up!

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: Whew, that was smelly.

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: That's so embarrassing! I can't... I can't! Peng!

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: Everyone's looking, master! Peng peng!

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: I think that's against the law...

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: I'm too cute to poop! No way! Peng peng!

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: Peng peng peng peng peng!

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: Peng? Really? You really think so?

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: Peng peng peng! I'm embarrassed!

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: Thank you for the compliment! Peng peng!

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: Gotta make a cute face...

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: You're trying to butter me up!

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: I like it better when you're honest...

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: I've heard that a million times!

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: Peng? Did you say something?

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: I have an awesome owner! Peng peng!

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: Peng peng! I know, everybody tells me that.

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: You're embarrassing me master! Peng!

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: You know how to make a penguin happy! Peng!

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: I think you're lying. Peng...

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: Can't you say something more original? Peeng?

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: So embarrassing! Peng peng!

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: Peng... what did you say?

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: You sure know how to look at a penguin! Peng peng!

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: I feel like I'm falling for you all over again! Peng peng!

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: Peng peng! I'm not as awesome as you, though!

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: I feel like I can fly when you say that! Peng peng!

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: I want to hear 'cool' more than 'pretty'! Peng!

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: Sounds like you're just trying to flatter me. Peng?

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: Peng? I didn't hear you. Can you say that again?

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: Are you sure I don't look fat?

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: Peng peng! Peng peng peng!

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: ...Peng peng peng peng.

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: Peng peng? Peng peng peng.

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: Peng... I can feel your love!

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: That's embarrassing! Peeng!

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: You really mean it... Peeng!

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: (*Thump thump*)

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: Don't say tricky things to me! Peng peng...

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: I'm sorry, but you aren't my type. Peng peng.

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: ...Peng? What did you say?

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: Peng... love? Human language is difficult!

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: I love you too! Peeng!

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: My love for you grows and grows!

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: What do I do? My heart won't stop beating! Peeng!

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: Peng peng! I just want to brag about this to everyone!

string.name: c23_f1
string.value: What is love?

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: Why are you trying to flatter me like that?

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: Peng peng? Are you trying to eat me?

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: Peeng... I only like other penguins. Maybe a parrot...

string.name: c24_s1
string.value: Do you see my love overflowing?

string.name: c24_s2
string.value: Peeng! I feel like singing a song!

string.name: c24_s3
string.value: Peeng! My heart feels warm!

string.name: c24_s4
string.value: Love sure is a wonderful word. Peeng!

string.name: c24_f1
string.value: Penguins and humans can never be!

string.name: c24_f2
string.value: You should bring me a nice fish if you mean it.

string.name: c24_f3
string.value: That's great, where's dinner?

string.name: c24_f4
string.value: I thought you were seeing someone already!

string.name: c25_s1
string.value: Peeng? What should I say?

string.name: c25_s2
string.value: Peng peng! Human language is hard!

string.name: c25_s3
string.value: You may not think we get cold, but El Nath is super frosty!

string.name: c25_s4
string.value: I'm feeling a little chubby. Need more fish!

string.name: c25_f1
string.value: So what do you want me to say? Peeng?

string.name: c25_f2
string.value: When was the last time you saw a talking penguin?

string.name: c25_f4
string.value: Nah, it's too much work!

string.name: c26_s1
string.value: Are you wondering if real penguins make the peng noise?

string.name: c26_s2
string.value: I want some mackerel ice cream. Peng!

string.name: c26_s3
string.value: The Pepes in El Nath are my mean cousins!

string.name: c26_s4
string.value: I can't fly, but I'm still a bird!

string.name: c26_f1
string.value: Human language is too hard!

string.name: c26_f2
string.value: I want to hear you talk first. Peng...

string.name: c26_f3
string.value: ... I really don't have much to say. Peng?

string.name: c26_f4
string.value: Peeng... is there something you want to hear?

string.name: c27_s1
string.value: Pepes and yetis are friends, but penguins hate yetis! Peeng.

string.name: c27_s2
string.value: Chloe is really good at knitting! You didn't know that, did you?

string.name: c27_s3
string.value: Someone even asked me whether I really have legs. Peeng...

string.name: c27_s4
string.value: Peng peng... Sometimes I want to fly in the sky.

string.name: c27_f1
string.value: Talking to your pets makes you look like a crazy person!

string.name: c27_f2
string.value: I don't really have anything to talk about...

string.name: c27_f3
string.value: I'm a penguin!

string.name: c27_f4
string.value: There are too many people here.

string.name: c28_s1
string.value: Hug me! Peng peng!

string.name: c28_s2
string.value: I love hugs, peng peng!

string.name: c28_s3
string.value: Peng peng! I totally feel the love!

string.name: c28_s4
string.value: Hugs make me warm! Peng peng!

string.name: c28_f1
string.value: Peng. Whoa, calm down, buddy.

string.name: c28_f2
string.value: Uh, how about a flippershake?

string.name: c28_f3
string.value: I thought you wanted my hand?

string.name: c28_f4
string.value: ...Peng? Are you serious?

string.name: c29_s1
string.value: Hugs and snugs! Peng!

string.name: c29_s2
string.value: Hug me tight, master! Peng peng!

string.name: c29_s3
string.value: I love being hugged by you, master!

string.name: c29_s4
string.value: I can't reach you, master! Pick me up! Peng peng!

string.name: c29_f1
string.value: Don't whine, master. Peeng.

string.name: c29_f2
string.value: Eh, give me a flipper instead!

string.name: c29_f3
string.value: There are too many people watching!

string.name: c29_f4
string.value: I'll pretend I didn't hear that!

string.name: c30_s1
string.value: I love my hug-loving master! Peng!

string.name: c30_s
string.value: Hugs make my heart warm!

string.name: c30_s3
string.value: Hug me! Hug me! Hug me master!

string.name: c30_s4
string.value: Everybody's gonna be sooo jealous!

string.name: c30_f1
string.value: You are not a child!

string.name: c30_f2
string.value: Should I shake your hand instead? Peng.

string.name: c30_f3
string.value: We need to talk about personal boundaries...

string.name: c30_f4
string.value: I don't want to do that in public!

string.name: c31_s1
string.value: Good night, master! Peng!

string.name: c31_s2
string.value: I'm already asleep now... Zzzz...

string.name: c31_s3
string.value: I'm sleepy... Peeng...

string.name: c31_f1
string.value: Sleep on the ground? Where's the ice?

string.name: c31_f2
string.value: I can't sleep when I'm not sleepy. Peng!

string.name: c31_f3
string.value: Penguins sleep on full bellies. Peng peng!

string.name: c32_s1
string.value: Good thinking! Pengzzzz

string.name: c32_s2
string.value: Good night! Peeng! Sweet dreams...

string.name: c32_s3
string.value: I hope I see a Pepe in my dreams... Peeng...

string.name: c32_f1
string.value: There's not even a bed! Why do you hate me?

string.name: c32_f2
string.value: You're going to run away as soon as I close my eyes!

string.name: c32_f3
string.value: What, do you think I'm lazy?

string.name: c33_s1
string.value: You sleep well too. Peng peng!

string.name: c33_s2
string.value: I want to sleep on your lap... Peeng...

string.name: c33_s3
string.value: I love napping when you're around... Peeng...

string.name: c33_f1
string.value: If I sleep too much, I'll get fatter... then I won't be as cute!

string.name: c33_f2
string.value: What about my food?!

string.name: c33_f3
string.value: I'll sleep when you sleep.

string.name: c34_s1
string.value: Aww, it's not working!

string.name: c34_s2
string.value: I'll be able to fly one day, right?

string.name: c34_s3
string.value: One day, penguins will fly like eagles!

string.name: c34_f1
string.value: You have to teach me how to fly first... Peeng...

string.name: c34_f2
string.value: What will you give me if I fly? Peng?

string.name: c34_f3
string.value: Peeng? Have you ever seen a penguin fly?

string.name: c35_s1
string.value: I'll show you that penguins can fly too! Peeng!

string.name: c35_s2
string.value: I flew! I flew! Sort of...

string.name: c35_s3
string.value: I'll fly us away to the moon one day!

string.name: c35_f1
string.value: Oh, no, my belly's too heavy.

string.name: c35_f2
string.value: You really think it's possible to fly with these wings? Peng?

string.name: c35_f3
string.value: Peng peng? I can't fly away and leave you here all alone!

string.name: f1_s
string.value: Peng! Peng peng!!

string.name: f1_f
string.value: Peng... peeeng...

string.name: f2_s
string.value: Thank you for the food! Peng peng!

string.name: f2_f
string.value: Arg... I'm too full. It's impossible to eat anymore... Peng...

string.name: f3_s
string.value: Peeng! Maybe I'll get taller if I keep eating!!

string.name: f3_f
string.value: My stomach is going to pop... peng...

string.name: f4_s
string.value: Wow! It must be delicious! Thank you! Peng!

string.name: f4_f
string.value: Peeng... Do you have a grudge against me?

string.name: s2
string.value: What are you saying? Peeng?

string.name: s3
string.value: Aren't you supposed to talk nicely? Peeng?

string.name: s4
string.value: Peeng? I'll get upset if you keep saying weird things!

string.name: c1_s2
string.value: Havin' a sit.

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: Aye, I could use a little break.

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: Ahh, nothin' like relaxin' on a bomb.

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: This be right nice.

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: Go on, cap'n. I'll watch this bomb.

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: I say to ye, no!

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: Why do ye ask such things?

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: I've places to be, cap'n!

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: I agree, it be time for a rest.

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: This bomb be special, ye know.

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: Ye should rest as well. I worry about ye.

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: Yarr, me legs were gettin' tired.

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: Brave pirates never rest, cap'n!

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Don't make me peck at ye.

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: That not be a very inspirin' order.

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: What was that, cap'n?

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: I do be rather tired...

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: Now all I be needin' is some blueberries.

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: I not be sleepin'. Just restin' me eyes.

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: Not a bad idea, cap'n.

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: I not be carin' for ye orders.

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: Ye not be understandin' who yer messin' with...

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: Do I look like a dog to ye?

string.name: c5_s2
string.value: My mistake.

string.name: c6_s1
string.value: Aye, I deserved that.

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: I be hearin' ye, cap'n.

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: Apologies, cap'n.

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: Yarr, I messed up.

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: Did ye finally crack, cap'n?

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: What be ye problem?

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: This be a real dissapointment.

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: Belay that, cap'n!

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: Let's forget about this, cap'n.

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: Don't make me walk the plank!

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: I'll not dissapoint ye again.

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: Oh, cap'n...I be so sorry.

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: Bah! Why should I care?

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Ye need to be more carin' than that.

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: Must've heard ye wrong, cap'n.

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: Bah. I be wantin' some grub.

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: I be reflectin' upon me mistakes.

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: Ye have me apologies.

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: Sorry. I'll be a much better pirate.

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: Don't leave me, cap'n!

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: Keep this up, and ye'll have a mutiny on ye hands!

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: You treat ye crew like this?

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: Shape up, cap'n!

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: Yarr, cut that mess out!

string.name: c10_s1
string.value: Ye be my best mate, capn'n.

string.name: c10_s2
string.value: If we be stuck together, I be okay with that.

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: Always good to have the cap'n's ear!

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: Affection accepted, cap'n.

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: That's behavior unbecoming a pirate, cap'n!

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: Life at sea be lonely, cap'n. Deal with it.

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: I feel a bit sick, cap'n. And I not be seasick.

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: Stop givin' me the crazy eye, cap'n!

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: Ahoy there! Ye be makin' me feathers all ruffled.

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: That's a good one, cap'n. Never gets old.

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: That's good, cap'n. We are shipmates, after all.

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: I'm so glad our piratey ways brought us t'gether!

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: Yarr, I be tryin' ta eat here!

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: Not sure how I feel about bein' yer crew, cap'n.

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: Yeah you do. No surprise there.

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: You gone soft on me, cap'n?

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: Ye be the only cap'n for me!

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: I be swashin' any buckles you want!

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: I'll be ye first mate anytime, cap'n.

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: This be the happiest moment in me piratey life.

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: Nay, cap'n, my ladybird awaits me at our next port of call.

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: That's inappropriate conduct for a cap'n, cap'n.

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: I love TREASURE, cap'n. And you should, too.

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: Ye compliment is bilgewater to me.

string.name: c13_s1
string.value: Aye aye!

string.name: c13_s2
string.value: Ahh, sweet relief.

string.name: c13_s3
string.value: Now THAT is a real pirate's poop.

string.name: c13_s4
string.value: Yar har ho hee hoo!

string.name: c13_f2
string.value: What filth be this?!

string.name: c13_f3
string.value: Even pirates have standards, ye scallywag!

string.name: c13_f4
string.value: This not be the poop deck, cap'n.

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: Yarr, I be a few pounds lighter now!

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: Looks like no scurvy today!

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: Yarr, I be givin' it all I've got!

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: I'm not swabbin' up after this, cap'n.

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: Ah, cap'n first.

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: I'll not mess me pantaloons!

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: Ye be one strange pirate, cap'n...

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: This be hurtin' me confidence in ye.

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: I be droppin' another load!

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: It be an unhealthy obsession, but I be needin' ta go...

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: I'll not cross swords 'till I've had a good poop!

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: I've made me own buried treasure!

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: Ye dissapoint me, cap'n.

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: Stow that, cap'n!

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: Ye be havin' the sea crazies, cap'n?

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: Leave me be!

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: G'night, cap'n.

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: I be dreamin' of plunder tonight.

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: I be sleepin' well with a bomb under me pillow.

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: Ye takin' first watch, cap'n? Goodnight, then.

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: Nay, cap'n, there's work to be done!

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: The sun be shinin'! I can't sleep now!

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: There's plenty more fight in me, cap'n!

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: You sleep. I be takin' first watch.

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: Aye, just need a good bomb to sleep on.

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: Ye shouldn't disturb a sleepin' pirate...

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: Can't... keep... me eyes... open...

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: You keep watch, cap'n...I'll get some shut-eye.

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: I've plenty of fire in me! I don't need sleep!

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: I'm not following that order! I'll mutiny!

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: Must've heard ye wrong, cap'n.

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: Nay, cap'n, there's piratin' to be done!

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: Aye, I could use a little sleep after that.

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: Gonna catch a few winks before our next voyage.

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: Time for bed. Hope the bomb don't blow.

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: Aye, I'll be dreamin' of booty!

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: Ye don't have ta give orders all the time, cap'n!

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: Why sleep when there's pillaging to be done?

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: Don't make me turn on ye!

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: Ye should repect me! I be a scary pirate!

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: I'm gonna be king of the pirates!

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: One day, I'll own me own ship...the Black Pebble.

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: Want to see me treasure map? Ha! Too bad!

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: I once lived with a navy admiral, ye know.

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: Eh? What did ye say?

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: No time to talk, cap'n!

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: Let's hear ye story first, cap'n.

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: I don't trust ye enough to share me secrets...

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: I broke free from a navy admiral's cage.

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: The sea be the only place for me.

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: I be in love with blueberries, ye know.

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: Have ye planned dinner? I be wantin' fruits!

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: Pester another crewman, cap'n!

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: If ye be bored, round us up some treasure!

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: Speak up, cap'n!

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: Not very dignified, cap'n.

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: I'll be a great captain meself one day.

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: This hat be the finest silk, ye know.

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: We spend too much time on land, cap'n!

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: I always wanted to be a pirate.

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: Ye be to needy, cap'n.

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: Less talk, more blueberries!

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: Nay, it be me alone time.

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: I'll abandon ship if ye keep this up!

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: Yarr, I be TRANSFORMIN'!

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: See these? These be skin-color tights!

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: For me next trick, I'll break out of me cage!

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: This be only for ye, cap'n!

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: That be foolishness.

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: What nonsense be this?

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: Stow that mess, cap'n.

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: I be too hungry for ye tricks.

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: I'd like to see ye do this!

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: This trick be unique!

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: No photos, please!

string.name: c23_f1
string.value: Ye be annoying. Stop it.

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: I be gettin' sick of ye pesterin'.

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: I be on vacation today.

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: Oh, no. Ye go first, cap'n.

string.name: f1_f
string.value: Ho ho!

string.name: f2_s
string.value: This grub be delicious!

string.name: f2_f
string.value: Aye, I be so full!

string.name: f3_s
string.value: Me cap'n be the best!

string.name: f3_f
string.value: Me belly be full ta burstin'!

string.name: f4_s
string.value: It be too delicious, I say!

string.name: f4_f
string.value: I'll get scurvy from that!

string.name: s2
string.value: Know ye manners, cap'n.

string.name: s3
string.value: Ye be abusin' the chain of command.

string.name: s4
string.value: Do ye need to go back ta cap'n school?

string.name: c1_f2
string.value: Kwa! Grauk u'nar!

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: Human, yes.

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: Mr'aku, I do.

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: No want!

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: Grauk! Human no Mr'kuma.

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: Maybe you are Mr'kuma.

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: I sit on ground for now.

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: You no want I steal gold? I steal good, Mr'kuma.

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: Rak, you demand much.

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: No! You sit, stupid human!

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Don't wanna! I wanna set your hair on fire!

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: Sit? Me not know word. Hehehe...

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: No! Food! Eat many food!

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: Okay, human. You tell me when we are going to eat monsters again.

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: I will sit for you, Mr'kuma. You are scary and powerful!

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: I do as you say, for now...

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: Later, you sit and I get to burn houses down!

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: No way! I am not your kr'grana!

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: I don't wanna! I am mighty and full of fangs!

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: Rak! Why you always want to sit?!

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: You take me to lake of fire first!

string.name: c5_s1
string.value: Mr'aku! Skuna unar!

string.name: c5_s2
string.value: Un! Un! Unina!

string.name: c5_f2
string.value: Gra, unar!

string.name: c6_s1
string.value: Fun! Is fun!

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: Me am kr'ishmor, Mr'aku!

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: Heheheh, me skuna!

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: You mad one? I like!

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: Try again, I bite you!

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: You not scary.

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: Mr'putama human...

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: More! More!

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: You are toughest Mr'kuma ever!

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: My old boss was scary too. He eat my brother! So fun!

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: You scare many monsters with your talk! Scare me a little too...

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: No talk to me like kr'gana. Me much strong!

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Rak unar! I eat your wallet tonight!

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: Gryaaawn. Whatever.

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: You try to be funny?

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: I like it when you are angry, Mr'kuma. I will be angry too!

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: Yes! Let's find some little kids to yell at!

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: Everytime you yell, I feel a little more at home...

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: Ha! More! Tell me how worthless I am!

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: You always say the same insults. Think up something new!

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: I know you can do better than that, Mr'kuma.

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: I know you have more rage in you than that...

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: I don't want to be flattered right now!

string.name: c9_f2
string.value: Rak'a unar...

string.name: c10_s2
string.value: W-why you say?

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: What I do wrong?

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: Kr'ishmor! Leave me alone!

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: I no understand.

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: You know better...

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: Why you talk like wimp, Mr'kuma?

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: Grauk-mouthed unar! You think I simple?!

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: I no fall for trick. Old Mr'kuma trick me like this long ago.

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: Blech! Human words so nasty.

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: I...love...you...too...HAHAHAHAH! I lie good!

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: Hand over wallet, Mr'kuma. You go crazy in your mind.

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: ...What you want from me?

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: I come back when you not trying to eat me.

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: You are the cruelest of all masters...and I like it.

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: Are you mad at me because I tortured your goldfish? He was asking for it!

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: That is the rudest thing you can say in demon culture!

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Now I see you are just trying to be mean to me. Thank you, Mr'kuma!

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: There is no such thing as love.

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: My heart is cold and black like a piece of coal!

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: I'm almost getting used to this constant abuse.

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: You're just trying to make me get mad again.

string.name: c13_s1
string.value: Ha! Pthbbbtt!

string.name: c13_s2
string.value: Poona drakla!

string.name: c13_s3
string.value: Drakla, Mr'aku?

string.name: c13_f1
string.value: Oh...gra drakla.

string.name: c13_f2
string.value: Rak! Drakla m'raktoom!

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: Why say word "poop" all time, Mr'aku?

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: Make fire from bottom area!

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: You like drakla so much? I give to you.

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: You have weird enjoyments, Mr'aku.

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: I empty belly already!

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: Drakla stuck. Bottom much itchy.

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: I not eat enough monster today!

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: You no treasure drakla. It MY drakla!

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: Master, you love pooping as much as I do!

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: I bet I can burn a hole in the ground with this one...

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: I love stinking up your fresh air, Mr'kuma.

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: Empty out everything, master. Even your soul!

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: I'm not done digesting yet!

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: I'll let go of this poop when I darn well feel like it.

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: My bottom still hurts from the last one.

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: I have got to stop eating so many spicy monsters.

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: Mmm...chak'to unar...zzz

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: Kwa! Heheheh!

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: Nyah nyah! Grauk drakla!

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: Good unar. We find many nightmare!

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: I like sleep. Let me eat many monster heads when wake.

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: You sleep too, Mr'kuma. I steal many wallet for you later.

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: No! You try take my eyeballs while I sleep!

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: I no want to! I want eat shopkeeper toes!

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: No rest for wicked!

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: Sleep yourself, Mr'putama. I go find demon friends.

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: I could go for a little power nap on some hot coals.

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: Don't destroy any villages without me, okay, Mr'kuma?

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: I'll wake up when home freezes over.

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: Pitchforks, fire, and screaming people. This is going to be a great dream.

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: You can go to sleep if you want. I promise not to chew on your nose.

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: I don't need to rest! I'm an infernal machine!

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: I ate an entire case of espresso beans while you weren't looking.

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: I know better than to trust you.

string.name: c19
string.value: talk|chat|say

string.name: c20
string.value: talk|chat|say

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: My name Metus.

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: I make many fears.

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: I am speed-demon boy!

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: I am Mr'kuma to ghost of fear like you are Mr'kuma to me.

string.name: c21
string.value: talk|chat|say

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: Have you ever felt true fear, unar-master?

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: I will let you avoid fear, if you prove that you are strong.

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: I will show you the face of fear! Mwahaha!

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: If you can scare me like my old boss, we can hang out.

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: I make poona energy for you, Mr'kuma!

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: See my power! We destroy much together!

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: True demon power!

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: My real form is scary, Mr'kuma!

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: I no perform like kr'grana.

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: You do trick. I want laugh when you fall.

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: That very personal...

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: I show you already! You have bad brain!

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: What if I did this at your next surprise party?

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: Let's go scare some little girls with this trick!

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: With this power, I could conquer all of you puny humans.

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: Bask in awe, master! I am a being of pure terror!

string.name: c23_f1
string.value: How about I torch all your underwear instead?

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: Are you sure? You can never unsee it.

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: Shouldn't we be undermining somebody's hope?

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: I'll eat your eyebrows if you tell me that again!

string.name: f3_s
string.value: Is good, Mr'kuma.

string.name: f3_f
string.value: I already fat!

string.name: f4_s
string.value: Keep it coming!

string.name: f4_f
string.value: What are you trying to do to me?!

string.value: I sit on ground for now.

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: Rak, you demand much.

string.value: No! You sit, stupid human!

string.name: c3_f2

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: Sit? Me not know word. Hehehe...

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: No! Food! Eat many food!

string.name: c4_s2

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: I do as you say, for now...

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: Later, you sit and I get to burn houses down!
