string.name: c1_s2
string.value: Eoung eoung!

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: Sure, why not?

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: I think I will, thank you.

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: I'm extra adorable when I sit. Look!

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: As you wish! Can I have some ramen now?

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: I don't wanna sit.

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: Are you calling me fat?!

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: Sigh, why are you so bossy?

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: I think better on my feet.

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: All right. I think I deserve a rest.

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: Ah, this is the life!

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: A bowl of ramen would make this moment perfect.

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: Sure. Why don't you sit with me?

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: Um. No, thank you.

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: What? Here? At least get me a chair.

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: I don't want to get my tail dirty.

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: But I'm not tired yet.

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: I'll sit here and think about ramen.

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: Sure. Sit with me?

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: My legs are short and cute, but they get tired sometime.

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: Don't mind if I do.

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: I want to travel, not sit!

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: Don't be so lazy.

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: Are you tired already?

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: I really don't feel like sitting right now.

string.name: c6_s1
string.value: You're right. Just 'cause I'm cute doesn't mean I can get away with everything.

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: I'm sorry. Forgive me?

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: But... But... But... Awww.

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: If I let you have my ramen, will you stop scolding me? Please?

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: Whatever. I know my rights.

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: Oh, cut it out.

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: You don't know what you're talking about.

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: Are you TRYING to make me mad?

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: But I wuv you!

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: If I behave, will you give me some ramen?

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: I'm hungry, that's all.

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: But, you're my only friend.

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: Just stop talking to me.

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Don't be a hypocrite.

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: Be respectful!

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: Wanna FIGHT?!

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: You're going to make me cry!

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: I'll behave, I promise!

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: You still love me, don't you?

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: But I love you!

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: C'mon. You can't scold someone THIS cute.

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: Leave me alone.

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: You don't own me!

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: I'll run away, and then you'll regret getting mad at me.

string.name: c10_s1
string.value: Of course you do.

string.name: c10_s2
string.value: What's not to love?

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: Aw, thank you.

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: Shucks, I'm blushing.

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: Who ARE you?

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: Eh, do I know you?

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: Don't stand so close to me.

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: How nice for you.

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: You're smarter than you look.

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: Keep the love flowin', baby.

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: For that, I'll let you scratch my tummy.

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: It's because I'm adorable, right?

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: I don't believe you.

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: Prove it.

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: Do I look easy to you?

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: I don't buy it.

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: Then shower me with ramen, please!

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: I always knew I was irresistible.

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: You're not so bad yourself.

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: You and everyone else.

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: Oh, just shove it.

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: YAWN. Don't care.

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: Not as much as I love myself.

string.name: c13_s1
string.value: When you gotta go, you gotta go.

string.name: c13_s2
string.value: One, two, three: UNNNGHF!

string.name: c13_s3
string.value: You got it!

string.name: c13_s4
string.value: If you say so.

string.name: c13_f1
string.value: I beg your pardon?

string.name: c13_f2
string.value: Um. No.

string.name: c13_f4
string.value: YOU poop.

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: Oh, this DOES feel nice.

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: Hope you brought along toilet paper!

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: Such a perfectly round little pelle!

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: I feel so refreshed.

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: Not right now. I have a headache.

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: You're such a drill sergeant.

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: Um, that'd be weird.

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: You into that sort of thing?

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: Does this make me a party POOPer? Get it?

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: It actually smells quite nice.

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: Next time, let's go together!

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: It's like soft-serve ice cream!

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: Hey! Are you saying I have a stick up my butt?

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: No, thanks. I'll hold it.

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: Are you feeling all right?

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: Maybe later.

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: Night, night.

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: Will you sing me a lullaby?

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: Don't even THINK of using me as a pillow.

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: Will you tuck me in?

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: You're not the boss of me.

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: Awww, is the human sleepy-weepy?

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: You can sleep if you want. I'm busy.

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: I hope I dream of ramen.

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: Will you cuddle with me?

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: I count pies and donuts to fall asleep.

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: Will you pet me until I doze off?

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: I only sleep on silk sheets.

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: Last time I slept, someone tied my tail to my ears. Pass!

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: Think you can make me?

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: I'm refusing just to be rebellious.

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: I suppose I could afford to take a break.

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: Hey, I just wanted to tell you that I think you're really... Zzz.

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: You should rest, too. You can cuddle with me.

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: Coffee ramen, pizza ramen, donut ramen... Zzz.

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: Do I LOOK sleepy to you?

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: You're so lazy, sometimes you disgust me.

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: I have recipes to create! No time for sleep!

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: Sleep is for the weak.

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: I'm not chubby, I'm big-boned. Just wanted to let you know.

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: Everybody who meets me, loves me. Didja know that?

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: Just 'cause I'm cute doesn't mean my life is easy.

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: Ramen is really good with sugar and honey. Try it!

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: Go away. I'm sick of your face.

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: Why do you always follow me around?

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: Shoo! Just, shoo!

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: Ugh, what do you want from me?

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: My dream is to become the world's best ramen chef!

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: I think about new ramen recipes all the time. Imagine: deep-fried ramen!

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: Here's a secret: my parents can transform into human shape.

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: Do you think red herb ramen would do well in this market?

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: Don't you have anyone else to pester?

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: You must be really lonely to be bothering me.

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: I'm going to pretend I don't see you.

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: Don't speak until you're spoken to!

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: I figure, if I stick with you, I'll get to travel and try all sorts of ramen!

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: I'm actually a really great dancer. I've got the perfect figure for it.

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: People who want to bring me down say I'm fat, but I know it isn't true.

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: Sometimes people tell me I have no parents. I don't get it. I DO have parents!

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: I need some "me" time, please.

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: I'm too hungry to chat.

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: You talk too much.

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: Do I LOOK like I'm in the mood?

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: We can dance if we want to!

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: Ah, I'm so adorable when I dance, I want to hug myself.

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: You love me even more than before I danced, don't you?

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: Dancing makes me hungry!

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: I'm not here for your amusement.

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: I'll think about it, IF you get me some ramen.

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: Believe it or not, I'm actually quite shy.

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: I'M NOT A MONKEY!

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: Bounce, wiggle, bounce, wiggle, bounce!

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: You ain't never seen nobody as cute as me!

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: Feel free to join me!

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: Buy me a mirror so I can admire myself when I dance!

string.name: c23_f1
string.value: What, and then you'll give me a treat? How demeaning.

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: Not right now, please.

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: I'm on strike until you take me to a new ramen restaurant.

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: You first, buddy.

string.name: f2_s
string.value: I looooove ramen!

string.name: f2_f
string.value: Sooooo stuffed. Mmmm.

string.name: f3_s
string.value: This is why I love you.

string.name: f3_f
string.value: I could eat ten servings in one sitting!

string.name: f4_s
string.value: What are you feeding me?!

string.name: f4_f
string.value: Mouth...likes. Stomach, not so much. Too full!

string.name: s2
string.value: That isn't funny!

string.name: s3
string.value: Just my luck. You're TERRIBLE.

string.name: s4
string.value: I can hear you, you know.

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: Sure, my wings are tired.

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: Landed too hard. Bruised my butt.

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: I could use a rest.

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: Whew, what a day!

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: No thanks. Sometimes when I try to sit, I trip.

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: Nah, I'm good.

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: I prefer to fly, thanks.

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: But why?

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: Well, I guess I could use a rest.

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: Would you look at that view! Beautiful world we live in, general.

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: Sit with me? We can discuss our adventuring strategies, general.

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: Whew, I guess I am a little tired.

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: But we still have a lot further to go!

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: To be honest, it's not that easy for me to sit down.

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: Nah, don't feel like it.

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: Hmm? Did you say something?

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: I'll just snuggle here next to you, general.

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: Oh, good. I needed to groom my wings anyway.

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: Hey, how about a snack?

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: Whatever you say, boss.

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: No rest for the wicked!

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: My wings need exercise. They're getting pudgy!

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: Not yet, general!

string.name: c5_f1
string.value: Hey! Be nice!

string.name: c5_f2
string.value: Who, ME?! Couldn't be!

string.name: c6_s1
string.value: Please don't hit me! Are you going to hit me?

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: You're scary when you're mad.

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: I think I'm gonna cry!

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: No! I'll be good! I promise!

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: You don't mean that.

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: This is animal abuse!

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: When I hum to myself, I can't hear you.

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: You're not yourself, general.

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: I'm going to crawl under a rock.

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: So scary...

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: I think I'm going to cry!

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: I'm sorry! I'm sorry! Don't hurt me!

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: You just might make me angry for the first time in my life.

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Aw, don't be like that.

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: Think before you speak, general!

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: Don't point fingers, general.

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: Be nice to me! Please! I'm sorry!

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: I'm sorry. Really, really sorry.

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: Sniff, sniff, sniffle.

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: You... You still love me, don't you?

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: Don't be rude, general!

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: Stop it! Shush!

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: Don't be so melodramatic, general.

string.name: c10_s2
string.value: Neigh! Neighhh!

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: You're my general, baby!

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: Y-you're scaring me!

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: Don't hurt me!

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: But I love CARROTS, not you.

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: I can't hear you.

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: I'd follow you anywhere, general!

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: Yay! Yaaeeighhh!

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: I'm so happy I could fly, except I'm scared of heights.

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: Shucks, you're making me blush.

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: I'm not listening.

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: But I'm a self-reliant adventurer!

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: Do you have to say that in such a creepy voice?

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: Just keep galloping. Just keep galloping.

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: I love you, too, general!

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: Oh, happy day!

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: You're the strongest, bestest person I know.

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: I think you're just swell.

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: Can you stop, please?

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: It's not me, it's you.

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: Just feed me and don't talk, please.

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: I'd like to be alone right now.

string.name: c13_s1
string.value: Hey! Be nice!

string.name: c13_s2
string.value: Got any toilet paper? I'm all out.

string.name: c13_s3
string.value: Look over there! Ahhh.

string.name: c13_s4
string.value: Oh! I feel much better now! Neigh!

string.name: c13_f3
string.value: No way!

string.name: c13_f4
string.value: What? In front of you?

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: Oooof. Been saving that one.

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: I'll try not to lose my balance and fall in this time.

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: Hey, it's orange! Just like my favorite food, carrots!

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: Now I'm hungry again.

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: An adventurer never poops in public!

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: General! Please!

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: That wouldn't be polite.

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: Y-you're scaring me!

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: Whoops, is that a brown speck on my wing?

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: Does the texture look a little off to you?

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: Quick! Make sure no one's peeking!

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: Oh, baby. OH, BABY!

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: I don't need to go right now.

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: What if someone sees?!

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: You're MEAN!

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: Do I have to?

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: This is how I snore: zzzeigh, zzzeigh.

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: I AM awfully drowsy.

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: Don't mind if I do.

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: I could use a quick little nappy nap.

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: A true adventurer never rests! Right?

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: When I close my eyes, it gets dark, and I'm scared of the dark.

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: But what if monsters get me?!

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: I think you just want an excuse to nap.

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: I hope I dream of carrots!

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: Don't let anyone hurt me, mmkay?

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: I never tire!

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: Sleep? ALREADY?

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: But what if I get nightmares?

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: You sleep, general. I'll stand guard.

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: Can you buy me a stuffed carrot to hug?

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: Keep me secret, keep me safe, general.

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: Wake me up if anything interesting happens.

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: I can't keep my eyes open. Zzzzzeigh.

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: But I just downed an energy drink!

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: Are you saying I'm weak?!

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: But I'm not sleeeepy!

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: No! I want to have an adventure!

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: I was born for adventure!

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: Carrots are amazing! They're nutritious, orange, pointy...

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: I lick my wings to keep them clean, just like a kitten.

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: If you have a heart of courage, the world is your carrot!

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: I'm daydreaming. Shhh!

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: Hmm? What? Huh?

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: I want to be alone right now, please.

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: Can you go away, please?

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: Sometimes people call me a unicorn, so I tried tying a carrot on my head.

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: My second favorite thing in the world? Carrots. My first favorite thing? YOU!

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: I want to be just like you when I grow up!

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: Where should we adventure to next, general? I can't wait!

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: I'm too tired to chat.

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: Action over words, general!

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: We're too busy to talk right now!

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: Later! Later!

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: I trip over my own feet sometimes, but I won't let that stop me!

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: Sometimes, my wings get tangled up in each other and I fall on my face.

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: Do you think I'm brave, general? I really hope you do.

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: What's your favorite? Deep-fried carrot, carrot steak, or carrot stew?

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: I'm tired of talking.

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: We should save our energy for our adventures!

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: I'm not good at small talk.

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: But I want to hear about YOUR adventurers, general!

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: Okay! Watch...THIS!

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: Heh, not everyone can pull THIS off.

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: Hold on to your hats, ladies and gents!

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: Hehe, can YOU do this?

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: I'm an adventurer, not a circus performer!

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: But I'm shy!

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: No, thank you.

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: I'm tired!

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: Think I deserve a carrot for this, general?

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: Amazing, isn't it?

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: Let's see a unicorn try to pull this off.

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: This comes in real handy for an explorer like me.

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: I have my dignity!

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: Not in the mood. Sorry.

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: Don't tell me what to do, please.

string.name: f1_f
string.value: Hey! Be nice!

string.name: f2_s
string.value: Ah, that hit the spot!

string.name: f2_f
string.value: Neigh, I'm full...

string.name: f3_s
string.value: Ah, scrumptious! Thanks!

string.name: f3_f
string.value: Hey, I'm a colt, not a pig!

string.name: f4_s
string.value: Perfect timing, general. I'm starving!

string.name: f4_f
string.value: Ugh, I overate!

string.name: s2
string.value: General! An adventurer ought to know better!

string.name: s3
string.value: I'm disappointed in you, general.

string.name: s4
string.value: Do you see the disappointment in my eyes, general?

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: Fine. Happy, now?

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: I suppose this is tolerable.

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: Whatever, fine.

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: But why?

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: Stop annoying me.

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: I don't feel like it.

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: You gonna make me?

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: Funny, I was just planning to sit anyway.

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: I actually look better when I'm sitting.

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: I suppose this is acceptable.

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: I shall sit, but NOT because you told me to.

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: I'd rather not.

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: And why should I listen to you?

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: I can't hear you . Speak up.

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: This is just a coincidence.

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: I never tire, I'm just sitting for fun.

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: I will permit you to sit next to me.

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: Oh, very well.

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: I'm not in the mood.

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: I can neither hear nor see you right now.

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: I'd rather not.

string.name: c5_f2
string.value: Like I care.

string.name: c6_s1
string.value: Hmph. Fine. I get the point.

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: You'll never hear me say this again, but I'm sorry.

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: I suppose you detest me now.

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: I will contemplate apologizing.

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: Do my ears deceive me?

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: I KNOW you're not talking to ME.

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: I'll do you a favor and pretend I didn't hear that.

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: You have three seconds to take that back.

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: Fine. Sorry. Whatever.

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: Okay, okay. Relax. Sheesh.

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: Fine! Just don't expect an apology.

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: I don't even know what I did.

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: You MUST be joking.

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Are you still talking?

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: Excuse me?

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: But I'm always up to no good!

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: Sheesh, don't be so uptight.

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: Geez. So harsh.

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: I don't even know why I'm saying this, but sorry.

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: Why are you acting like this?

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: I don't like jokes.

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: How DARE you speak to me like this!

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: But why?

string.name: c10_s1
string.value: Yeah, I know.

string.name: c10_s2
string.value: I'm impossible to resist.

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: I suppose you're tolerable.

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: How DARE you.

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: Don't do that. Just don't.

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: You and me both, buddy.

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: Another adoring fan.

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: I suppose I ought to say thanks, but instead I'll say: SCRAM.

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: You have to do better than that.

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: Do I look that gullible?

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: Really, now.

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: Don't speak. Just don't.

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: Message received. Move on.

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: So many fans, so little time to crush all their hearts.

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: Yes, I'm one of a kind.

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Stick around. I might have some use for you.

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: That's nice.

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: You're kidding yourself if you think you have a chance with me.

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: Have you looked in a mirror lately?

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: Don't make me laugh!

string.name: c13_s1
string.value: I suppose I could.

string.name: c13_s2
string.value: Very well.

string.name: c13_s3
string.value: How refreshing.

string.name: c13_s4
string.value: Oh, fine.

string.name: c13_f2
string.value: Beg pardon?

string.name: c13_f3
string.value: Are you mental?

string.name: c13_f4
string.value: You must be kidding.

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: Now clean it up. Use your hands.

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: Ah, much better.

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: Consider that a favor. Now you owe me.

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: Enjoy the show?

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: But why?

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: You first, buddy.

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: Oh, come on.

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: Forget it.

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: How refreshing.

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: Clean it up! Chop, chop!

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: Poop happens.

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: Great. Now I'm hungry.

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: Some things you just don't do in public.

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: You're not even going to bribe me?

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: Read my lips: NO.

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: You disgust me.

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: Watch my back.

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: Good night, then.

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: Not sleepy.

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: I don't know if you can tell, but I'm rolling my eyes.

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: You sleep. I'll keep going.

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: Stand watch. Or else.

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: Don't bother me while I sleep.

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: Okay, but only because I want to.

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: I don't feel like it.

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: You think you can just tell me what to do?

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: Maybe if you weren't so NOISY.

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: What's in it for me?

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: I better get something out of this.

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: Don't you dare wake me.

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: Good night and good riddance.

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: Do you have any idea what time it is?

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: But I'll have nightmares about your face.

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: Your stench is too strong. Can't fall asleep.

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: You really think you can make me?

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: I can spend hours thinking of ways to make people cry.

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: There's nothing more satisfying than an evil deed done well.

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: The weather annoys me. Change it.

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: You want me to talk? There, I talked.

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: Not in the mood.

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: Don't talk to me.

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: "Talk." Happy? Now shut your trap.

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: I enjoy traveling. Why else do you think I let you hang around?

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: I enjoy food. So feed me.

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: Sometimes, I wonder where I came from.

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: Talk to someone who cares.

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: Just who do you think you're bossing around?

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: If I wanted to talk, I'd talk.

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: I want to lock all the people I despise into a dark, windowless room.

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: Big Headward has an awfully large head for such a small brain.

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: Some creatires are so ugly, I don't know how they can stand to look in the mirror

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: That Wonky the Fairy'll eat anything. I've tested it.

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: I'm the silent but deadly type.

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: Can't you entertain yourself?

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: I desire solitude. Shoo.

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: But why?

string.name: f2_s
string.value: Well, well. Not bad at all.

string.name: f2_f
string.value: That has a weird aftertaste.

string.name: f3_s
string.value: Hey, that's pretty tasty.

string.name: f3_f
string.value: Enough already.

string.name: f4_f
string.value: Are you blind? Can't you see that I'm full?

string.name: s2
string.value: Watch your tongue!

string.name: s3
string.value: Try to keep it classy, will you?

string.name: s4
string.value: Mind your manners. You embarrass me.

string.name: c1_s2
string.value: Ookyu ookyu!

string.name: c1_f2
string.value: (Pretends not to hear.)

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: Ookyu, gotta rest now.

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: Pyoo, this feels comfortable.

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: Should we rest a bit?

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: Pyoo, let's a rest a little!

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: I'm still up and kicking, ookyu!

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: I want to play more...

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: Let's walk around more!

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: Pyoo! I'm going to play more!

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: Ookyu... I'm tired now...

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: Let's rest a bit!

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: Ookyu, let's rest a little!

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: Pyoo! My fins are sore...

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: Ookyu? Let's walk around more!

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Pyoo? Don't we still have a long way to go?

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: Ookyu? I don't want to rest right now...

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: Pyoo? (Pretends to not hear.)

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: Ookyu! So comfy! Comfy comfy!

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: Pyoo! Am I sitting down, or laying down?

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: Ookyu, it's the perfect time to rest!

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: Pyoo! Just for a minute, okay?

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: Ookyu? I don't like being ordered around!

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: We can't rest like this everyday!

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: Ookyu, just a couple more steps!

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: Pyoo? Are you hurt? Why do you keep wanting to rest?

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: Ookyu... I'm scared...

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: Byoo! (Bawling)

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: I'm sorry...

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: I hate you!

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: Don't talk to me like that!

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: Pyoo! Are you really going to keep doing this?!

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: I said, don't order me around!

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: Ookyu... I miss the north pole...

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: Pyoo... I miss mommy...

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: Pyoo... I'm sorry...

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: You want to fight?!

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Pyoo! I hate you!!

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: Stop it!!

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: Pyoo! I'm going to leave you then!

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: Wahh!! I'm scared...

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: Sorry... I won't do it again...

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: I'll listen from now on...

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: Pyoo... I'm sorry...

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: Hmph! I told you to treat me nicely!!

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: Pyoo!! I'm going back to the north pole!

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: I'm going to tell on you!

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: Pyoo! I can be scary too!

string.name: c9_s2
string.value: Pyoo pyoo!

string.name: c10_s1
string.value: Me likey!

string.name: c10_s2
string.value: You sure are nice!

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: Pyoo pyoo! I like it!

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: I like you very much also!

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: Ookyu? Wha?

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: Ooh, that surprised me.

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: What's going on, ookyu?

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: Are you messing with me?

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: Me too!

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: Pyoo! I like you better than the north pole.

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: I like it!

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: Pyoo! I'm so lucky to have a master like you!

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: Ookyu! You surprised me!

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: (It's ignoring you...)

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: Are you serious?!

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: Pyoo! I love hanging out with you.

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: Oh, happy day!

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: Thank you!

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Pyoo! I'll be with you forever!

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: Ookyu, did you eat some bad fish?

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: I'm a Harp Seal, and you are a human!

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: Ookyu? Are you still single?

string.name: c13_s4
string.value: I'm a healthy pet!

string.name: c13_f1
string.value: Whoa! I barely know you!!

string.name: c13_f2
string.value: Ookyu? Are you serious?

string.name: c13_f3
string.value: Ookyu! You should be ashamed of yourself!

string.name: c13_f4
string.value: This isn't right!!

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: Oo... kyu!! Whew...

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: Pyoo!! That felt nice...

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: Ookyu! Now's the time!!

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: Pyoo! That was refreshing!

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: Tell me that AFTER you feed me!!

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: You can't order me to do everything!

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: That's illegal here!!

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: No way!!

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: Ookyu! Every day is a healthy day!!

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: Pyoo, pyoo!!

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: Master, cover me well, okay?

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: Ookyu! So refreshing!

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: Pyoo! Don't make me angry!

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: What if someone sees?!

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: Are you teasing me?

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: This is shameful! You'll be hearing from my Harp Lawyers!

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: Ookyu... so sleepy...

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: *Snore* pyoo...

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: Ookyu... mommy...

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: You sleep well too, master...

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: I'm want to play more!

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: The sun is still shining bright!

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: Still a long way to go!

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: I don't think it's time to sleep yet.

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: Ookyu... (Out cold.)

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: Good night, master!

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: Gotta rest up for tomorrow!

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: Ookyu... so tired...

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: You are a sleepyhead, aren't you, master?

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: I don't want to sleep yet.

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: I'll sleep when I get sleepy, okie?

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: Not sleepy!

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: Ookyu... I miss my mommy...

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: Ookyu... pyo... Zzzzzz...

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: Good seals are early to bed, early to rise.

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: See you tomorrow, master!

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: I'm still wide awake, see?

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: I guess master isn't too healthy...

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: Why do you always tell me to sleep?

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: Is this going to make us closer?

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: Well you know, in the north pole... (It just rambles on)

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: I saw this weird animal in the forest... (It won't stop talking)

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: Do you know the difference between true seals and fake seals?

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: I love it here because there aren't any polar bears.

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: Ookyu... (It's ignoring you.)

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: Pyoo? Did you call me?

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: I'm tired right now.

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: Ookyu... so annoying...

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: I wish I had some snow to lie on.

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: I'm all white so I can hide from polar bears in the snow!

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: Will you protect me from polar bears, master?

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: I'm sure glad for nice people like you, master.

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: Ookyu... just leave me alone...

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: I want to rest, pyoo!

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: I want to be alone...

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: Pyoo? (Pretends to not hear.)

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: Pigs sure are weird! Why do their bottoms curl up like that?

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: Ookyu ookyu! Isn't it hard walking on two legs, master?

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: Where are we going today? Anywhere's fine with me!

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: What should we eat for dinner? I want some yummy milk!

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: Ookyu? Are you bored?

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: Pyoo? What did you say?

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: Tell me tomorrow, okay?

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: I don't feel like opening my mouth... too much work...

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: Byoo! Yeah master, go master!

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: I love you, you love me!

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: Pyoo pyoo pyoo! (It seems to be singing.)

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: Ookyu ookyu, pyoo! Ookyu ookyu, pyoo!

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: I don't know any tricks...

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: But I'm shy!

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: Ookyu... how annoying...

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: You show me something first, master!

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: Itsy bitsy seals and penguins, dancing at north pole!

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: Twinkle twinkle mommy star!

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: Three seals in a house, daddy seal, mommy seal, and baby seal!

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: Pyoo! Rings around the snowsies!

string.name: c23_f1
string.value: Pyoo! No way...

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: You want your pet to show its talents?

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: Give me some food first...

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: You mean... right now?

string.name: f2_s
string.value: Looks delicious!

string.name: f2_f
string.value: Ookyu, I'm full...

string.name: f3_s
string.value: Pyoo! You sure take good care of me, master!

string.name: f3_f
string.value: I'm full, I said...

string.name: f4_s
string.value: Thank you for the food!

string.name: f4_f
string.value: Don't you think I've gotten a little fat?

string.name: s1
string.value: Pyoo pyoo!!

string.name: s2
string.value: What goes around, comes around you know?

string.name: s3
string.value: I don't want to be a pottymouth!

string.name: s4
string.value: Words reflect your insides, you know?!!

string.name: c1_f2
string.value: Kwa! Grauk u'nar!

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: Human, yes.

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: Mr'aku, I do.

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: No want!

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: Grauk! Human no Mr'kuma.

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: Maybe you are Mr'kuma.

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: I sit on ground for now.

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: You no want I steal gold? I steal good, Mr'kuma.

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: Rak, you demand much.

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: No! You sit, stupid human!

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Don't wanna! I wanna set your hair on fire!

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: Sit? Me not know word. Hehehe...

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: No! Food! Eat many food!

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: Okay, human. You tell me when we are going to eat monsters again.

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: I will sit for you, Mr'kuma. You are scary and powerful!

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: I do as you say, for now...

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: Later, you sit and I get to burn houses down!

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: No way! I am not your kr'grana!

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: I don't wanna! I am mighty and full of fangs!

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: Rak! Why you always want to sit?!

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: You take me to lake of fire first!

string.name: c5_s1
string.value: Mr'aku! Skuna unar!

string.name: c5_s2
string.value: Un! Un! Unina!

string.name: c5_f2
string.value: Gra, unar!

string.name: c6_s1
string.value: Fun! Is fun!

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: Me am kr'ishmor, Mr'aku!

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: Heheheh, me skuna!

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: You mad one? I like!

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: Try again, I bite you!

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: You not scary.

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: Mr'putama human...

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: More! More!

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: You are toughest Mr'kuma ever!

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: My old boss was scary too. He eat my brother! So fun!

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: You scare many monsters with your talk! Scare me a little too...

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: No talk to me like kr'gana. Me much strong!

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Rak unar! I eat your wallet tonight!

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: Gryaaawn. Whatever.

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: You try to be funny?

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: I like it when you are angry, Mr'kuma. I will be angry too!

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: Yes! Let's find some little kids to yell at!

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: Everytime you yell, I feel a little more at home...

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: Ha! More! Tell me how worthless I am!

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: You always say the same insults. Think up something new!

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: I know you can do better than that, Mr'kuma.

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: I know you have more rage in you than that...

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: I don't want to be flattered right now!

string.name: c9_f2
string.value: Rak'a unar...

string.name: c10_s2
string.value: W-why you say?

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: What I do wrong?

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: Kr'ishmor! Leave me alone!

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: I no understand.

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: You know better...

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: Why you talk like wimp, Mr'kuma?

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: Grauk-mouthed unar! You think I simple?!

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: I no fall for trick. Old Mr'kuma trick me like this long ago.

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: Blech! Human words so nasty.

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: I...love...you...too...HAHAHAHAH! I lie good!

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: Hand over wallet, Mr'kuma. You go crazy in your mind.

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: ...What you want from me?

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: I come back when you not trying to eat me.

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: You are the cruelest of all masters...and I like it.

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: Are you mad at me because I tortured your goldfish? He was asking for it!

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: That is the rudest thing you can say in demon culture!

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Now I see you are just trying to be mean to me. Thank you, Mr'kuma!

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: There is no such thing as love.

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: My heart is cold and black like a piece of coal!

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: I'm almost getting used to this constant abuse.

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: You're just trying to make me get mad again.

string.name: c13_s1
string.value: Ha! Pthbbbtt!

string.name: c13_s2
string.value: Poona drakla!

string.name: c13_s3
string.value: Drakla, Mr'aku?

string.name: c13_f1
string.value: Oh...gra drakla.

string.name: c13_f2
string.value: Rak! Drakla m'raktoom!

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: Why say word "poop" all time, Mr'aku?

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: Make fire from bottom area!

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: You like drakla so much? I give to you.

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: You have weird enjoyments, Mr'aku.

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: I empty belly already!

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: Drakla stuck. Bottom much itchy.

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: I not eat enough monster today!

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: You no treasure drakla. It MY drakla!

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: Master, you love pooping as much as I do!

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: I bet I can burn a hole in the ground with this one...

string.name: c15_s3

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: I could go for a little power nap on some hot coals.

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: Don't destroy any villages without me, okay, Mr'kuma?

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: I'll wake up when home freezes over.

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: Pitchforks, fire, and screaming people. This is going to be a great dream.

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: You can go to sleep if you want. I promise not to chew on your nose.

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: I don't need to rest! I'm an infernal machine!

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: I ate an entire case of espresso beans while you weren't looking.

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: I know better than to trust you.

string.value: My name Metus.

string.value: I make many fears.

string.value: Rak, you demand much.

string.value: No! You sit, stupid human!

string.name: c3_f2

string.value: Sit? Me not know word. Hehehe...

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: No! Food! Eat many food!

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: Okay, human. You tell me when we are going to eat monsters again.

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: I will sit for you, Mr'kuma. You are scary and powerful!

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: I do as you say, for now...

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: Later, you sit and I get to burn houses down!

string.name: c4_f1

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: I don't wanna! I am mighty and full of fangs!

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: You take me to lake of fire first!

string.value: You mad one? I like!

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: More! More!

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: You are toughest Mr'kuma ever!

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: My old boss was scary too. He eat my brother! So fun!

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: You scare many monsters with your talk! Scare me a little too...

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: No talk to me like kr'gana. Me much strong!

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Rak unar! I eat your wallet tonight!

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: Gryaaawn. Whatever.

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: You try to be funny?

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: I like it when you are angry, Mr'kuma. I will be angry too!

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: Yes! Let's find some little kids to yell at!

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: Everytime you yell, I feel a little more at home...

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: Ha! More! Tell me how worthless I am!

string.value: You always say the same insults. Think up something new!

string.value: I know you have more rage in you than that...

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: I don't want to be flattered right now!

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: I no want to! I want eat shopkeeper toes!

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: No rest for wicked!

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: Sleep yourself, Mr'putama. I go find demon friends.

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: I could go for a little power nap on some hot coals.

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: Don't destroy any villages without me, okay, Mr'kuma?

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: I'll wake up when home freezes over.

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: Pitchforks, fire, and screaming people. This is going to be a great dream.

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: You can go to sleep if you want. I promise not to chew on your nose.

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: I don't need to rest! I'm an infernal machine!

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: I ate an entire case of espresso beans while you weren't looking.

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: I know better than to trust you.

string.value: talk|chat|say

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: My name Invidia.

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: I start big jealousy.

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: I am beautiful voluptuous woman-demon!

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: I am Mr'kuma to ghost of jealousy like you are Mr'kuma to me.

string.name: c21
string.value: talk|chat|say

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: Have you felt jealousy of another, unar-master?

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: I will let you avoid jealousy, if you prove that you are strong.

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: You will see the firey hand of jealousy!

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: If you can make me jealous, we can have a real relationship.

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: I make poona energy for you, Mr'kuma!

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: See my power! We destroy much together!

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: True demon power!

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: My real form is scary, Mr'kuma!

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: I no perform like kr'grana.

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: You do trick. I want laugh when you fall.

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: That very personal...

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: I show you already! You have bad brain!

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: What if I did this at your next surprise party?

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: Let's go scare some little girls with this trick!

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: With this power, I could conquer all of you puny humans.

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: Bask in awe, master! I am a being of pure terror!

string.name: c23_f1
string.value: How about I torch all your underwear instead?

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: Are you sure? You can never unsee it.

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: Shouldn't we be undermining somebody's hope?

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: I'll eat your eyebrows if you tell me that again!

string.value: Is good, Mr'kuma.

string.name: f3_f
string.value: I already fat!

string.name: f4_s
string.value: Keep it coming!

string.value: What are you trying to do to me?!

string.value: You...like demon joke?

string.value: Old boss call me that. He so cool.

string.name: s4
string.value: Hey! Even we demons have some etiquette.

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: Baa... *smacks lips*

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: See you tomorrow, baa baa...

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: I can't hear you!

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: (It's ignoring you...)

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: No! I want to play more!

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: I want to play more, baa baa!

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: (It's out cold.)

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: Baa... I'm tired...

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: *Snores* Baa...

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: Baa baa... I'm tired...

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: What's that noise?

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: The sun's still up!

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: Don't joke around, okay?

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: Not sleepy!

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: Baa... someday I'll soar higher than a dragon. Baa...

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: (It passed right out.)

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: Good night... baa baa...

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: Baa baa...

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: Can't you see that my eyes are still WIDE open?

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: Baa baa? What are you saying?

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: I just woke up...

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: I'm not that lazy, baa baa.

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: Baa Baa! So today, I'm going to... (Now it won't stop talking.)

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: Are you amazed by flying lambs? So the secret of our race is...

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: Maple World is a pretty nice place to live, baa baa.

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: When we were living up in the sky, angels mistook us for clouds.

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: Is it strange that I talk?

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: Baa baa, how annoying!

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: I'm tired right now.

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: Baa? Weren't we talking just a second ago?

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: Have you every had a Cloud Candy? It's the baaaaa-st.

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: I want some Cloud Candy!

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: If there's one thing I hate, it's wolves.

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: We are called Pufframs because we live above the clouds.

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: Baa baa... just leave me alone...

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: I don't want to talk right now, baa.

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: Mmm... are you hungry for a conversation?

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: (It pretends not to hear you.)

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: Baa baa, would it be better to walk or fly?

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: Baa baa, you want to hear something interesting?

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: Which one of us do you think can fly faster? Me or the eagle?

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: To the Pufframs, the Golden Horn is a symbol of adulthood.

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: You look bored... too bad I'm not!

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: I'm too hungry to talk!

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: (It appears to be thinking about something.)

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: What if I say no, baa baa?

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: Baa baa!

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: This is the Puffram booty dance!!

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: Sounds annoying, Baa Baa.

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: Am I in the circus or something, baa baa?

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: Baa baa... I said, it sounds annoying...

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: I actually have this super cool trick... but I don't feel like it right now.

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: (Jumps up and down.) Baa! Baa! Baa! Baa!

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: Meehee! You likey, baa baa?

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: Puffram-only special... booty dance!!

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: It's super fun when you do it above the clouds, baa baa.

string.name: c23_f1
string.value: Baa... maybe next time...

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: Can't I just be your pet?

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: Too hungry... no strength... baa baa.

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: How embarrassing, baa baa.

string.name: f1_f
string.value: Baa baa...

string.name: f2_s
string.value: Looks delicious!

string.name: f2_f
string.value: I ate a lot today...

string.name: f3_s
string.value: Baa baa, eating time's my favorite time!!

string.name: f3_f
string.value: I'm full...

string.name: f4_s
string.value: Thank you for the food!

string.name: f4_f
string.value: I'm full now, baa baa.

string.name: s2
string.value: You want to get reported, baa baa?

string.name: s3
string.value: Be nice, baa baa!

string.name: s4
string.value: I'm so disappointed in you, baa baa!!

string.name: c1_s2
string.value: Eoung eoung!

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: Sure, why not?

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: I think I will, thank you.

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: I'm extra adorable when I sit. Look!

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: As you wish! Can I have some ramen now?

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: I don't wanna sit.

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: Are you calling me fat?!

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: Sigh, why are you so bossy?

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: I think better on my feet.

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: All right. I think I deserve a rest.

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: Ah, this is the life!

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: A bowl of ramen would make this moment perfect.

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: Sure. Why don't you sit with me?

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: Um. No, thank you.

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: What? Here? At least get me a chair.

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: I don't want to get my tail dirty.

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: But I'm not tired yet.

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: I'll sit here and think about ramen.

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: Sure. Sit with me?

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: My legs are short and cute, but they get tired sometime.

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: Don't mind if I do.

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: I want to travel, not sit!

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: Don't be so lazy.

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: Are you tired already?

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: I really don't feel like sitting right now.

string.name: c6_s1
string.value: You're right. Just 'cause I'm cute doesn't mean I can get away with everything.

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: I'm sorry. Forgive me?

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: But... But... But... Awww.

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: If I let you have my ramen, will you stop scolding me? Please?

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: Whatever. I know my rights.

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: Oh, cut it out.

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: You don't know what you're talking about.

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: Are you TRYING to make me mad?

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: But I wuv you!

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: If I behave, will you give me some ramen?

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: I'm hungry, that's all.

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: But, you're my only friend.

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: Just stop talking to me.

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Don't be a hypocrite.

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: Be respectful!

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: Wanna FIGHT?!

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: You're going to make me cry!

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: I'll behave, I promise!

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: You still love me, don't you?

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: But I love you!

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: C'mon. You can't scold someone THIS cute.

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: Leave me alone.

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: You don't own me!

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: I'll run away, and then you'll regret getting mad at me.

string.name: c10_s1
string.value: Of course you do.

string.name: c10_s2
string.value: What's not to love?

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: Aw, thank you.

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: Shucks, I'm blushing.

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: Who ARE you?

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: Eh, do I know you?

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: Don't stand so close to me.

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: How nice for you.

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: You're smarter than you look.

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: Keep the love flowin', baby.

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: For that, I'll let you scratch my tummy.

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: It's because I'm adorable, right?

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: I don't believe you.

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: Prove it.

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: Do I look easy to you?

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: I don't buy it.

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: Then shower me with ramen, please!

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: I always knew I was irresistible.

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: You're not so bad yourself.

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: You and everyone else.

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: Oh, just shove it.

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: YAWN. Don't care.

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: Not as much as I love myself.

string.name: c13_s1
string.value: When you gotta go, you gotta go.

string.name: c13_s2
string.value: One, two, three: UNNNGHF!

string.name: c13_s3
string.value: You got it!

string.name: c13_s4
string.value: If you say so.

string.name: c13_f1
string.value: I beg your pardon?

string.name: c13_f2
string.value: Um. No.

string.name: c13_f4
string.value: YOU poop.

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: Oh, this DOES feel nice.

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: Hope you brought along toilet paper!

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: Such a perfectly round little pelle!

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: I feel so refreshed.

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: Not right now. I have a headache.

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: You're such a drill sergeant.

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: Um, that'd be weird.

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: You into that sort of thing?

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: Does this make me a party POOPer? Get it?

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: It actually smells quite nice.

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: Next time, let's go together!

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: It's like soft-serve ice cream!

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: Hey! Are you saying I have a stick up my butt?

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: No, thanks. I'll hold it.

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: Are you feeling all right?

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: Maybe later.

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: Night, night.

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: Will you sing me a lullaby?

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: Don't even THINK of using me as a pillow.

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: Will you tuck me in?

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: You're not the boss of me.

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: Awww, is the human sleepy-weepy?

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: You can sleep if you want. I'm busy.

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: I hope I dream of ramen.

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: Will you cuddle with me?

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: I count pies and donuts to fall asleep.

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: Will you pet me until I doze off?

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: I only sleep on silk sheets.

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: Last time I slept, someone tied my tail to my ears. Pass!

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: Think you can make me?

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: I'm refusing just to be rebellious.

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: I suppose I could afford to take a break.

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: Hey, I just wanted to tell you that I think you're really... Zzz.

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: You should rest, too. You can cuddle with me.

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: Coffee ramen, pizza ramen, donut ramen... Zzz.

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: Do I LOOK sleepy to you?

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: You're so lazy, sometimes you disgust me.

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: I have recipes to create! No time for sleep!

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: Sleep is for the weak.

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: I'm not chubby, I'm big-boned. Just wanted to let you know.

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: Everybody who meets me, loves me. Didja know that?

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: Just 'cause I'm cute doesn't mean my life is easy.

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: Ramen is really good with sugar and honey. Try it!

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: Go away. I'm sick of your face.

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: Why do you always follow me around?

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: Shoo! Just, shoo!

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: Ugh, what do you want from me?

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: My dream is to become the world's best ramen chef!

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: I think about new ramen recipes all the time. Imagine: deep-fried ramen!

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: Here's a secret: my parents can transform into human shape.

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: Do you think red herb ramen would do well in this market?

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: Don't you have anyone else to pester?

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: You must be really lonely to be bothering me.

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: I'm going to pretend I don't see you.

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: Don't speak until you're spoken to!

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: I figure, if I stick with you, I'll get to travel and try all sorts of ramen!

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: I'm actually a really great dancer. I've got the perfect figure for it.

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: People who want to bring me down say I'm fat, but I know it isn't true.

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: Sometimes people tell me I have no parents. I don't get it. I DO have parents!

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: I need some "me" time, please.

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: I'm too hungry to chat.

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: You talk too much.

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: Do I LOOK like I'm in the mood?

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: We can dance if we want to!

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: Ah, I'm so adorable when I dance, I want to hug myself.

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: You love me even more than before I danced, don't you?

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: Dancing makes me hungry!

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: I'm not here for your amusement.

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: I'll think about it, IF you get me some ramen.

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: Believe it or not, I'm actually quite shy.

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: I'M NOT A MONKEY!

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: Bounce, wiggle, bounce, wiggle, bounce!

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: You ain't never seen nobody as cute as me!

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: Feel free to join me!

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: Buy me a mirror so I can admire myself when I dance!

string.name: c23_f1
string.value: What, and then you'll give me a treat? How demeaning.

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: Not right now, please.

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: I'm on strike until you take me to a new ramen restaurant.

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: You first, buddy.

string.name: f2_s
string.value: I looooove ramen!

string.name: f2_f
string.value: Sooooo stuffed. Mmmm.

string.name: f3_s
string.value: This is why I love you.

string.name: f3_f
string.value: I could eat ten servings in one sitting!

string.name: f4_s
string.value: What are you feeding me?!

string.name: f4_f
string.value: Mouth...likes. Stomach, not so much. Too full!

string.name: s2
string.value: That isn't funny!

string.name: s3
string.value: Just my luck. You're TERRIBLE.

string.name: s4
string.value: I can hear you, you know.

string.name: c1_s1
string.value: Bark bark~

string.name: c1_s2
string.value: Bark~ BARK BARK!

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: You want me to sit like this? bark?

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: I get sleepy sitting down, bark!

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: Ahh... this is easier~ BARK BARK~

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: Sit? Like this? bark bark!

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: I can't understand what the master is saying~ BARK BARK!

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: It's too hard to understand~ BARK BARK!

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: I have no clue what you said! Bark bark!

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: No. I don't want to sit! BARK BARK!

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: Master, this is how you sit, right? Woof!

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: Master, I'm doing well, right? Right? Woof woof!

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: I hope the master keeps asking me to sit...woof woof~

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: I have short legs, so it's easy to sit~ Woof woof!

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: Master, I can't tell what you're saying~ Woof woof~

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Master, do I HAVE to sit right now? Woof woof!

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: Let's do something else right now~ Woof woof!

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: It's too dirty to sit here! Woof woof!

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: Still telling me to sit? It's waaay too easy...

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: Alright~ At your command!

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: My hind legs are so short. I feel more comfortable sitting like this... hehe...

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: You want me to sit? Here... this is the right way, right?

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: Ahh... itchy... (acting like I didn't hear it...)

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: Sitting is waaaay too easy. Give me something harder.

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: (scratching) Whoa? What did you just say? I didn't hear you~

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: I'm sick of your commands...

string.name: c5_s1
string.value: Bark... BARK BARK...

string.name: c5_s2
string.value: Heeeng... heeeng...

string.name: c5_f2
string.value: Woof woof !!!

string.name: c6_s1
string.value: So scary... bark!

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: Please don't give me that look... bark bark!

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: Don't hit me... heeng...

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: I'm so sorry... bark...

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: Krrr...Do you want to be punished by ME?

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: I didn't do anything wrong! BARK BARK!

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: I was just sitting here... BARK BARK!

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: Krrrr...One of these days, I won't take it anymore... BARK BARK!

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: I... I'm so sorry... woof...

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: I'm sorry... woooof...

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: Master, are you mad? Woooof...

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: Master, I'll be careful from here on out... wooof...

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: Master! Things like that happen at times... why so mad? Woof woof!

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Master, boredom doesn't give you the right to abuse me! Woof woof!!

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: Where else will you find a cute pet like this? Krrrr...

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: I didn't do anything wrong! Woof woof!

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: Master... I'll be more careful next time...

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: Master, you scare me...

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: Master, I'll be good ...

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: Please forgive me, master...

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: Man, master's going off on me again and I didn't do a thing...

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: Master, things happen sometimes... why so mad??

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: Rrrr... master's not happy over nothing...

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: Man... shush...

string.name: c9_f2
string.value: Woof...? Woof woof woof???

string.name: c10_s1
string.value: No... bark...

string.name: c10_s2
string.value: I'll be better... bark... much better...

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: I'm hurt inside... pretty bad... bark...

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: How can you say such thing... bark...

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: Huh? I was too itchy to hear that... bark...!

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: Ahh, itchy... I'll just pretend I never heard that... bark...

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: Stupid... bark...

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: What did the master just say? bark...

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: How can you say such thing... woof woof...

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: Master, I'm really really hurt... woof...

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: Master, are you for real...? Woof...

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: Master, you didn't really mean it... right? Woof...

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: Master, was that a joke? Woof~

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: You didn't mean that, right? Woof woof...

string.name: c11_f3
